tika-s0402t:6_1: Dukanipātassa paṭhame pahārasādhanatthanti daṇḍappahārassa sukhasiddhi- atthaṃ.
tika-s0402t:7_4: Taṃ karontā yathā gīvato paṭṭhāya vaddhe kantitvā kaṭiyaṃ ṭhapenti,
tika-s0402t:7_5: evaṃ gopphakato paṭṭhāya kantitvāpi kaṭiyameva ṭhapenti.
tika-s0402t:7_6: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “kaṭito paṭṭhāya kantitvā gopphakesu ṭhapentī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:8_8: Palālavaṭṭiṃ viya katvāti yathā palālapīṭhaṃ karontā palālaṃ vaṭṭiṃ katvā saṃvellanavasena puna veṭhenti,
tika-s0402t:8_11: Te hi balavantā javayogā sūrā ca honti.
tika-s0402t:12_2: Dānañca yuddhañca samānamāhūti ettha kathaṃ panīdamubhayaṃ samānaṃ?
tika-s0402t:12_7: jīvite pana ālayaṃ vissajjetvā “hatthapādādicchedo vā hotu maraṇaṃ vā,
tika-s0402t:12_11: bhogesu pana ālayaṃ pissajjetvā “mahādānaṃ dassāmī”ti ussahantova deti.
tika-s0402t:12_15: yathā ca yuddhe appakāpi vīrapurisā bahuke bhīrupurise jinanti,
tika-s0402t:12_16: evaṃ saddhādisampanno appakampi dānaṃ dadanto bahuvidhaṃ lobhadosaissāmacchariyadiṭṭhivicikicchādibhedaṃ tappaṭipakkhaṃ abhibhavati,
tika-s0402t:13_9: Kāmāpi hi “yaṃ pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ,
tika-s0402t:13_10: ayaṃ kāmānaṃ assādo”ti evaṃ vuttassa sukhassa,
tika-s0402t:13_11: tadassādanimittassa vā dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato upadhīyati ettha sukhanti iminā vacanatthena “upadhī”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0402t:13_15: Sabbesaṃ upadhīnaṃ paṭinissaggo pahānaṃ etthāti sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggaṃ, nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:16_6: diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañca tassa uppādanena ceva anubalappadānena ca hitāti tapanīyā.
tika-s0402t:16_7: Atha vā tapanti tenāti tapanaṃ, anutāpo,
tika-s0402t:16_10: Anusocatīti vippaṭisārī hutvā katākataṃ anugamma socati.
tika-s0402t:16_11: Socanañhi katattā ca hoti akatattā ca.
tika-s0402t:16_13: Nandayakkhādīnaṃ vatthūni pākaṭānīti tāni adassetvā dvebhātikavatthuṃ dassento “te kirā”ti ādimāha.
tika-s0402t:16_15: Puna kiṃ maggasīti puna kiṃ icchasi.
tika-s0402t:19_1: Pañcame imañhi dhammadvayanti kusalesu dhammesu asantuṭṭhitā,

tika-s0402t:19_8: Vīriyappavāhe vattamāne antarā eva paṭigamanaṃ nivattanaṃ paṭivānaṃ,
tika-s0402t:23_4: Saṃyojaniye dhamme assādato anupassati sīlenāti assādānupassī,
tika-s0402t:23_10: khandhānaṃ tattha tattha bhave aparāparaṃ nibbattitoti attho.
tika-s0402t:23_12: Ekabhavapariyāpannajīvitindriyappabandhavicchedavasena khandhānaṃ bhedo idha maraṇanti āha “maraṇenāti khandhabhedato”ti.
tika-s0402t:24_0: Dukkhanti idha kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ adhippetanti āha “kāyapaṭipīḷanadukkhehī”ti.
tika-s0402t:24_4: so ca atthato ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa adhimattacetodukkhappabhāvito dosoyeva.
tika-s0402t:24_5: Kāyacittānañhi āyāsanavasena dosasseva pavattiākāro upāyāsoti vuccati saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpanno.
tika-s0402t:24_6: Taṃ cuddasahi akusalacetasikehi añño eko cetasikadhammoti eke.
tika-s0402t:27_1: Sattame yathā “kaṇhā gāvī”tiādīsu kāḷavaṇṇena samannāgatā “kaṇhā”ti vuccati,
tika-s0402t:27_3: atha kho kaṇhābhijātinibbattihetuto appabhassarabhāvakaraṇato vā “kaṇhā”ti vuccantīti dassento “na kāḷavaṇṇatāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:27_5: Kaṇhābhijātīti ca apāyā vuccanti manussesu ca dobhaggiyaṃ.
tika-s0402t:27_7: Na hirīyati na lajjatīti ahiriko, puggalo, cittaṃ,
tika-s0402t:27_9: Tassa bhāvo ahirikkanti vattabbe ekassa ka-
tika-s0402t:27_10: kārassa lopaṃ katvā ahirikanti vuttanti āha “ahirikanti ahirikabhāvo”ti.
tika-s0402t:30_1: Aṭṭhame “sukkaṃ vattha”ntiādīsu viya na vaṇṇasukkatāya dhammānaṃ sukkatā,
tika-s0402t:30_2: atha kho sukkābhijātihetuto pabhassarabhāvakaraṇato cāti dassento “na vaṇṇasukkatāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:30_4: Hirī pāpadhamme gūthaṃ viya passantī jigucchatīti āha “pāpato jigucchanalakkhaṇā hirī”ti.
tika-s0402t:30_5: Ottappaṃ te uṇhaṃ viya passantaṃ tato bhāyatīti vuttaṃ “bhāyanalakkhaṇaṃ otappa”nti.
tika-s0402t:31_0: Tattha ajjhattasamuṭṭhānaṃ hiriṃ catūhi kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti jātiṃ paccavekkhitvā, vayaṃ,
tika-s0402t:31_5: mādisassa jātisampannassa idaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ tāva jātiṃ paccavekkhitvā pāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-s0402t:31_7: mādisassa vaye ṭhitassa idaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ vayaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-s0402t:31_9: mādisassa sūrabhāvasampannassa idaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ sūrabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-s0402t:31_12: mādisassa paṇḍitassa bahussutassa idaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ bāhusaccaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-s0402t:31_13: Evaṃ ajjhattasamuṭṭhānaṃ hiriṃ catūhi kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-s0402t:31_14: samuṭṭhāpento ca hiriṃ nissāya pāpakammaṃ na karoti.
tika-s0402t:32_3: tato taṃ sīlavanto sabrahmacārī vivajjissantī”ti paccavekkhitvā bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ nissāya pāpakammaṃ na karoti.
tika-s0402t:33_1: Idhekacco kulaputto attānaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā “mādisassa saddhāpabbajitassa bahussutassa dhutadharassa
tika-s0402t:33_2: na yuttaṃ pāpakammaṃ kātu”nti pāpaṃ na karoti.
tika-s0402t:33_4: Tenāha bhagavā “so attānaṃyeva adhipatiṃ karitvā akusalaṃ pajahati,
tika-s0402t:34_1: Idhekacco kulaputto lokaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā “sace kho tvaṃ pāpakammaṃ kareyyāsi,
tika-s0402t:34_3: mahiddhikā mahānubhāvā loke ca samaṇabrāhmaṇā devatā ca,
tika-s0402t:34_4: tasmā te na yuttaṃ pāpaṃ kātu”nti pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Yathāha –
tika-s0402t:34_6: mahantasmiṃ kho pana lokasannivāse santi samaṇabrāhmaṇā iddhimanto dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduno.
tika-s0402t:34_12: saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti.
tika-s0402t:34_19: saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti…pe…
tika-s0402t:35_5: Tattha yathā dvīsu ayoguḷesu eko sītalo bhaveyya gūthamakkhito,
tika-s0402t:35_7: Tesu yathā sītalaṃ gūthamakkhitattā jigucchanto viññujātiko na gaṇhāti,
tika-s0402t:35_9: Evaṃ paṇḍito lajjāya jigucchanto pāpaṃ na karoti,
tika-s0402t:36_5: sabrahmacārimahattapaccavekkhaṇāti evaṃ catūhi kāraṇehi tattha gāravena sappatissavalakkhaṇaṃ hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā pāpaṃ na karoti.
tika-s0402t:36_9: duggatibhayanti evaṃ catūhi kāraṇehi vajjato bhāyanto vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇaṃ ottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti.
tika-s0402t:36_10: Ettha ca ajjhattasamuṭṭhānāditā hirottappānaṃ tattha tattha pākaṭabhāvena vuttā,
tika-s0402t:39_5: Garucittīkāravasena na paññāyethāti garuṃ katvā citte karaṇavasena na paññāyetha,
tika-s0402t:39_9: Tena mātulānīti vā ācariyabhariyāti vā garūnaṃ dārāti vāti ime saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0402t:39_14: yathā ajeḷakādayo tiracchānā hirottapparahitā mātāti saññaṃ akatvā bhinnamariyādā sabbattha sambhedena vattanti,
tika-s0402t:39_15: evamayaṃ manussaloko yadi lokapāladhammā na bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-s0402t:42_5: Ekindriyaṃ jīvaṃ viheṭhentāti rukkhalatādīsu jīvasaññitāya evamāhaṃsu.
tika-s0402t:42_6: Ekindriyanti ca kāyindriyaṃ atthīti maññamānā vadanti.
tika-s0402t:42_9: Aparajjugatāya āsāḷhiyā upagantabbāti ettha aparajju gatāya assāti aparajjugatā,
tika-s0402t:42_12: tasmā āsāḷhipuṇṇamāya anantare pāṭipadadivase upagantabbāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:42_13: Māsagatāya āsāḷhiyā upagantabbāti māso gatāya assāti māsagatā,
tika-s0402t:42_16: Tasmā āsāḷhipuṇṇamato parāya puṇṇamāya anantare pāṭipadadivase upagantabbāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:46_1: Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame appaṭisaṅkhāne na kampatīti paṭisaṅkhānabalaṃ,
tika-s0402t:46_3: Vīriyasīsena satta bojjhaṅge bhāventassa uppannaṃ balaṃ bhāvanābalaṃ.
tika-s0402t:46_4: Vīriyupatthambhena hi kusalabhāvanā balavatī thirā uppajjati,
tika-s0402t:46_5: tathā uppannā balavatī kusalabhāvanā balavanto satta bojjhaṅgātipi vuccanti.
tika-s0402t:46_9: Yā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkammaṃ,
tika-s0402t:47_6: dvinnaṃ balānaṃ yadidaṃ bhāvanābala”nti evamettha etadaggaṃ nāgatanti attho.
tika-s0402t:48_2: yathā vā vivekavasena pavattaṃ jhānaṃ “vivekaja”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0402t:48_4: Nissayaṭṭho ca vipassanāmaggānaṃ vasena maggaphalānaṃ veditabbo,
tika-s0402t:48_5: asatipi vā pubbāparabhāve “paṭiccasamuppādo”ti ettha paccayena samuppādanaṃ viya avinābhāvidhammabyāpārā nissayanabhāvanā sambhavantīti.
tika-s0402t:48_12: saṅkhāresu pana ādīnavaṃ disvā tappaṭipakkhe nibbāne ninnatāya ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissito hoti
tika-s0402t:49_0: “Pañcavidhavivekanissitampīti eke”ti vatvā tattha yathāvuttavivekattayato aññaṃ vivekadvayaṃ uddharitvā dassetuṃ “te hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:49_2: vipassanākkhaṇe ajjhāsayato paṭippassaddhivivekanissitaṃ bhāvetīti vattabbaṃ “evāhaṃ anuttaraṃ vimokkhaṃ
tika-s0402t:49_6: tasmā “etesaṃ jhānāna”nti imināpi tesaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:49_7: Yasmā pahānavinayo viya virāganirodhāpi idhādhippetavivekena atthato nibbisiṭṭhā,
tika-s0402t:50_1: saddo pariccāgattho pakkhandanattho cāti vossaggassa duvidhatā vuttā.
tika-s0402t:50_3: Tasmā vipassanākkhaṇe tadaṅgavasena maggakkhaṇe samucchedavasena paṭipakkhassa pahānaṃ vossaggo,
tika-s0402t:50_7: Ayaṃ satisambojjhaṅgoti ayaṃ missakavasena vutto satisambojjhaṅgo.
tika-s0402t:50_9: Pubbe vossaggavacanasseva atthassa vuttattā āha “sakalena vacanenā”ti.
tika-s0402t:50_12: Pariṇāmo nāma idha paripākoti āha “paripaccantaṃ paripakkañcā”ti.
tika-s0402t:50_13: Paripāko ca āsevanalābhena laddhasāmatthiyassa kilese pariccajituṃ nibbānaṃ pakkhandituṃ tikkhavisadabhāvo.
tika-s0402t:50_15: Esa nayoti yvāyaṃ nayo “vivekanissita”ntiādinā satisambojjhaṅge vutto,
tika-s0402t:51_0: “Vivekanissita”ntiādīsu labbhamānamatthaṃ sāmaññato dassetvā idāni idhādhippetamatthaṃ dassento “idha panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:51_3: Vivekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvāti nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ vivekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā.
tika-s0402t:52_5: Te hi samāpajjitvā “ekaggacittā sukhaṃ divasaṃ viharissāmā”ti icceva kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattenti.
tika-s0402t:52_6: Vipassanāpādakatthāyātiādīsu pana sekkhaputhujjanā “samāpattito vuṭṭhāya samāhitena cittena vipassāmā”ti nibbattentā vipassanāpādakatthāya bhāventi.
tika-s0402t:53_0: Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya “ekopi hutvā
tika-s0402t:53_1: bahudhā hotī”ti vuttanayā abhiññāyo patthentā nibbattenti,
tika-s0402t:53_3: Ye aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā “sattāhaṃ acittā hutvā diṭṭheva dhamme
tika-s0402t:53_4: nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ patvā sukhaṃ viharissāmā”ti nibbattenti,
tika-s0402t:53_6: Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā “aparihīnajjhānā brahmaloke uppajjissāmā”ti nibbattenti,
tika-s0402t:54_0: Yuttaṃ tāva cittekaggatāya bhavavisesatthatā viya vipassanāpādakatthatāpi catukkajjhānasādhāraṇāti tesaṃ vasena “cattāri jhānānī”ti vacanaṃ,
tika-s0402t:54_1: abhiññāpādakatthatā pana nirodhapādakatthatā ca catutthasseva jhānassa āveṇikā,
tika-s0402t:54_4: Padaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānampi hi padaṭṭhānanti vuccati kāraṇakāraṇanti yathā “tiṇehi bhattaṃ siddha”nti.
tika-s0402t:55_1: Catutthe sasakassa uppatanaṃ viya hotīti pathavijigucchanasasakassa uppatanaṃ viya hoti.
tika-s0402t:55_7: Kasmā mameva upari sabbairiyāpathe kappento uccārapassāvaṃ karonto maṃ na jānāsīti?
tika-s0402t:55_9: mayā akkantaṭṭhānañhi aṅgulaggehi phuṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ viya hoti,
tika-s0402t:55_15: alaṃ mayhaṃ tayāti uppatitvā aññasmiṃ ṭhāne patito.
tika-s0402t:55_17: “aho dūraṃ gatopi nanu mayhaṃyeva upari patitosī”ti?
tika-s0402t:55_18: So puna taṃ jigucchanto uppatitvā aññattha patito.
tika-s0402t:55_19: Evaṃ vassasahassampi uppatitvā uppatitvā patamāno sasako neva pathaviyā antaṃ pāpuṇituṃ sakkoti.
tika-s0402t:56_2: aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni nissāya uppanno vivādoyeva vivādādhikaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:56_3: “Idha bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ anuvadanti sīlavipattiyā vā”tiādinā catasso vipattiyo nissāya uppanno anuvādoyeva anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:56_6: “Yā saṅghassa kiccayatā karaṇīyatā apalokanakammaṃ ñattikammaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ ñatticatutthakamma”nti
tika-s0402t:57_3: Yena vā kāraṇenāti hetumhi idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:57_7: ajjhenena vasatī”tiādīsu viya hetuatthamevetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-s0402t:57_8: na karaṇatthaṃ tassa ayujjamānattāti vuttaṃ “yena vā kāraṇenā”ti.

tika-s0402t:58_0: Yathā khamanīyādīni pucchantoti yathā bhagavā “kacci te, brāhmaṇa,

tika-s0402t:58_4: Taṃ pana samappavattamodataṃ upamāya dassetuṃ “sītodakaṃ viyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:58_7: Khamanīyanti “idaṃ catucakkaṃ navadvāraṃ sarīrayantaṃ dukkhabahulatāya sabhāvato dussahaṃ,
tika-s0402t:58_9: Yāpanīyanti āhārādippaṭibaddhavuttikaṃ cirappabandhasaṅkhātāya yāpanāya kacci yāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ.

tika-s0402t:59_4: Sammoditabbato sammodanīyanti imaṃ pana atthaṃ dassetuṃ “sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato”ti āha.

tika-s0402t:62_2: Tathā hi “nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo”ti upari vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:62_4: tādiso ca sundaro bhaddako nāma hotīti āha “sundare dissatī”ti.
tika-s0402t:62_9: Yasasāti iminā edisena parivārena paricchedena ca.
tika-s0402t:62_13: Sabbā obhāsayaṃ disāti dasa disā pabhāsento,
tika-s0402t:62_14: cando viya sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karontoti gāthāya attho.

tika-s0402t:64_8: tesu padhānabhūte tāva dassetuṃ “saddhājananato paññājananato”ti vuttaṃ.

tika-s0402t:109_1: Tatiye tenupasaṅkamīti ettha yenādhippāyena so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami,
tika-s0402t:109_2: taṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “so hi brāhmaṇo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:109_3: Virajjhanapañhanti yaṃ pañhaṃ puṭṭho virajjhitvā kathesi,
tika-s0402t:109_6: Ubhatokoṭikaṃ pañhanti ubhohi koṭīhi yuttaṃ pañhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:109_7: “Kiṃvādī bhavaṃ gotamo”ti hi puṭṭho “kiriyavādimhī”ti vā vadeyya “akiriyavādimhī”ti vā,
tika-s0402t:109_8: tasmā imassa pañhassa vissajjane “kiriyavādimhī”ti ekā koṭi,
tika-s0402t:109_10: Uggilitunti dve koṭiyo mocetvā kathetuṃ asakkonto bahi nīharituṃ atthato apanetuṃ na sakkhissati.
tika-s0402t:109_11: Dve koṭiyo mocento hi taṃ bahi nīharati nāma.
tika-s0402t:109_12: Niggilitunti pucchāya dosaṃ datvā hāretuṃ asakkonto pavesetuṃ na sakkhissati.
tika-s0402t:109_13: Tattha dosaṃ datvā hārento hi gilitvā viya adassanaṃ gamento paveseti nāma.
tika-s0402t:110_0: 36. Catutthe dakkhiṇaṃ arahantīti dakkhiṇeyyā. Āhunaṃ vuccati dānaṃ, taṃ arahantīti āhuneyyā.
tika-s0402t:111_1: Pañcame kathamayaṃ migāramātā nāma jātāti āha “sā hī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:111_2: Sabbajeṭṭhakassa puttassāti attano puttesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ jātassa puttassa.
tika-s0402t:111_4: Tassā kira sabbajeṭṭhassa puttassa nāmaggahaṇadivase ayyakassa migāraseṭṭhisseva nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
tika-s0402t:111_5: Anibaddhavāso hutvāti ekasmiṃyeva vihāre nibaddhavāso ahutvā.
tika-s0402t:111_8: kathaṃ tāni senāsanāni dhuvaparibhogena paribhuñjīti āha “utuvassaṃ cārikaṃ caritvāpī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:111_12: Tesaṃ kira tathācittuppādasamakālameva yathicchitaṃ ṭhānaṃ uṇhaṃ pharamānā,
tika-s0402t:111_13: valāhakamālā nātibahalā ito cito nabhaṃ chādentī vidhāvati.
tika-s0402t:111_15: Abbhavalāhakā pana devatā sītuṇhavassehi vinā kevalaṃ abbhapaṭalasseva samuṭṭhāpakā veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:112_0: Ettha ca yaṃ vassāne ca sisire ca abbhaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0402t:112_2: Yaṃ pana abbhamhiyeva atiabbhaṃ sattāhampi candasūriye chādetvā ekandhakāraṃ karoti,
tika-s0402t:112_5: Yo ca tasmiṃ tasmiṃ utumhi uttaradakkhiṇādipakativāto hoti,
tika-s0402t:112_7: Vātepi vanarukkhakkhandhādippadālano ativāto nāma atthi. Ayañceva,
tika-s0402t:112_12: Yaṃ pana uṇhepi atiuṇhaṃ sītakāle ca uppannaṃ uṇhaṃ,
tika-s0402t:112_14: Yaṃ vassāne ca hemante ca sītaṃ hoti,
tika-s0402t:113_1: eko kira vassavalāhakadevaputto tagarakūṭavāsikhīṇāsavattherassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Thero –
tika-s0402t:113_4: Tumhākaṃ kira cittena devo vassatīti? Āma, bhanteti.
tika-s0402t:113_7: Meghasīsaṃ vā gajjitaṃ vā na paññāyati,
tika-s0402t:113_11: Sādhu devaputtāti pāde dhovitvā paṇṇasālaṃ pāvisi.
tika-s0402t:113_12: Devaputto tasmiṃ pavisanteyeva ekaṃ gītaṃ gāyitvā hatthaṃ ukkhipi,
tika-s0402t:114_1: tā pana tena tena visesena vatvā idāni tadaññe paṭhamabhūmike kāmāvacaradeve sāmaññato gaṇhanto “cātumahārājikā”ti āha.
tika-s0402t:114_6: Khiḍḍāpadosikā manopadosikā candimā devaputto sūriyo devaputtoti ete sabbepi cātumahārājikadevalokaṭṭhā eva.
tika-s0402t:115_5: Ekadevalokepi hi devānaṃ paramparā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ appattā nāma natthi.
tika-s0402t:115_6: Tattha maghena māṇavena saddhiṃ macalagāme kālaṃ katvā tettiṃsa sahapuññakārino ettha nibbattāti taṃ sahacāritaṃ ṭhānaṃ tettiṃsaṃ,
tika-s0402t:115_13: Attano sirisampattiyā tusaṃ itā gatāti tusitā.
tika-s0402t:116_0: Brūhito parivuddho tehi tehi jhānādīhi visiṭṭhehi guṇehīti brahmā.
tika-s0402t:116_1: Vaṇṇavantatāya ceva dīghāyukatāya ca brahmapārisajjādīhi mahanto brahmāti mahābrahmā.
tika-s0402t:116_6: Dīpikāya acci viya etesaṃ sarīrato ābhā chijjitvā chijjitvā patantī viya sarati vissaratīti ābhassarā,
tika-s0402t:116_9: Subhāti hi ekagghanā niccalā sarīrābhā vuccati,
tika-s0402t:116_14: Tattha sobhanāya pabhāya kiṇṇā subhākiṇṇāti vattabbe bhā-
tika-s0402t:116_20: Appakena kālena attano ṭhānaṃ na vijahantīti avihā.
tika-s0402t:116_24: Ukkaṭṭhasampattīhi yogato natthi etesaṃ kaniṭṭhā sampattīti akaniṭṭhā.
tika-s0402t:118_2: Yasmiñhi bhave sattā bahutaraṃ kālaṃ vasanti,
tika-s0402t:119_1: kassacipi kilesassa avikkhambhitattā kenacipi pakārena vikkhambhanamattenapi avimutto kāmabhavo ajjhattaggahaṇassa
tika-s0402t:119_2: attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattaggāhassa visesapaccayoti ajjhattaṃ nāma.
tika-s0402t:120_0: Chandarāgavaseneva ajjhattasaṃyojanaṃ bahiddhāsaṃyojanañca puggalaṃ dassetvā idāni orambhāgiyauddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanavasenapi
tika-s0402t:120_3: paṭisandhiyā paccayabhāvena taṃ oraṃ bhajantīti orambhāgiyāni.
tika-s0402t:120_4: Tattha ca kammunā vipākaṃ sattena ca dukkhaṃ saṃyojentīti saṃyojanāni,
tika-s0402t:120_10: Atha vā orambhāgo vuccati kāmadhātu rūpārūpabhavato heṭṭhābhūtattā,
tika-s0402t:120_11: tatrūpapattiyā paccayabhāvato orambhāgassa hitānīti orambhāgiyāni yathā “vacchāyogo duhako”ti.
tika-s0402t:120_14: Pādesu baddhapāsāṇo viya pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni heṭṭhā ākaḍḍhamānākārāni honti.
tika-s0402t:120_15: Hatthehi gahitarukkhasākhā viya pañcuddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni upari ākaḍḍhamānākārāni.
tika-s0402t:120_17: te bhavaggepi nibbatte etāni ākaḍḍhitvā kāmabhaveyeva pātenti,
tika-s0402t:121_0: Asamucchinnesu orambhāgiyasaṃyojanesu laddhapaccayesu uddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni agaṇanūpagāni hontīti
tika-s0402t:121_1: labbhamānānampi puthujjanānaṃ vasena avibhajitvā ariyānaṃ yogavasena vibhajitukāmo “ubhayampi ceta”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:121_3: Dvedhā paricchinnoti kāmasugatirūpārūpabhavavasena dvīhi pakārehi paricchinno.
tika-s0402t:122_5: Tathā hi yassa orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni,
tika-s0402t:122_9: Tasmā anto asamucchinnabandhanatāya bahi ca pavattamānabhavaṅgasantānatāya antobaddho bahisayito nāma.
tika-s0402t:123_8: niddese viya uddesepi pātimokkhasaṃvarova therena vutto “sīlavā”ti vuttattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0402t:123_11: Tattha avadhāraṇena itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ekadesena pātimokkhantogadhabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0402t:123_12: Tathā hi anolokiyolokane ājīvahetu ca sikkhāpadavītikkame gilānapaccayassa apaccavekkhitaparibhoge ca āpatti vihitāti.
tika-s0402t:123_14: Sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthīti sīlapariyāyena tesaṃ katthaci sutte gahitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma kiṃ atthi yathā “pātimokkhasaṃvaro”ti?
tika-s0402t:123_15: Ācariyassa sammukhatāya appaṭikkhipanto upacārena pucchanto viya vadati.
tika-s0402t:123_21: Idamatthanti idaṃ payojanaṃ imassa paccayassa paribhuñjaneti adhippāyo.
tika-s0402t:123_22: Nippariyāyenāti iminā indriyasaṃvarādīni tīṇi padhānassa sīlassa paripālanavasena pavattiyā pariyāyasīlāni nāmāti dasseti.
tika-s0402t:123_23: Idāni pātimokkhasaṃvarasseva padhānabhāvaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:124_0: Pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutoti yo hi naṃ pāti rakkhati,
tika-s0402t:124_1: taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkhanti laddhanāmena sikkhāpadasīlena pihitakāyavacīdvāro.
tika-s0402t:124_2: So pana yasmā evaṃbhūto tena samannāgato nāma hoti,
tika-s0402t:125_3: puññakiriyāya ca dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṃ apāyesu patanasīloti pātī,
tika-s0402t:125_5: Aniccatāya vā bhavādīsu kammavegakkhitto ghaṭiyantaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanato gamanasīloti pātī,
tika-s0402t:125_6: maraṇavasena tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa pātanasīlo vā pātī,
tika-s0402t:125_10: Cittassa hi vimokkhena satto vimuttoti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:126_0: Atha vā avijjādinā hetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti pāti,
tika-s0402t:126_1: “avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata”nti hi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0402t:126_2: tassa pātino sattassa taṇhādisaṃkilesattayato mokkho etenāti pātimokkho.
tika-s0402t:127_0: Atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkheti pāti, cittaṃ. Vuttañhi –
tika-s0402t:129_1: Patati vā etena apāyadukkhe saṃsāradukkhe cāti pāti,
tika-s0402t:130_0: “Taṇhā janehi purisaṃ, taṇhādutiyo puriso”ti ca ādi;
tika-s0402t:132_0: Atha vā patati etthāti pāti, cha ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni. Vuttañhi –
tika-s0402t:135_0: Atha vā pāto vinipāto assa atthīti pātī, saṃsāro. Tato mokkhoti pātimokkho.
tika-s0402t:136_0: Atha vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā “patī”ti vuccati,
tika-s0402t:136_4: Sabbaguṇānaṃ vā mūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca so yathāvuttaṭṭhena mokkho cāti patimokkho,
tika-s0402t:136_6: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “pātimokkhanti ādimetaṃ mukhametaṃ pamukhameta”nti vitthāro.
tika-s0402t:137_6: samucchedavasena ca accantaṃ mokkheti mocetīti pātimokkho.
tika-s0402t:137_8: tamhā tamhā vītikkamadosato paccekaṃ mokkhoti attho.
tika-s0402t:137_12: Sīlasaṃvaro hi sūriyassa aruṇuggamanaṃ viya nibbānassa udayabhūto tappaṭibhāgo viya yathārahaṃ kilesanibbāpanato patimokkhaṃ,
tika-s0402t:138_2: patimokkhameva pātimokkhanti evamettha pātimokkhasaddassa attho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:139_6: Te pana ekantato akusalasabhāvā hontīti āha “akusaladhammesū”ti.
tika-s0402t:139_8: paramāṇumattampi vajjaṃ sineruppamāṇaṃ viya katvā bhāyanasīlo.
tika-s0402t:139_9: Sammā ādiyitvāti sammadeva sakkaccaṃ sabbasova ādiyitvā.
tika-s0402t:139_10: Sikkhāpadesūti niddhāraṇe bhummanti samudāyato avayavaniddhāraṇaṃ dassento “sikkhāpadesu taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyitvā sikkhatī”ti atthamāha,
tika-s0402t:139_12: Yaṃ kiñci sikkhāpadesūti sikkhākoṭṭhāsesu mūlapaññattianupaññattisabbatthapaññattipadesapaññattiādibhedaṃ yaṃ kiñci sikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:139_14: taṃ pana dvāravasena duvidhamevāti āha “kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā”ti.
tika-s0402t:139_15: Imasmiṃ atthavikappe sikkhāpadesūti ādhāre bhummaṃ sikkhābhāgesu kassaci visuṃ aggahaṇato.
tika-s0402t:141_0: Sukkhavipassako yebhuyyena catudhātuvavatthānamukhena kammaṭṭhānābhinivesī hotīti āha “sukkhavipassakassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikabhikkhuno”ti.
tika-s0402t:142_0: Cittassa sukhumabhāvo idha sukhamattabhāvamāpannena daṭṭhabboti āha “sabbāpi hi tā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:142_2: na pana therassa kassaci maggassa vā phalassa vā uppādanatthāya,
tika-s0402t:143_1: Chaṭṭhe mahākaccānoti gihikāle ujjenirañño purohitaputto abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko suvaṇṇavaṇṇo ca.
tika-s0402t:143_3: tassa avidūre bhavattā nagarampi varaṇasaddena vuccatīti āha “varaṇā nāma ekaṃ nagara”nti.
tika-s0402t:143_4: Dvandapadassa paccekaṃ abhisambandho hotīti hetusaddaṃ paccekaṃ yojetvā dassento “kāmarāgābhinivesahetū”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:143_5: Hetusaddena sambandhe sati yo attho sambhavati,
tika-s0402t:143_7: Tattha kāmarāgena abhiniviṭṭhattāti etena kāmarāgābhinivesahetūti imassa atthaṃ dīpeti,
tika-s0402t:144_5: na byādhiādīnaṃ vasena jiṇṇasadise nāpi akālikena jarāya abhibhūte.
tika-s0402t:144_6: Vayovuddheti jiṇṇattā eva cassa vayovuddhippattiyā vuddhena sīlādivuddhiyā.
tika-s0402t:145_4: Moghajiṇṇoti anto thirakaraṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhāvena tucchajiṇṇo nāma.
tika-s0402t:145_5: Bāladārakopi daharoti vuccatīti tato visesanatthaṃ “yuvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:145_6: Atikkantapaṭhamavayā eva sattā sabhāvena palitasirā hontīti paṭhamavaye ṭhitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “susukāḷakeso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:145_8: Ekacco hi daharopi samāno kāṇo vā hoti kuṇiādīnaṃ vā aññataro,
tika-s0402t:145_9: so na bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato nāma hoti.
tika-s0402t:145_10: Yo pana abhirūpo hoti dassanīyo pāsādiko sabbasampattisampanno yaṃ yadeva alaṅkāraparihāraṃ icchati,
tika-s0402t:145_11: tena tena alaṅkato devaputto viya carati,
tika-s0402t:145_12: ayaṃ bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato nāma hoti.
tika-s0402t:146_0: Yamhi saccañca dhammo cāti yamhi puggale soḷasahākārehi paṭividdhattā catubbidhaṃ saccaṃ,
tika-s0402t:146_3: yamhi pana catubbidhāpi appamaññābhāvanā atthīti attho.
tika-s0402t:146_7: Theroti so imehi thirabhāvakāraṇehi samannāgatattā theroti pavuccatīti attho.
tika-s0402t:147_1: Aṭṭhame “corā balavanto hontī”ti padaṃ uddharitvā yehi kāraṇehi te balavanto honti,
tika-s0402t:147_6: Taṃ pana antopavisanaṃ kenaci kāraṇena bahigatassa hotīti āha “bahiddhā janapadacārikaṃ caritvā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:147_8: Tañca bahinikkhamanaṃ bahiddhākaraṇīye sati sambhavatīti āha “corā janapadaṃ vilumpantī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:148_3: Na ārādhakoti na sampādako na paripūrako.
tika-s0402t:148_5: so eva taṃsamaṅginaṃ vaṭṭadukkhapātato dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhammoti ñāyo dhammo,
tika-s0402t:148_7: So panettha saha vipassanāya adhippetoti āha “sahavipassanakaṃ magga”nti.
tika-s0402t:148_9: sā pana yasmā sampādanena paripūraṇena icchitā,
tika-s0402t:149_1: Dasame duggahitehīti atthato byañjanato ca duṭṭhu gahitehi,
tika-s0402t:149_3: Uppaṭipāṭiyā gahitehīti idaṃ pana nidassanamattaṃ duggahassa ūnādhikādivasenapi sambhavato.
tika-s0402t:149_4: Tenevāha “attano duggahitasuttantānaṃyeva atthañca pāḷiñca uttaritaraṃ katvā dassentī”ti.
tika-s0402t:152_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame uddhaccena samannāgatāti akappiye kappiyasaññitāya,
tika-s0402t:152_5: Ye hi vinaye apakataññuno saṃkilesavodāniyesu dhammesu na kusalā sakiñcanakārino vippaṭisārabahulā,
tika-s0402t:152_11: Māno hi seyyassa seyyoti sadisoti ca pavattiyā visesato tuccho.
tika-s0402t:153_3: Paccayavekallena vijjamānāyapi satiyā satikiccaṃ kātuṃ asamatthatāya evaṃ vuttā.
tika-s0402t:153_9: Samādhivirahena laddhokāsena uddhaccena tesaṃ samādhivirahānaṃ cittaṃ nānārammaṇesu paribbhamati vanamakkaṭo viya vanasākhāsu.
tika-s0402t:154_1: Dutiye bhaṇḍanaṃ vuccati kalahassa pubbabhāgoti kalahassa hetubhūtā paribhāsā taṃsadisī ca aniṭṭhakiriyā bhaṇḍanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0402t:154_2: Kalahajātāti hatthaparāmāsādivasena matthakappatto kalaho jāto etesanti kalahajātāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:154_5: Mukhasannissitatāya vācā idha “mukha”nti adhippetāti āha “dubbhāsitā vācā mukhasattiyoti vuccantī”ti.
tika-s0402t:154_6: Catubbidhampi saṅghakammaṃ sīmāparicchinnehi pakatattehi bhikkhūhi ekato kattabbattā ekakammaṃ nāma.
tika-s0402t:154_7: Pañcavidhopi pātimokkhuddeso ekato uddisitabbattā ekuddeso nāma.
tika-s0402t:154_8: Paññattaṃ pana sikkhāpadaṃ sabbehipi lajjīpuggalehi samaṃ sikkhitabbabhāvato samasikkhatā nāma.
tika-s0402t:154_9: Pāḷiyaṃ khīrodakībhūtāti yathā khīrañca udakañca aññamaññaṃ saṃsandati,
tika-s0402t:154_12: Satipi hi ubhayesaṃ kalāpānaṃ paramatthato bhede pacurajanehi pana duviññeyyanānattaṃ khīrodakaṃ samoditaṃ
tika-s0402t:154_14: evaṃ sāmaggivasena ekattūpagatacittuppādā viyāti khīrodakībhūtāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:155_4: visiṭṭhāya vā paṭipattiyā gahaṇaṃ idhādhippetanti āha “aggavatīti uttamapuggalavatī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:155_5: Avigatataṇhatāya taṃ taṃ parikkhārajātaṃ bahuṃ lanti ādiyantīti bahulā,
tika-s0402t:155_7: Te pana yasmā paccayabahubhāvāya yuttappayuttā nāma honti,
tika-s0402t:155_9: Sikkhāya ādaragāravābhāvato sithilaṃ adaḷhaṃ gaṇhantīti sāthalikāti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:155_11: sithilasaddena vā samānatthassa sāthalasaddassa vasena sāthalikāti padasiddhi veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:156_1: Catutthe idaṃ dukkhanti dukkhassa ariyasaccassa paccakkhato aggahitabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:156_3: Ito uddhaṃ dukkhaṃ natthīti anavasesetvā aggahitabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0402t:156_5: Asammohapaṭivedho ca yathā tasmiṃ ñāṇe pavatte paccā dukkhassa rūpādiparicchede sammoho na hoti,
tika-s0402t:156_9: Yaṃ nibbānaṃ maggassa ārammaṇapaccayaṭṭhena kāraṇabhūtaṃ āgamma tadubhayampi nirujjhati,
tika-s0402t:156_10: taṃ tesaṃ asamuppatti nibbānaṃ dukkhanirodhoti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:158_2: Pāḷivasenāti iminā yo dhammapaṭisambhidāya visayo gambhīrabhāvo, tamāha.
tika-s0402t:158_3: Dhammappaṭivedhassa hi dukkarabhāvato dhammassa pāḷiyā dukkhogāḷhatāya gambhīrabhāvo.
tika-s0402t:158_4: “Pāḷivasena gambhīrā”ti vatvā “sallasuttasadisā”ti vuttaṃ tassa “animittamanaññāta”ntiādinā pāḷivasena gambhīratāya labbhanato.
tika-s0402t:158_5: Tathā hi tattha tā gāthā duviññeyyarūpā tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0402t:158_9: Imināva nayena “atthavasena gambhīrā”ti etthāpi attho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:159_0: Sattasuññaṃ dhammamattamevāti sattena attanā suññaṃ kevalaṃ dhammamattameva.
tika-s0402t:159_1: Uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbanti liṅgavacanavipallāsena vuttanti āha “uggahetabbe ca pariyāpuṇitabbe cā”ti.
tika-s0402t:159_4: taṃ tena katanti vuccatīti āha “kavitāti kavīhi katā”ti.
tika-s0402t:159_11: Tesaṃ sāvakehīti buddhānaṃ sāvakāti apaññātānaṃ yesaṃ kesañci sāvakehi.
tika-s0402t:159_12: Na ceva aññamaññaṃ paṭipucchantīti ye vācenti,
tika-s0402t:159_16: Cārikaṃ na vicarantīti asukasmiṃ ṭhāne atthādiṃ jānantā atthīti pucchanatthāya cārikaṃ na gacchanti tādisassa
tika-s0402t:159_19: Attho nāma sabhāvato anusandhito sambandhato pubbāparato ādipariyosānato ca ñāto sammāñāto hotīti āha “ko attho”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:160_8: Paññāya vimuttoti samathasannissayena vinā aggamaggapaññāya vimutto.
tika-s0402t:160_11: Jhānaphassaṃ phusitvāti aṭṭhasamāpattisaññitaṃ jhānaphassaṃ adhigamavasena phusitvā.
tika-s0402t:160_12: Pacchā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ yathā ālocitaṃ nāmakāyena sacchikarotīti kāyasakkhī.
tika-s0402t:160_13: Na tu vimutto ekaccānaṃ āsavānaṃ aparikkhīṇattā.
tika-s0402t:160_14: Diṭṭhantaṃ pattoti diṭṭhassa anto anantaro kālo diṭṭhanto,
tika-s0402t:160_16: Paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya hi yāva aggamaggā diṭṭhippatto.
tika-s0402t:161_0: Saddahanto vimuttoti etena sabbathā avimuttassa saddhāmattena vimuttabhāvadassanena saddhāvimuttassa sekkhabhāvameva vibhāveti.
tika-s0402t:161_2: Chasu ṭhānesūti paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya chasu ṭhānesu.
tika-s0402t:161_6: Imaṃ kasmā gaṇhantīti evaṃ ekantapāsaṃsesu ariyesu gayhamānesu imaṃ ekantaninditaṃ lāmakaṃ dussīlaṃ kasmā gaṇhanti.
tika-s0402t:161_7: Sabbesu sabbatā sadisesu labbhamānopi viseso na paññāyati,
tika-s0402t:161_8: visabhāge pana sati eva paññāyati paṭabhāvena viya cittapaṭassāti āha “ekaccesu panā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:162_3: Dhammānusārī nāma paññāsaṅkhātena dhammena ariyamaggasotassa anussaraṇato.
tika-s0402t:162_4: Kāyasakkhī nāma nāmakāyena sacchikātabbassa nibbānassa sacchikaraṇato.
tika-s0402t:162_10: Tattha diṭṭhantaṃ pattoti dassanasaṅkhātassa sotāpattimaggañāṇassa anantaraṃ pattoti attho.
tika-s0402t:162_12: Jhānaphassarahitāya sātisayāya paññāya eva vimuttoti paññāvimutto.
tika-s0402t:163_2: Kāyakammādīnaṃ visamattā tato eva tattha pakkhalanaṃ sulabhanti āha “sapakkhalanaṭṭhenā”ti.
tika-s0402t:164_0: 51. Navame adhammikāti adhamme niyuttā. Tenāha “niddhammā”ti, dhammarahitāti attho.
tika-s0402t:165_2: Na ceva aññamaññaṃ saññāpentīti mūlato paṭṭhāya taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ yathā vūpasammati,
tika-s0402t:165_3: evaṃ aññamaññaṃ itarītare na sammā jānāpenti.
tika-s0402t:165_4: Saññāpanatthaṃ sannipāte sati tattha yuttapattakaraṇena saññattiyā bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0402t:165_6: Na pekkhāpentīti taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya aññamaññaṃ na pekkhāpenti.
tika-s0402t:165_7: Asaññattiyeva attanā gahitapakkhassa balaṃ etesanti asaññattibalā.
tika-s0402t:165_8: Na tathā mantentīti sandiṭṭhiparāmāsiādhānaggāhiduppaṭinissaggibhāvena tathā na mantenti.
tika-s0402t:170_1: Dutiyapaṇṇāsakassa paṭhame hitaggahaṇena mettā vuttā hoti,
tika-s0402t:170_3: anukampāgahaṇena pana karuṇāti cakkavattinā saddhiṃ gahitattā “lokānukampāyā”ti na vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:170_5: Dveti manussadevasampattivasena dve sampattiyo. Tā dve,
tika-s0402t:171_1: Dutiye bahuso loke na ciṇṇā na pavattā manussāti āciṇṇamanussā.
tika-s0402t:171_2: Kadācideva hi nesaṃ loke nibbatti abhūtapubbā bhūtāti abbhutamanussā.
tika-s0402t:172_0: 55. Tatiye dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu anutāpaṃ karoti tassa ekabuddhakhettabhāvato.
tika-s0402t:173_0: 56. Catutthe thūpassa yuttāti dhātuyo pakkhipitvā thūpakaraṇassa yuttā.
tika-s0402t:174_0: 57. Pañcame attano ānubhāvenāti sayambhuñāṇena. Buddhāti buddhavanto.
tika-s0402t:175_1: Chaṭṭhe pahīnattā na bhāyatīti attasinehābhāvato na bhāyati.
tika-s0402t:175_3: attasinehassa paṭighassa tadekaṭṭhasammohassa ca vasena bhāyanaṃ hotīti tesampi pahīnattā na bhāyati,
tika-s0402t:175_5: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā balavattāti ettha ahaṃkārasammohanatādīnampi balavattāti vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:176_0: 59. Sattame assājānīyoti likhanti, usabhājānīyoti pana pāṭhoti.
tika-s0402t:177_6: Dve attheti pāḷiyaṃ vutte dve atthe.
tika-s0402t:178_1: Dasame yathāāraddhe kicce vattamāne antarā eva paṭigamanaṃ paṭivānaṃ,
tika-s0402t:179_2: Yathā asappurisā saha vasantā aññamaññaṃ agāravena anādariyaṃ karonti,
tika-s0402t:180_1: Dvādasame dvīsupi pakkhesūti vivādāpannānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dvīsupi pakkhesu.
tika-s0402t:180_8: Attano citte parisāya ca citteti ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0402t:189_0: 68. Catutthe vaṭṭapariyāpannaṃ sukhaṃ vaṭṭasukhaṃ. Nibbānārammaṇaṃ sukhaṃ vivaṭṭasukhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:193_3: Sabhāvato virāgato ca natthi etassa pītīti nippītikaṃ sukhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:193_6: Lokiyanippītikampi hi aggaṃ labbhatevāti bhūmantaraṃ bhinditvā aggabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:195_0: 74. Dasame samādhisampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ samādhisukhaṃ. Na samādhisampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ asamādhisukhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:197_5: Yaṃ kiñci rūpanti yaṃ kiñci ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ rūpaṃ.
tika-s0402t:200_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame nimīyati ettha phalaṃ avasesapaccayehi pakkhipīyati viyāti nimittaṃ,
tika-s0402t:200_4: Eseva nayoti iminā nidānādipadānampi kāraṇapariyāyameva dīpeti.
tika-s0402t:200_9: ruppati niruppati phalaṃ etthāti rūpanti evaṃ nidānādipadānampi hetupariyāyatā veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:202_1: Dasame samecca sambhuyya paccayehi katoti saṅkhato,
tika-s0402t:202_3: Maggakkhaṇe na honti nāma pahīyantīti katvā.
tika-s0402t:202_5: Yāva arahattā desanā desitā taṃtaṃsuttapariyosāne “na hontī”ti vuttattā.
tika-s0402t:205_0: 88. Catutthassa paṭhame phalasamādhīti catūsupi ariyaphalesu samādhi. Tathā phalapaññā veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:206_0: 89. Dutiye sampayuttadhamme pariggaṇhātīti paggāho. Na vikkhipatīti avikkhepo.
tika-s0402t:209_1: Pañcame bhavo nāma sassataṃ sadā bhāvato,
tika-s0402t:210_1: Aṭṭhame dukkhaṃ vaco etasmiṃ vippaṭikūlagāhimhi vipaccanīkasāte anādare puggaleti dubbaco,
tika-s0402t:210_3: tassa dubbacassa puggalassa anādariyavasena pavattā cetanā.
tika-s0402t:210_5: Tassa bhāvoti ca tassa yathāvuttassa dovacassassa atthibhāvo,
tika-s0402t:210_10: Catunnaṃ vā khandhānaṃ etenākārena pavattānaṃ etaṃ adhivacananti vadanti.
tika-s0402t:211_0: Pāpayogato pāpā assaddhādayo puggalā etassa mittāti pāpamitto,
tika-s0402t:211_3: Ye te puggalā assaddhā dussīlā appassutā maccharino duppaññā.
tika-s0402t:211_4: Yā tesaṃ sevanā nisevanā saṃsevanā bhajanā sambhajanā bhatti sambhatti taṃsampavaṅkatā”ti evaṃ āgatā.
tika-s0402t:211_6: Yāya hi cetanāya puggalo pāpasampavaṅko nāma hoti,
tika-s0402t:211_7: sā cetanā cattāropi vā arūpino khandhā tadākārappavattā pāpamittatā.
tika-s0402t:212_1: Navame sukhaṃ vaco etasmiṃ padakkhiṇagāhimhi anulomasāte sādare puggaleti subbacotiādinā,
tika-s0402t:212_2: kalyāṇā saddhādayo puggalā etassa mittāti kalyāṇamittotiādinā vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:213_1: Dasame pathavīdhātuādayo sukhadhātukāmadhātuādayo ca etāsveva antogadhāti etāsu kosalle dassite tāsupi
tika-s0402t:213_3: Dhātūti jānananti iminā aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ sabhāvaparicchedikā savanadhāraṇasammasanappaṭivedhapaññā vuttā.
tika-s0402t:214_3: tāsaṃ gahaṇena satta hontīti āha “pañcannañca sattannañca āpattikkhandhāna”nti.
tika-s0402t:214_7: Evaṃ tippakārena jānanapaññā hi āpattikusalatā nāma.
tika-s0402t:214_14: ‘saṃvarissāmī’ti vā pade pariyosite hotī”ti evaṃ taṃ taṃ āpattīhi vuṭṭhānaparicchedajānanapaññā āpattivuṭṭhānakusalatā.
tika-s0402t:214_15: Vuṭṭhānanti ca yathāpannāya āpattiyā yathā tathā anantarāyatāpādanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:214_16: Evaṃ vuṭṭhānaggahaṇeneva desanāyapi saṅgaho siddho hoti.
tika-s0402t:217_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame anāgataṃ bhāraṃ vahatīti attano asampattaṃ bhāraṃ vahati.
tika-s0402t:217_2: Atherova samāno therehi vahitabbaṃ bījanaggāhadhammajjhesanādibhāraṃ vahatīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:217_3: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yasmā sammajjanādinavavidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ āṇatteneva kātabbaṃ,
tika-s0402t:217_5: tasmā taṃ sabbaṃ vinā āṇattiyā karonto anāgataṃ bhāraṃ vahati nāmāti dassetuṃ “sammajjanī padīpo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:222_0: Evaṃ dvīhi nāmehi navavidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-s0402t:222_1: taṃ akatvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-s0402t:222_4: therena bhikkhunā navaṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpetu”nti vacanato therena āṇattena agilānena bhikkhunā uposathāgāraṃ sammajjitabbaṃ,
tika-s0402t:223_1: āṇāpentenapi yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ karonto vā sadā kālameva eko vā bhāranittharaṇako vā sarabhāṇakadhammakathikādīsu
tika-s0402t:223_4: Sace āṇatto sammajjaniṃ tāvakālikampi na labhati,
tika-s0402t:223_8: āṇāpentena ca “amukasmiṃ nāma okāse telaṃ vā kapallikā vā atthi,
tika-s0402t:223_15: āṇattena ca sace uposathāgāre āsanāni natthi,
tika-s0402t:223_17: āsanesu asati kaṭasārakepi taṭṭikāyopi paññāpetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-s0402t:223_18: tāsupi asati sākhābhaṅgāni kappiyaṃ kāretvā paññāpetabbāni.
tika-s0402t:224_0: Chandapārisuddhīti ettha uposathakaraṇatthaṃ sannipatite saṅghe bahi uposathaṃ katvā āgatena sannipātaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0402t:224_7: chandaṃ me ārocehī”ti ayamattho kāyena vā vācāya vā ubhayena vā viññāpetabbo.
tika-s0402t:224_9: Akatūposathena pana gilānena vā kiccappasutena vā pārisuddhi dātabbā.
tika-s0402t:224_13: pārisuddhiṃ me ārocehī”ti ayamattho kāyena vā vācāya vā ubhayena vā viññāpetabbo.
tika-s0402t:224_21: Tattha pārisuddhidānaṃ saṅghassapi attanopi uposathakaraṇaṃ sampādeti,
tika-s0402t:225_2: Bhikkhugaṇanāti “ettakā bhikkhū uposathagge sannipatitā”ti bhikkhūnaṃ gaṇanā.
tika-s0402t:225_5: Na hi bhikkhūnīhi yācitaṃ ovādaṃ anārocetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-s0402t:225_6: Bhikkhuniyo hi “sve uposatho”ti āgantvā “ayaṃ uposatho cātuddaso,
tika-s0402t:225_7: pannaraso”ti pucchitvā puna uposathadivase āgantvā “bhikkhunisaṅgho, ayya,
tika-s0402t:225_12: Taṃ ṭhapetvā bālagilānagamiye añño sacepi āraññako hoti,
tika-s0402t:225_15: tena bhikkhunā uposathagge pātimokkhuddesako bhikkhu evaṃ vattabbo “bhikkhunisaṅgho, bhante,
tika-s0402t:226_2: Sace hoti koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako sammato,
tika-s0402t:226_18: Ettāvatā hi sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ ārocitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:226_19: Tena bhikkhunā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā pāṭipade bhikkhunīnaṃ ārocetabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:226_24: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato anāṇattena na uddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:226_25: “Therādheyyaṃ pātimokkha”nti hi vacanato saṅghatthero vā pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyya,
tika-s0402t:226_29: tassādheyyaṃ pātimokkha”nti vacanato navakataro vā therena āṇatto.
tika-s0402t:227_1: Ekādasame na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ kukkuccāyatīti na kukkuccāyituṃ yuttakaṃ kukkuccāyati.
tika-s0402t:227_9: attānaṃ uddissa macchamaṃse akateyeva “maṃ uddissa kata”nti kukkuccāyati.
tika-s0402t:227_10: Kukkuccāyitabbaṃ na kukkuccāyatīti kukkuccāyituṃ yuttaṃ na kukkuccāyati.
tika-s0402t:227_15: attānaṃ uddissa macchamaṃse kate “maṃ uddissa kata”nti na kukkuccāyatīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:227_16: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “na kukkuccāyitabbanti saṅghabhogassa apaṭṭhapanaṃ avicāraṇaṃ na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ nāma,
tika-s0402t:232_3: Dvinnaṃ āsānaṃ duccajabhāvo kathaṃ jānitabboti paṭhamaṃ tāva lābhāsāya duccajabhāvaṃ vibhāveti “lābhāsāyā”tiādinā.
tika-s0402t:233_2: Iṇaṃ demīti saññaṃ karotīti evaṃ saññaṃ karonto viya hotīti attho.
tika-s0402t:233_4: Kataññū katavedīti tena kataṃ ñatvā pacchā kārako.
tika-s0402t:233_6: pacchā kārako ‘iṇaṃ jīrāpemī’ti saññaṃ karotī”ti ettakameva idha vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:234_5: puttadhītaro pana mātāpitaro paṭijaggantā abhivādanādīni tesaṃ kurumānā katavedino nāma.
tika-s0402t:234_7: antevāsikasaddhivihārikā ācariyupajjhāye paṭijaggantā abhivādanādīni ca tesaṃ kurumānā katavedino nāma.
tika-s0402t:235_1: parena akateyeva upakāre attani kataṃ upakāraṃ anapekkhitvā kārako pubbakārī,
tika-s0402t:235_4: Parena katassa upakārassa anurūpappavattiṃ attani kataṃ upakāraṃ upakārato jānanto vediyanto kataññukatavedī
tika-s0402t:236_1: Anāgatamhi payojanaṃ apekkhamāno “karissati me”tiādinā cittena paṭhamaṃ gahitaṃ tādisaṃ kataṃ upādāya kataññū eva nāma hoti,
tika-s0402t:236_2: na pubbakārīti adhippāyena “karissati meti evamādikāraṇasāpekkhakiriyo kataññukatavedī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:236_3: Tamojotiparāyaṇo puññaphalāni anupajīvanto eva puññāni karotīti “pubbakārī”ti vutto.
tika-s0402t:237_1: Tatiye tittoti suhito pariyosito niṭṭhitakiccatāya nirussukko.
tika-s0402t:237_2: Guṇapāripūriyā hi paripuṇṇo yāvadattho idha titto vutto.
tika-s0402t:237_4: Paccekabuddho ca tathāgatasāvako ca khīṇāsavo tittoti ettha paccekabuddho navalokuttaradhammehi sayaṃ titto paripuṇṇo,
tika-s0402t:237_6: Tassa hi dhammakathāya abhisamayo na hoti,
tika-s0402t:237_7: sāvakānaṃ pana dhammakathāya aparimāṇānaṃ devamanussānaṃ abhisamayo hoti.
tika-s0402t:237_8: Evaṃ santepi yasmā te dhammaṃ desentā na attano vacanaṃ katvā kathenti,
tika-s0402t:237_11: “ayaṃ bhikkhu na attanā paṭividdhaṃ dhammaṃ kathetī”ti cittīkāraṃ karoti.
tika-s0402t:237_14: Yathā hi “asukassa nāma idañcidañca dethā”ti raññā āṇatte kiñcāpi ānetvā denti,
tika-s0402t:238_3: Yo hi upaṭṭhākakulaṃ vā ñātikulaṃ vā nissāya vasamāno cīvare jiṇṇe tehi dinnaṃ cīvaraṃ nikkhipati,
tika-s0402t:238_6: Yo ca teneva nayena laddhaṃ laddhaṃ vissajjeti,
tika-s0402t:238_9: Ime dve puggalā sakaṭehipi paccaye upanentena tappetuṃ na sakkāti duttappayā.
tika-s0402t:239_1: Pañcame na vissajjetīti attano akatvā parassa na deti,
tika-s0402t:239_5: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “yo bhikkhu upaṭṭhākakulā vā ñātikulā vā jiṇṇacīvaro sāṭakaṃ labhitvā cīvaraṃ katvā paribhuñjati na nikkhipati,
tika-s0402t:239_6: aggaḷaṃ datvā pārupantopi punapi diyyamāne sahasā nappaṭiggaṇhāti.
tika-s0402t:239_7: Yo ca laddhaṃ laddhaṃ attanā paribhuñjati,
tika-s0402t:239_9: Ime dvepi sukhena sakkā tappetunti sutappayā”ti.
tika-s0402t:243_3: so yehi guṇehi sāriputtamoggallānā etadagge ṭhapitā,
tika-s0402t:243_4: te guṇe attano abhikaṅkheyyāti āha “yādiso sāriputtatthero paññāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:243_5: Ito uttari patthento micchā pattheyyāti sāriputtamoggallānānaṃ ye paññādayo guṇā upalabbhanti,
tika-s0402t:243_9: na tato paraṃ sāvakaguṇā nāma atthi.
tika-s0402t:244_1: Pañcame yassa guṇā khatā upahatā ca,
tika-s0402t:244_2: so khato upahato nāma hotīti āha “guṇānaṃ khatattā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:244_6: Apuññassa pasavo nāma atthato paṭilābhoti āha “pasavatīti paṭilabhatī”ti,
tika-s0402t:247_5: Ayaṃ duvidhopi attho idhādhippetoti āha “diyyanakavasena dānānī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:251_1: Catutthassa paṭhame āmisassa ca dhammassa ca alābhena attano parassa ca antare sambhavantassa chiddassa
tika-s0402t:251_2: vivarassa bhedassa santharaṇaṃ pidahanaṃ saṅgaṇhanaṃ santhāro.
tika-s0402t:251_3: Ayañhi lokasannivāso alabbhamānena āmisena dhammena cāti dvīhi chiddo.
tika-s0402t:251_4: Tassa taṃ chiddaṃ yathā na paññāyati,
tika-s0402t:251_5: evaṃ pīṭhassa viya paccattharaṇena āmisena dhammena ca santharaṇaṃ saṅgaṇhanaṃ santhāroti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:251_6: Ettha ca āmisena saṅgaho āmisasanthāro nāma.
tika-s0402t:251_7: Taṃ karontena mātāpitūnaṃ bhikkhugatikassa veyyāvaccakarassa rañño corānañca aggaṃ aggahetvāpi dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-s0402t:251_8: Āmasitvā dinnehi rājāno ca corā ca anatthampi karonti,
tika-s0402t:251_13: Sakkaccaṃ uddesadānaṃ pāḷivaṇṇanā dhammakathākathananti evaṃ dhammena saṅgaho dhammasanthāro nāma.
tika-s0402t:255_2: ito paraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ majjhe samāpattī”ti evaṃ saha parikammena appanāparicchedappajānanā paññā samāpattikusalatā.
tika-s0402t:256_12: pacchimavaye ca ekavīsatiyā anesanāsu chasu ca agocaresu carati,
tika-s0402t:256_14: ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā paṭipattiyā vaṅkabhāvato.
tika-s0402t:256_15: Eko paṭhamavaye pacchimavaye ca catupārisuddhisīlaṃ pūreti,
tika-s0402t:256_25: Eko sabbampetaṃ vaṅkataṃ pahāya tīsu vayesu pesalo lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo hoti,
tika-s0402t:257_3: Yo hirīyati hirīyitabbena hirīyati pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā,
tika-s0402t:257_4: ayaṃ vuccati lajjavo”ti evaṃ vutto lajjibhāvo lajjavaṃ nāma.
tika-s0402t:257_9: Lajjā etassa atthīti lajjī yathā “mālī māyī”ti,
tika-s0402t:258_1: Tatiye adhivāsanakhantīti ettha adhivāsanaṃ vuccati khamanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:258_2: Tañhi paresaṃ dukkaṭaṃ duruttañca paṭivirodhākaraṇena attano upari āropetvā vāsanato “adhivāsana”nti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:258_6: Suṭṭhu vā pāpato oratabhāvo viratatāti āha “suratabhāvo”ti.
tika-s0402t:259_1: Yo kāyiko avītikkamo vācasiko avītikkamo kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo,
tika-s0402t:260_5: Saṇhavācāvasena hi sammodamānassa puggalassa bhāvo nāma saṇhavācatā.
tika-s0402t:261_1: Yā sā vācā aṇḍakā kakkasā parakaṭukā parābhisajjanī kodhasāmantā asamādhisaṃvattanikā,
tika-s0402t:261_2: tathārūpiṃ vācaṃ pahāya yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā pemanīyā hadayaṅgamā porī bahujanakantā bahujanamanāpā,
tika-s0402t:262_0: Tattha aṇḍakāti sadose savaṇe rukkhe niyyāsapiṇḍo,
tika-s0402t:262_2: pheggurukkhassa pana kuthitassa aṇḍāni viya uṭṭhitā cuṇṇapiṇḍiyo vā gaṇṭhiyo vā aṇḍakā.
tika-s0402t:262_3: Idha pana byāpajjanakakkasādisabhāvato kaṇṭakappaṭibhāgena vācā aṇḍakāti vuttā.
tika-s0402t:262_4: Padumanāḷaṃ viya sotaṃ ghaṃsayamānā pavisantī kakkasā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0402t:262_7: Sā viya sukumārā mudukā vācā porī viyāti porī.
tika-s0402t:263_2: dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya saṅgītisuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ pana “avihiṃsāti karuṇāpi karuṇāpubbabhāgopī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:263_4: Yā sattesu karuṇā karuṇāyanā karuṇāyitattaṃ karuṇācetovimutti,
tika-s0402t:263_6: Etthāpi hi yā kāci karuṇā “karuṇā”ti vuttā,
tika-s0402t:264_0: Sucisaddato bhāve yakāraṃ ikārassa ca ukārādesaṃ katvā ayaṃ niddesoti āha “socabyaṃ sucibhāvo”ti.
tika-s0402t:264_1: Ettha ca socabyanti sīlavasena sucibhāvoti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:264_2: Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya saṅgītisuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ pana “soceyyanti mettāya ca mettāpubbabhāgassa ca vasena sucibhāvo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:264_4: Yā sattesu metti mettāyanā mettāyitattaṃ mettācetovimutti,
tika-s0402t:264_6: Etthāpi hi “mettī”tiādinā yā kāci mettā vuttā,
tika-s0402t:266_1: Navame kāmaṃ sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvopi balaṭṭho eva,
tika-s0402t:266_2: paṭipakkhehi pana akampanīyataṃ sātisayaṃ balaṭṭhoti vuttaṃ “muṭṭhassacce akampanenā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:268_1: Ekādasame dussīlyanti samādinnassa sīlassa bhedakaro vītikkamo.
tika-s0402t:268_2: Diṭṭhivipattīti “atthi dinna”ntiādinayappavattāya sammādiṭṭhiyā dūsikā micchādiṭṭhīti āha “diṭṭhivipattīti micchādiṭṭhī”ti.
tika-s0402t:269_1: Dvādasame sīlasampadāti sabbabhāgato tassa anūnatāpatti paripuṇṇabhāvo sīlasampadā.
tika-s0402t:269_5: Tañca kammassakatāsammādiṭṭhiādivasena pañcavidhaṃ hotīti āha “tena kammassakatā”ti.
tika-s0402t:270_1: Terasame sīlavisuddhīti visuddhiṃ pāpetuṃ samatthaṃ sīlaṃ,
tika-s0402t:270_2: cittavisuddhiādiuparivisuddhiyā paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ visuddhasīlanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:270_3: Suvisuddhameva hi sīlaṃ tassā padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:270_5: Etthāpi visuddhisampāpakanti cittavisuddhiādiuparivisuddhiyā sampāpakanti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:270_7: Kāyiko avītikkamo vācasiko avītikkamo kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo,
tika-s0402t:271_0: Diṭṭhivisuddhīti visuddhiṃ pāpetuṃ samatthaṃ dassanañāṇaṃ dassanavisuddhi,
tika-s0402t:271_1: paramatthavisuddhiṃ nibbānañca pāpetuṃ upanetuṃ samatthaṃ kammassakatañāṇādi sammādassananti attho.
tika-s0402t:271_4: Etthāpi visuddhisampāpikāti ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā dassananibbānasaṅkhātāya paramatthavisuddhiyā ca sampāpikāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:272_0: Ettha ca idaṃ akusalakammaṃ no sakaṃ,
tika-s0402t:272_1: idaṃ pana kammaṃ sakanti evaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca kammassakatajānanañāṇaṃ kammassakatañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:272_2: Tividhaduccaritañhi attanā katampi parena katampi no sakakammaṃ nāma hoti atthabhañjanato,
tika-s0402t:272_6: Vipassanāñāṇañhi lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhanatthaṃ ārambhakāle “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti pavattaṃ vacīsaccañca anulometi,
tika-s0402t:272_7: tatheva paṭivijjhanato paramatthasaccaṃ nibbānañca na vilometi na virādheti ekanteneva sampāpanato.
tika-s0402t:273_4: Yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhānanti taṃsampayuttameva vīriya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:274_0: Atha vā diṭṭhīvisuddhīti kammassakatañāṇādisaṅkhātā sabbāpi sammādiṭṭhi vuttā.
tika-s0402t:274_1: Yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhānanti yo cetasiko vīriyārambho…pe…
tika-s0402t:274_4: Abhidhamme hi “diṭṭhivisuddhi kho panāti yā paññā pajānanā…pe…
tika-s0402t:274_6: Yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhānanti yo cetasiko vīriyārambho…pe…
tika-s0402t:274_8: Teneva abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yā paññā pajānanātiādīhi heṭṭhā vuttāni kammassakatañāṇādīneva cattāri ñāṇāni vibhattāni.
tika-s0402t:274_9: ‘Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho’tiādīhi padehi niddiṭṭhaṃ vīriyaṃ gahitaṃ paññāya lokiyaṭṭhāne lokiyaṃ,
tika-s0402t:275_1: pañcavidhāpi vā sammādiṭṭhi diṭṭhivisuddhīti adhippāyena “diṭṭhivisuddhīti visuddhisampāpikā sammādiṭṭhiyevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:275_2: Heṭṭhimamaggasampayuttaṃ vīriyanti idaṃ pana “yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhānanti paṭhamamaggasampayuttaṃ vīriyanti vutta”nti adhippāyena vadati.
tika-s0402t:275_3: Ettha ca taṃtaṃbhāṇakānaṃ matabhedenāyaṃ vaṇṇanābhedoti na aṭṭhakathāvacanānaṃ aññamaññavirodho saṅkitabbo.
tika-s0402t:275_4: Atha yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhānanti heṭṭhimamaggasampayuttameva vīriyaṃ kasmā vuttanti āha “tañhi tassā diṭṭhiyā anurūpattā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:275_6: Yathādiṭṭhissāti anurūpadiṭṭhissa kalyāṇadiṭṭhissa nibbattitappakāradiṭṭhissa vā nibbattetabbapadhānānurūpadiṭṭhissa
tika-s0402t:276_4: Yā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya asantuṭṭhassa bhiyyokamyatā,
tika-s0402t:276_6: Tāya hi samaṅgibhūto puggalo sīlaṃ pūretvā jhānaṃ uppādeti,
tika-s0402t:276_8: āraddhavipassako arahattaṃ aggahetvā antarā vosānaṃ nāpajjati,
tika-s0402t:276_11: Tatra aññatra arahattamaggāti arahattamaggasampattaṃ vināti attho.
tika-s0402t:276_12: “Appaṭivānitā ca padhānasmi”nti idaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthamevāti na vibhattaṃ.
tika-s0402t:277_1: Soḷasame muṭṭhā naṭṭhā sati etassāti muṭṭhassati,
tika-s0402t:277_7: avijjālaṅghī moho akusalamūla”nti evaṃ vuttā avijjāyeva.
tika-s0402t:277_8: Tathā hi vijjāpaṭipakkho avijjā vijjāya pahātabbato,
tika-s0402t:277_10: Yasmā pana sampajaññappaṭipakkhe sati tassa vasena ñāṇassa abhāvo hoti,
tika-s0402t:278_1: Sattarasame apilāpanalakkhaṇā satīti udake lābu viya yena cittaṃ ārammaṇe pilavitvā viya tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0402t:282_1: Ito paresu kodhavaggādīsu upanandhanalakkhaṇoti kujjhanavasena “akkocchi maṃ avadhi ma”ntiādinā cittapariyonandhanalakkhaṇo.
tika-s0402t:282_4: Āghātavatthunā cittaṃ bandhantī viya hotīti aparakālo kodho upanāho.
tika-s0402t:282_6: tassa pubbakāritālakkhaṇassa guṇassa makkhanaṃ udakapuñchaniyā viya sarīrānugatassa udakassa puñchanaṃ
tika-s0402t:282_8: Tathā hi so paresaṃ guṇānaṃ makkhanaṭṭhena makkhoti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:282_11: tava ca mama ca ko viseso”tiādinā nayena uppajjamāno yugaggāhī palāsoti āha “yugaggāhalakkhaṇo palāso”ti.
tika-s0402t:282_15: paresaṃ guṇe ḍaṃsitvā dantehi viya chinditvā attano guṇehi same karotīti attho.
tika-s0402t:283_3: Maccharāyanalakkhaṇanti attano sampattiyā parehi sādhāraṇabhāve asahanalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0402t:283_6: Aññathā attano pavedanapuggalo kerāṭiko nekatikavāṇijoti vadanti.
tika-s0402t:283_7: Kerāṭiko hi puggalo ānandamaccho viya hoti.
tika-s0402t:284_1: Yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ nirayeti yathā ābhataṃ kañci āharitvā ṭhapito,
tika-s0402t:284_2: evaṃ attano kammunā nikkhitto niraye ṭhapitoyevāti attho.
tika-s0402t:286_4: dukkhassa vaḍḍhi tesaṃ atthīti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:288_2: Tesaṃ pana sikkhāpadapaññattikāraṇattā āha “dve kāraṇāni sandhāyā”ti.
tika-s0402t:288_4: dve atthe dve kāraṇānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:288_5: Atha vā attho phalaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāya vaso etassāti atthavaso,
tika-s0402t:288_7: Yathā “anabhijjhā dhammapada”nti vutte anabhijjhā eko dhammakoṭṭhāsoti attho hoti.
tika-s0402t:288_8: Evamidhāpi sikkhāpadanti sikkhākoṭṭhāso sikkhāya eko padesoti ayamettha attho daṭṭhabboti āha “sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti sikkhākoṭṭhāso ṭhapito”ti.
tika-s0402t:289_0: Saṅghasuṭṭhu nāma saṅghassa suṭṭhubhāvo “suṭṭhu devā”ti āgataṭṭhāne viya “suṭṭhu,
tika-s0402t:289_3: Dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāyāti dummaṅkū nāma dussīlapuggalā.
tika-s0402t:289_5: vītikkamaṃ karontā vā katvā vā na lajjanti,
tika-s0402t:289_7: Te hi sikkhāpade asati “kiṃ tumhehi diṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0402t:289_10: katarasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ katamaṃ āpattiṃ ropetvā amhe niggaṇhathā”ti saṅghaṃ viheṭhessanti,
tika-s0402t:289_11: sikkhāpade pana sati tesaṃ saṅgho sikkhāpadaṃ dassetvā dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena niggahessati.
tika-s0402t:290_0: Pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāyāti pesalānaṃ piyasīlānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihāratthāya.
tika-s0402t:290_1: Piyasīlā hi bhikkhū kattabbākattabbaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ velaṃ mariyādaṃ ajānantā sikkhattayapāripūriyā ghaṭamānā kilamanti,
tika-s0402t:290_3: kattabbākattabbaṃ pana sāvajjānavajjaṃ velaṃ mariyādañca ñatvā sikkhattayapāripūriyā ghaṭentā na kilamanti,
tika-s0402t:290_8: Dussīlapuggale nissāya hi uposatho na tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0402t:290_12: bhikkhū anekaggā uddesaparipucchākammaṭṭhānādīni anuyuñjituṃ na sakkonti.
tika-s0402t:290_13: Dussīlesu pana niggahitesu sabbopi ayaṃ upaddavo na hoti,
tika-s0402t:290_15: Evaṃ “pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāyā”ti ettha dvidhā attho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:291_1: diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desemī”ti ettha vivādamūlabhūtā kilesā āsavāti āgatā.
tika-s0402t:294_0: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. –
tika-s0402t:295_0: Ettha tebhūmakaṃ kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā.
tika-s0402t:295_1: Idha pana parūpavādavippaṭisāravadhabandhanādayo ceva apāyadukkhabhūtā ca nānappakārā upaddavā āsavāti āha –
tika-s0402t:295_3: Yadi hi bhagavā sikkhāpadaṃ na paññāpeyya,
tika-s0402t:295_4: tato asaddhammappaṭisevanaadinnādānapāṇātipātādihetu ye uppajjeyyuṃ parūpavādādayo diṭṭhadhammikā nānappakārā anatthā,
tika-s0402t:295_5: ye ca tannimittameva nirayādīsu nibbattassa paññavidhabandhanakammakāraṇādivasena mahādukkhānubhavanappakārā anatthā,
tika-s0402t:295_6: te sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti.
tika-s0402t:296_3: Te eva vā dukkhadhammāti heṭṭhā vuttā vadhabandhanādayo.
tika-s0402t:296_4: Tesaṃ pakkhupacchedanatthāyāti tesaṃ pāpicchānaṃ pakkhupacchedāya gaṇabhojanasadisaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-s0402t:296_6: Te hi sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sati sikkhāpadapaññattiṃ ñatvā vā yathāpaññattaṃ paṭipajjamāne bhikkhū disvā vā –
tika-s0402t:296_8: tehi ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā ārakā viharanti,
tika-s0402t:296_10: bhāriyaṃ vata karontī”ti pasādaṃ āpajjanti vinayapiṭake potthakaṃ disvā micchādiṭṭhikatavedibrāhmaṇo viya.
tika-s0402t:296_13: tepi sikkhāpadapaññattiṃ vā ñatvā yathāpaññattaṃ paṭipajjamāne bhikkhū vā disvā “aho, ayyā,
tika-s0402t:296_15: ye yāvajīvaṃ ekabhattaṃ brahmacariyaṃ vinayasaṃvaraṃ anupālentī”ti bhiyyo bhiyyo pasīdanti.
tika-s0402t:297_3: Tattha piṭakattayasaṅgahitaṃ sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ pariyattisaddhammo nāma.
tika-s0402t:297_8: Cattāro ariyamaggā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni nibbānañcāti ayaṃ adhigamasaddhammo nāma.
tika-s0402t:297_9: So sabbo yasmā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sati bhikkhū sikkhāpadañca tassa vibhaṅgañca tadatthajotanatthaṃ aññañca buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇanti,
tika-s0402t:297_10: yathāpaññattañca paṭipajjamānā paṭipattiṃ pūretvā paṭipattiyā adhigantabbaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ adhigacchanti,
tika-s0402t:298_1: Vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sati saṃvaravinayo ca pahānavinayo ca samathavinayo ca paññattivinayo
tika-s0402t:298_2: cāti catubbidhopi vinayo anuggahito hoti upatthambhito supatthambhito.
tika-s0402t:298_8: vīriyasaṃvaroti pañcavidhopi saṃvaro yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ vinetabbānañca kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro,
tika-s0402t:298_14: nissaraṇappahānanti pañcavidhampi pahānaṃ yasmā cāgaṭṭhena pahānaṃ,
tika-s0402t:298_19: Sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hi vijjamānāya eva sikkhāpadasambhavato sikkhāpadasaṅkhāto paññattivinayoti sikkhāpadapaññattiyā anuggahito hoti.
tika-s0402t:299_2: Bhikkhunīnaṃ cattāroti bhikkhūnaṃ vuttesu aniyatuddesaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā cattāro.
tika-s0402t:300_1: Bhagavā hi ehibhikkhubhāvāya upanissayasampannaṃ puggalaṃ disvā rattapaṃsukūlantarato suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ dakkhiṇahatthaṃ
tika-s0402t:300_3: cara brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti vadati.
tika-s0402t:300_4: Tassa saheva bhagavato vacanena gihiliṅgaṃ antaradhāyati,
tika-s0402t:300_7: ekaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā ekaṃ aṃse ṭhapetvā vāmaaṃsakūṭe āsattanīluppalavaṇṇamattikāpatto.
tika-s0402t:301_0: “Ticīvarañca patto ca, vāsi sūci ca bandhanaṃ;
tika-s0402t:303_0: Evaṃ vuttehi aṭṭhahi parikkhārehi sarīre paṭimukkehiyeva vassasatikatthero viya iriyāpathasampanno buddhācariyako
tika-s0402t:304_0: Saraṇagamanūpasampadāti “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”tiādinā nayena tikkhattuṃ vācaṃ bhinditvā vuttehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi anuññātaupasampadā.
tika-s0402t:304_8: evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘yaṃ kiñci dhammaṃ suṇissāmi kusalūpasaṃhitaṃ,
tika-s0402t:304_9: sabbaṃ taṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi karitvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇissāmī’ti,
tika-s0402t:304_13: evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘sātasahagatā ca me kāyagatāsati na vijahissatī’ti,
tika-s0402t:305_1: Bhagavā kira pubbārāme anucaṅkamantaṃ sopākasāmaṇeraṃ “uddhumātakasaññāti vā, sopāka,
tika-s0402t:305_2: rūpasaññāti vā ime dhammā nānatthā nānābyañjanā,
tika-s0402t:305_3: udāhu ekatthā byañjanameva nāna”nti dasa asubhanissite pañhe pucchi.
tika-s0402t:305_8: tvaṃ mama sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā pañhe byākāsīti āraddhacitto upasampadaṃ anujāni.
tika-s0402t:306_3: Ubhatosaṅghe upasampadā nāma bhikkhuniyā bhikkhunisaṅghato ñatticatutthena,
tika-s0402t:306_4: bhikkhusaṅghato ñatticatutthenāti imehi dvīhi kammehi anuññātā aṭṭhavācikūpasampadā.
tika-s0402t:306_5: Dūtena upasampadā nāma aḍḍhakāsiyā gaṇikāya anuññātā upasampadā.
tika-s0402t:307_0: Ñattikammaṃ nava ṭhānāni gacchatīti katamāni nava ṭhānāni gacchati? Osāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:307_4: kammalakkhaṇaññeva navamanti evaṃ vuttāni nava ṭhānāni gacchati.
tika-s0402t:307_10: āgacchāhīti vattabbo”ti evaṃ upasampadāpekkhassa osāraṇā osāraṇā nāma.
tika-s0402t:308_5: so atthaṃ asallakkhetvā byañjanacchāyāya atthaṃ paṭibāhati.
tika-s0402t:308_7: itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā avasesā imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasameyyāmā”ti evaṃ ubbāhikavinicchaye dhammakathikassa
tika-s0402t:309_3: saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyyā”ti evaṃ uposathakammavasena ṭhapitā ñatti uposatho nāma.
tika-s0402t:310_3: saṅgho pavāreyyā”ti evaṃ pavāraṇākammavasena ṭhapitā ñatti pavāraṇā nāma.
tika-s0402t:311_17: itthannāmo itthannāmena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyyā”ti evaṃ attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā sammannituṃ ṭhapitā ñatti sammuti nāma.
tika-s0402t:312_1: idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno nissaggiyaṃ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:312_3: saṅgho imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyā”ti,
tika-s0402t:312_5: āyasmantā imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyu”nti evaṃ nissaṭṭhacīvarapattādīnaṃ dānaṃ dānaṃ nāma.
tika-s0402t:313_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu āpattiṃ sarati vivarati uttāniṃ karoti deseti.
tika-s0402t:314_7: bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā taṃ kālaṃ anuvaseyyuṃ,
tika-s0402t:314_8: āvāsikena bhikkhunā byattena paṭibalena āvāsikā bhikkhū ñāpetabbā “suṇantu me,
tika-s0402t:314_13: āgame juṇhe pavāreyyāmā”ti evaṃ katā pavāraṇā paccukkaḍḍhanā nāma.
tika-s0402t:315_1: sannipatitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-s0402t:315_2: amhākaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ viharataṃ bahu assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhāciṇṇaṃ bhāsitaparikkantaṃ.
tika-s0402t:315_3: Sace mayaṃ imāhi āpattīhi aññamaññaṃ kāressāma,
tika-s0402t:315_4: siyāpi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya bhedāya saṃvatteyya.
tika-s0402t:315_6: saṅgho imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ tiṇavatthārakena vūpasameyya ṭhapetvā thullavajjaṃ,
tika-s0402t:315_7: ṭhapetvā gihipaṭisaṃyutta”nti evaṃ tiṇavatthārakasamathe katā sabbapaṭhamā sabbasaṅgāhikañatti kammalakkhaṇaṃ nāma.
tika-s0402t:316_0: Ñattidutiyaṃ kammaṃ satta ṭhānāni gacchatīti katamāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati? Osāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:316_3: kammalakkhaṇaññeva sattamanti evaṃ vuttāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati.
tika-s0402t:316_4: Tattha vaḍḍhassa licchavino pattanikkujjanavasena khandhake vuttā nissāraṇā,
tika-s0402t:316_5: tasseva pataukkujjanavasena vuttā osāraṇā ca veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:316_16: sāmaṇerapesakasammutīti etāsaṃ sammutīnaṃ vasena sammuti veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:316_20: Yā pana tiṇavatthārakasamathe sabbasaṅgāhikañattiñca ekekasmiṃ pakkhe ekekaṃ ñattiñcāti tissopi ñattiyo ṭhapetvā puna ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekā,
tika-s0402t:316_21: ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekāti dvepi ñattidutiyakammavācā vuttā.
tika-s0402t:317_0: Ñatticatutthakammaṃ satta ṭhānāni gacchatīti katamāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati? Osāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:317_3: kammalakkhaṇaññeva sattamanti evaṃ vuttāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati.
tika-s0402t:317_4: Tattha tajjanīyakammādīnaṃ sattannaṃ kammānaṃ vasena nissāraṇā,
tika-s0402t:317_5: tesaṃyeva ca kammānaṃ paṭippassambhanavasena osāraṇā veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:317_11: caṇḍakāḷī ca imete yāvatatiyakāti imāsaṃ ekādasannaṃ samanubhāsanānaṃ vasena samanubhāsanā veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:318_8: Satthusāsanaṃ nāma ñattisampadā ceva anusāvanasampadā ca.
tika-s0402t:327_1: Tikanipātassa paṭhame bhayanti bhīti cetaso byadhoti āha “cittutrāso”ti.
tika-s0402t:327_6: Sā pana yasmā paṭikārābhāvena vihaññamānassa kiñci kātuṃ asamatthassa osīdanakāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:327_8: Yathāvutte divase anāgacchantesūti vañcetvā āgantuṃ niyamitadivase anāgacchantesu.
tika-s0402t:327_9: Dvāre aggiṃ datvāti bahi anikkhamanatthāya dvāre aggiṃ datvā.
tika-s0402t:328_0: Naḷehi channapaṭicchannāti naḷehi tiṇacchadanasaṅkhepena upari chādetvā tehiyeva dārukuṭikaniyāmena paritopi chāditā.
tika-s0402t:328_1: Eseva nayoti iminā tiṇehi channataṃ sesasambhārānaṃ rukkhamayatañca atidisati.
tika-s0402t:329_1: Te hi nippitikā avinītā asaṃyatā yaṃ kiñci kārino.
tika-s0402t:332_1: Dutiye lakkhīyati bālo ayanti ñāyati etenāti lakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:335_5: Bālo ayanti nimīyati sañjānīyati etehīti bālanimittāni.
tika-s0402t:335_12: Lobhādīhi duṭṭhaṃ bhāsitaṃ musāvādādiṃ bhāsatīti dubbhāsitabhāsī.
tika-s0402t:335_13: Tesaṃyeva vasena kattabbato dukkaṭakammaṃ pāṇātipātādiṃ karotīti dukkaṭakammakārī.
tika-s0402t:335_15: Vuttānusārenāti “bālo aya”ntiādinā vuttassa atthavacanassa “paṇḍito ayanti etehi lakkhīyatī”tiādinā anussaraṇena.
tika-s0402t:338_1: Pañcame kati nu kho anussatiṭṭhānānītiādi chakke āvi bhavissatīti.
tika-s0402t:338_3: Apañhameva pañhanti kathesīti apañhameva pañho ayanti maññamāno vissajjesi.
tika-s0402t:340_0: Sambandhaṃ vavatthitaṃ vimuttaṃ, dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedo”ti. –
tika-s0402t:342_0: Tattha ṭhānakaraṇāni sithilāni katvā uccāretabbaṃ akkharaṃ sithilaṃ,
tika-s0402t:342_1: tāniyeva dhanitāni asithilāni katvā uccāretabbaṃ akkharaṃ dhanitaṃ.
tika-s0402t:342_5: yaṃ vā “āyasmato buddharakkhitattherassā”ti saṃyogaparaṃ katvā vuccati,
tika-s0402t:342_7: yaṃ vā “āyasmato buddharakkhitatherassā”ti evaṃ visaṃyogaparaṃ katvā vuccati.
tika-s0402t:342_8: Niggahītanti yaṃ karaṇāni niggahetvā avissajjetvā avivaṭena mukhena sānunāsikaṃ katvā vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:342_10: Vavatthitanti yaṃ parapadena asambandhaṃ katvā vicchinditvā “tuṇhī assā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:342_11: Vimuttanti yaṃ karaṇāni aniggahetvā vissajjetvā vivaṭena mukhena sānunāsikaṃ akatvā vuccati.
tika-s0402t:342_12: Dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedoti evaṃ sithilādivasena byañjanabuddhiyā akkharuppādakacittassa dasappakārena pabhedo.
tika-s0402t:342_13: Sabbāni hi akkharāni cittasamuṭṭhānāni yathādhippetatthabyañjanato byañjanāni ca.
tika-s0402t:348_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame ñātoyeva paññātoti āha “ñāto paññāto”ti.
tika-s0402t:348_4: Idāni ananulomikasaddassa nibbacanaṃ dassento “na anulometīti ananulomika”nti āha.
tika-s0402t:348_6: Sāsanaṃ na anulometīti ananulomikanti evamettha sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:348_9: Ummādaṃ pāpuṇīti so kira sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhāya pihitadvāragabbhe sayanapiṭṭhe nisīditvā bhariyaṃ ārabbha mettaṃ
tika-s0402t:348_10: bhāvento mettāmukhena uppannena rāgena andhīkato bhariyāya santikaṃ gantukāmo dvāraṃ asallakkhetvā bhittiṃ
tika-s0402t:348_11: bhinditvāpi nikkhamitukāmatāya bhittiṃ paharanto sabbarattiṃ bhittiyuddhamakāsi.
tika-s0402t:351_1: Dutiye catupārisuddhisīlampi pabbajjānissitamevāti iminā pabbajjūpagatasamanantarameva catupārisuddhisīlampi samādinnameva hotīti dasseti.
tika-s0402t:351_2: Maggasannissitāneva hontīti maggādhigamatthāya paṭipajjitabbattā kasiṇaparikammādīni maggasannissitāneva honti,
tika-s0402t:352_0: Aggamaggādhigamena asammohappaṭivedhassa sikhāpattattā maggadhammesu viya phaladhammesupi sātisayo asammohoti “sayaṃ abhiññā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0402t:352_2: Tathā jānanā panassa sacchikaraṇaṃ attapaccakkhakiriyāti “sacchikatvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:352_4: Tathā sacchikiriyā cassa attani paṭilābhoti “upasampajjā”ti vuttanti āha “paṭilabhitvā”ti.
tika-s0402t:355_4: ayañca vicāro santo honti samitā”tiādīsu niruddhabhāve.
tika-s0402t:355_6: gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto”tiādīsu santañāṇagocaratāyaṃ.
tika-s0402t:355_13: Atthibhāvo hettha puggalasambandhena vuttattā lokasamaññāvaseneva veditabbo,
tika-s0402t:355_15: Atthīti cetaṃ nipātapadaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0402t:357_4: Laku viya ghaṭikā viya ḍeti pavattatīti hi lakuṇḍako, rasso.
tika-s0402t:357_6: Taṃ panassa nimīlanaṃ ekena akkhinā dvīhipi cāti āha “ekakkhikāṇo vā ubhayakkhikāṇo vā”ti.
tika-s0402t:357_11: Heṭṭhimakāyasaṅkhāto sarīrassa pakkho padeso hato assāti pakkhahato.
tika-s0402t:358_0: Āsaṃ na karotīti rajjābhiseke kaniṭṭho patthanaṃ na karoti jeṭṭhe sati kaniṭṭhassa anadhikārattā.
tika-s0402t:359_15: Saṅkāhi saritabbasamācāroti “imassa maññe idaṃ kamma”nti evaṃ parehi saṅkāya saritabbasamācāro.
tika-s0402t:359_17: Attanāyeva vā saṅkāhi saritabbasamācāroti etenapi kammasādhanataṃyeva saṅkassarasaddassa dasseti.
tika-s0402t:359_18: Attano saṅkāya paresaṃ samācārakiriyaṃ sarati āsaṅkati vidhāvatītipi saṅkassarasamācāroti evamettha kattusādhanatāpi daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0402t:359_19: Tassa hi dve tayo jane kathente disvā “mama dosaṃ maññe kathentī”ti tesaṃ samācāraṃ saṅkāya sarati dhāvati.
tika-s0402t:360_0: Evaṃpaṭiññoti salākaggahaṇādīsu “kittakā vihāre samaṇā”ti gaṇanāya āraddhāya “ahampi samaṇo,
tika-s0402t:360_1: ahampi samaṇo”ti paṭiññaṃ datvā salākaggahaṇādīni karotīti samaṇo ahanti evaṃsamaṇappaṭiñño.
tika-s0402t:360_5: Kasambukacavaro jāto sañjāto assāti kasambujātoti āha “sañjātarāgādikacavaro”ti.
tika-s0402t:360_6: Atha vā kasambu vuccati tintakuṇapakasaṭaṃ udakaṃ,
tika-s0402t:360_7: imasmiñca sāsane dussīlo nāma jigucchanīyattā tintakuṇapaudakasadiso,
tika-s0402t:360_9: Lokuttaradhammaupanissayassa natthitāyāti yattha patiṭṭhitena sakkā bhaveyya arahattaṃ laddhuṃ,
tika-s0402t:360_11: Mahāsīlasmiṃ paripūrakāritāyāti yattha patiṭṭhitena sakkā bhaveyya arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ,
tika-s0402t:363_9: yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussāna”ntiādīsu hi sampattiyaṃ dissati.
tika-s0402t:364_2: Sabbacakkavattīnañhi nisinnāsanato uṭṭhahitvā cakkaratanasamīpaṃ gantvā hatthisoṇḍasadisapanāḷiṃ suvaṇṇabhiṅgāraṃ
tika-s0402t:364_3: ukkhipitvā udakena abbhukkiritvā “abhivijinātu bhavaṃ cakkaratana”nti vacanasamanantarameva vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā
tika-s0402t:365_2: Dasavidhe vā kusaladhamme agarahite vā rājadhamme niyuttoti dhammiko.
tika-s0402t:365_3: Tena ca dhammena sakalalokaṃ rañjetīti dhammarājā.
tika-s0402t:366_0: Kiṃ pana taṃ dasavidhaṃ cakkavattivattanti? Vuccate –
tika-s0402t:367_3: dhammaṃyeva nissāya dhammaṃ sakkaronto dhammaṃ garuṃ karonto dhammaṃ mānento dhammaṃ pūjento dhammaṃ
tika-s0402t:367_4: apacāyamāno dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammādhipateyyo dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ saṃvidahassu antojanasmiṃ
tika-s0402t:367_5: balakāyasmiṃ khattiyesu anuyantesu brāhmaṇagahapatikesu negamajānapadesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu migapakkhīsu.  Mā ca te, tāta,
tika-s0402t:367_6: vijite adhammakāro pavattittha. Ye ca te, tāta,
tika-s0402t:367_8: tesañca dhanamanuppadeyyāsi. Ye ca te, tāta,
tika-s0402t:367_9: vijite samaṇabrāhmaṇā madappamādā paṭiviratā khantisoracce niviṭṭhā ekamattānaṃ damenti,
tika-s0402t:367_12: Te kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paripuccheyyāsi pariggaṇheyyāsi – ‘kiṃ, bhante,
tika-s0402t:367_16: kiṃ me kariyamānaṃ dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya assa,
tika-s0402t:367_17: kiṃ vā pana me kariyamānaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya assā’ti.
tika-s0402t:367_21: taṃ samādāya vatteyyāsi. Idaṃ kho, tāta,
tika-s0402t:368_0: Evaṃ cakkavattisutte āgatanayena antojanasmiṃ balakāye ekaṃ,
tika-s0402t:368_9: samaṇabrāhmaṇe upasaṅkamitvā pañhapucchanaṃ ekanti evamevaṃ taṃ cakkavattivattaṃ dasavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:368_10: Gahapatike pana pakkhijāte ca visuṃ katvā gaṇhantassa dvādasavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:369_0: Aññathā vattituṃ adento so dhammo adhiṭṭhānaṃ etassāti tadadhiṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:369_4: Garuṃ karontoti pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garukaraṇavasena garuṃ karonto.
tika-s0402t:369_6: Dhammādhipatibhūtāgatabhāvenāti iminā yathāvuttadhammassa jeṭṭhakabhāvena purimataraṃ attabhāvesu sakkaccaṃ samupacitabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0402t:369_7: Dhammavaseneva ca sabbakiriyānaṃ karaṇenāti etena ṭhānanisajjādīsu yathāvuttadhammaninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0402t:369_10: Teneva pararakkhasādhanena khantiādiguṇena attānaṃ tato eva rakkhati.
tika-s0402t:371_0: Rakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā kāyakammādīsu saṃvidahanaṃ ṭhapanaṃ nāma tadupadesoyevāti vuttaṃ “kathetvā”ti.
tika-s0402t:371_2: Paṭivattetuṃ na sakkā khīṇānaṃ kilesānaṃ puna anuppajjanato.
tika-s0402t:374_1: Pañcame isayo patanti sannipatanti etthāti isipatananti āha “buddhapaccekabuddhasaṅkhātāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0402t:374_2: Sabbūpakaraṇāni sajjetvāti sabbāni rukkhassa chedanatacchanādisādhanāni upakaraṇāni raññā āṇattadivaseyeva sajjetvā.
tika-s0402t:375_4: Evaṃ guṇapatanena patitāti yathā taṃ cakkaṃ nābhiaranemīnaṃ sadosatāya na patiṭṭhāsi,
tika-s0402t:375_5: evamekacce puggalā kāyavaṅkādivasena sadosatāya guṇapatanena patitā sakaṭṭhāne na tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0402t:375_6: Ettha ca pharusavācādayopi apāyagamanīyā sotāpattimaggeneva pahīyantīti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0402t:378_1: Chaṭṭhe virajjhanakiriyā nāma pacchā samādātabbatāya apaṇṇakappayogasamādānā viya hoti,
tika-s0402t:378_2: avirajjhanakiriyā pana pacchā asamādātabbatāya anūnāti taṃsamaṅgipuggalo apaṇṇako,
tika-s0402t:378_4: Yasmā sā adhippetatthasādhanena ekaṃsikā vaṭṭato niyyānāvahā,
tika-s0402t:378_5: tattha ca yuttiyuttā asārāpagatā aviruddhatāya apaccanīkā anulomikā anudhammabhūtā ca,
tika-s0402t:378_7: Na takkaggāhena vā nayaggāhena vāti takkaggāhena vā paṭipanno na hoti nayaggāhena vā apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno.
tika-s0402t:378_8: Tattha takkaggāhena vāti ācariyaṃ alabhitvā “evaṃ me sugati,
tika-s0402t:378_10: Nayaggāhenāti paccakkhato adisvā nayato anumānato gahaṇena.
tika-s0402t:378_13: Paṇḍitasatthavāho viya sampattīhi na parihāyatīti yojanā.
tika-s0402t:379_0: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttanti parihānañca aparihānañca sandhāya jātake vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:379_2: apaṇṇakaṃ ṭhānaṃ aviraddhakāraṇaṃ niyyānikakāraṇaṃ eke bodhisattappamukhā paṇḍitamanussā gaṇhiṃsu.
tika-s0402t:379_3: Ye pana te bālasatthavāhaputtappamukhā takkikā āhu,
tika-s0402t:379_4: te dutiyaṃ sāparādhaṃ anekaṃsikaṃ ṭhānaṃ aniyyānikaṃ kāraṇaṃ aggahesuṃ,
tika-s0402t:379_11: te parihīnā anayabyasanaṃ āpannāti imamatthaṃ bhagavā anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatino vatvā uttari idamāha “etadaññāya medhāvī,
tika-s0402t:380_0: Tattha etadaññāya medhāvīti medhāti laddhanāmāya visuddhāya uttamāya paññāya samannāgato kulaputto etaṃ
tika-s0402t:380_1: apaṇṇakaṃ ṭhānaṃ dutiyañcāti dvīsu atakkaggāhatakkaggāhasaṅkhātesu ṭhānesu guṇadosaṃ vuddhihāniṃ atthānatthaṃ
tika-s0402t:380_3: Taṃ gaṇhe yadapaṇṇakanti yaṃ apaṇṇakaṃ ekaṃsikaṃ sukkapaṭipadāaparihāniyapaṭipadāsaṅkhātaṃ niyyānikakāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:381_0: Yavanti tāya sattā amissitāpi samānajātitāya missitā viya hontīti yoni.
tika-s0402t:381_1: Sā pana atthato aṇḍādiuppattiṭṭhānavisiṭṭho khandhānaṃ bhāgaso pavattivisesoti āha “khandhakoṭṭhāso yoni nāmā”ti.
tika-s0402t:381_3: yonīti taṃ taṃ phalaṃ anupacitañāṇasambhārehi duravagādhabhedatāya missitaṃ viya hotīti.
tika-s0402t:381_4: Yato ekattanayena so evāyanti bālānaṃ micchāgāho.
tika-s0402t:381_5: Passāvamaggo yoni nāma yavanti tāya sattā yonisambandhena missitā hontīti.
tika-s0402t:382_0: “Cakkhutopī”tiādimhi pana cakkhuviññāṇādivīthīsu tadanugatamanoviññāṇavīthīsu ca kiñcāpi kusalādīnaṃ pavatti atthi,
tika-s0402t:382_1: kāmāsavādayo eva pana vaṇato yūsaṃ viya paggharanakaasucibhāvena sandanti,
tika-s0402t:382_4: Dhammato yāva gotrabhūti tato paraṃ maggaphalesu appavattanato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:382_5: Ete hi ārammaṇakaraṇavasena dhamme gacchantā tato paraṃ na gacchanti.
tika-s0402t:382_6: Nanu tato paraṃ bhavaṅgādīnipi gacchantīti ce? Na,
tika-s0402t:382_7: tesampi pubbe ālambitesu lokiyadhammesu sāsavabhāvena antogadhattā tato paratābhāvato.
tika-s0402t:382_10: tato paraṃ pana maggaphalasamānatāya aññesu maggesu maggavīthiyaṃ samāpattivīthīyaṃ nirodhānantarañca
tika-s0402t:382_11: pavattamānesu phalesu nibbāne ca āsavānaṃ pavatti nivāritāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:382_16: Tattha mariyādaṃ kiriyaṃ bahi katvā pavattati yathā “āpāṭalīputtaṃ vuṭṭho devo”ti.
tika-s0402t:382_17: Abhividhi pana kiriyaṃ byāpetvā pavattati yathā “ābhavaggaṃ bhagavato yaso pavattatī”ti.
tika-s0402t:383_6: koṭi na paññāyati bhavataṇhāyā”ti idaṃ suttaṃ saṅgahitaṃ.
tika-s0402t:383_7: Avijjāsavabhavāsavānaṃ ciraparivuṭṭhatāya dassitāya tabbhāvabhāvino kāmāsavassa ciraparivuṭṭhatā dassitāva hoti.
tika-s0402t:383_8: Aññesu ca yathāvutte dhamme okāsañca ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānesu mānādīsu vijjamānesu attattaniyādiggāhavasena
tika-s0402t:383_10: na aññesanti etesveva āsavasaddo niruḷhoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:383_15: Purimāni cetthāti etesu catūsu atthavikappesu purimāni tīṇi.
tika-s0402t:383_17: Tattha yujjanti kilesesuyeva yathāvuttassa atthattayassa sambhavato.
tika-s0402t:383_18: Pacchimaṃ kammepīti pacchimaṃ “āyataṃ vā saṃsāradukkhaṃ savanti pasavantī”ti vuttanibbacanaṃ kammepi
tika-s0402t:384_3: Yena devūpapatyassāti yena kammakilesappakārena āsavena devesu upapatti nibbatti assa mayhanti sambandho.
tika-s0402t:384_4: Gandhabbo vā vihaṅgamo ākāsacārī assanti vibhattiṃ vipariṇāmetvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:384_5: Ettha ca yakkhagandhabbavinimuttā sabbā devatā devaggahaṇena gahitā.
tika-s0402t:384_7: tasmā vinaḷīkatāti vigatanaḷā vigatamūlā katāti attho.
tika-s0402t:384_8: Avasesā ca akusalā dhammāti akusalakammato avasesā akusalā dhammā āsavāti āgatāti sambandho.
tika-s0402t:385_2: upaddavāti idaṃ yadi bhagavā sikkhāpadaṃ na paññāpeyya,
tika-s0402t:385_3: tato asaddhammappaṭisevanaadinnādānapāṇātipātādihetu ye uppajjeyyuṃ parūpavādādayo diṭṭhadhammikā nānappakārā anatthā,
tika-s0402t:385_4: ye ca tannimittameva nirayādīsu nibbattassa pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇādivasena mahādukkhānubhavādippakārā anatthā,
tika-s0402t:386_2: Yathāti yena duvidhādippakārena avasesesu ca suttantesu tidhā āgatāti sambandho.
tika-s0402t:387_2: Āsavā khīyanti pahīyanti etenāti āsavakkhayo, maggo.
tika-s0402t:387_4: Āsavakkhayena pattabbato āsavā khīyanti etthāti āsavakkhayo, nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:388_3: Ṭhapetvāti hatthagataṃ kiñci ṭhapento viya kammaṭṭhānaṃ satisampajaññavasena ṭhapetvā kammaṭṭhānameva manasikaronto niddaṃ okkamati,
tika-s0402t:388_4: jhānasamāpanno viya yathāparicchinneneva kālena pabujjhamāno kammaṭṭhānaṃ ṭhapitaṭṭhāne gaṇhantoyeva pabujjhati nāma.
tika-s0402t:388_9: So pana dhātumanasikāravasena icchitabboti dassetuṃ “ayaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:394_1: Aṭṭhame itīti padasandhibyañjanasiliṭṭhatāti purimapadānaṃ pacchimapadehi atthato sahitatāya byañjanānaṃ vākyānaṃ siliṭṭhatāya dīpane nipāto.
tika-s0402t:397_1: Navame ugghāṭetvāti āsanadvārañceva bhaṇḍapasibbake ca vivaritvā.
tika-s0402t:397_4: Assāmiko hoti tīsupi kālesu laddhabbalābhassa alabhanato.
tika-s0402t:397_8: Tenapi hi navadhā indriyānaṃ tikkhattaṃ āpādentena samādhinimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ,
tika-s0402t:401_8: Abhidhamme āgatā kusalādikkhandhādibhedabhinnā dhammā suttantapiṭakepi otarantīti “dhammadharāti suttantapiṭakadharā”icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:401_9: Na hi ābhidhammikabhāvena vinā nippariyāyato suttantapiṭakaññutā sambhavati.
tika-s0402t:402_0: Na evaṃ attho daṭṭhabboti evaṃ desanānukkamena attho na gahetabbo.
tika-s0402t:402_3: Heṭṭhimena vā paricchedoti sīlasamādhipaññāsaṅkhātesu tīsu bhāgesu katthaci heṭṭhimanayena desanāya paricchedaṃ veditabbaṃ sīlena,
tika-s0402t:402_6: Idha pana sutte uparimena bhāgena paricchedo veditabboti vatvā taṃ dassento “tasmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:402_7: Yasmā vā bhagavā veneyyajjhāsayavasena paṭhamaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ dassento arahattaṃ pavedetvā “tayidaṃ arahattaṃ
tika-s0402t:402_8: imāya āraddhavīriyatāya hotī”ti dassento vīriyārambhaṃ pavedetvā “svāyaṃ vīriyārambho iminā kalyāṇamittasannissayena
tika-s0402t:402_9: bhavatī”ti dassento nissayasampattiṃ pavedeti heṭṭhā dassitanidassanānurūpanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:407_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame ruccatīti kāyasakkhiādīsu puggalesu ativiya sundaratarapaṇītatarabhāvena te cittassa abhiruciuppādako katamoti pucchati.
tika-s0402t:407_2: Saddhindriyaṃ dhuraṃ ahosi saddhādhuraṃ maggavuṭṭhānanti katvā,
tika-s0402t:407_4: Paṭividdhamaggovāti tīhipi therehi attano attano paṭividdhaarahattamaggo eva kathito,
tika-s0402t:410_6: Niṭṭhappattagilānoti “iminā rogena na cirasseva marissatī”ti niṭṭhaṃ patto gilāno.
tika-s0402t:411_1: Alabhantova tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ savanāya okkamati niyāmaṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ paccekabodhiṃ. Yanti, yato.
tika-s0402t:414_1: Tatiye vividhehi ākārehi ābādhanato byābādhova byābajjhaṃ,
tika-s0402t:414_6: Cetanaṃ punappunaṃ pavattento “rāsiṃ karoti piṇḍaṃ karotī”ti ca vutto.
tika-s0402t:414_9: Atthīti ujukaṃ dukkhavedanā natthīti avattabbattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:414_10: Aniṭṭhasabhāvattā aniṭṭhārammaṇattā ca dukkhapakkhikāva sā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0402t:414_11: Na hi akusalavipākā iṭṭhā nāma atthī,
tika-s0402t:414_13: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana nirayassa dukkhabahulattā dukkhassa ca tattha balavatāya sā abbohārikaṭṭhāne ṭhitāti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:414_14: Upamaṃ katvā āhaṭo viseso viya sāmaññassa yathā ayopiṇḍirohino viya rūpānanti.
tika-s0402t:415_5: “abyābajjhā phassā phusantī”ti pana vacanena lokuttaraphassāpi saṅgayhantīti “tīṇi sucaritāni lokiyalokuttaramissakāni kathitānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:418_1: Catutthe avassayaṃ gatoti vaṭṭadukkhaparimuttiyā avassayo mayhanti saraṇagamanakkamena upagato hoti.
tika-s0402t:418_4: Akatābhinivesassa vasena vuttanti tasmiṃ attabhāve na kato saraṇagamanābhiniveso yenāti akatābhiniveso,
tika-s0402t:418_10: Pabbajā hi savisesaṃ saraṇagamananti pabbajjādāyako puna vutto.
tika-s0402t:418_12: Duvidhena paricchinnāti lokiyadhammasampāpako lokuttaradhammasampāpakoti dvippakārena paricchinnā,
tika-s0402t:418_15: Neva sakkotīti ācariyena katassa upakārassa mahānubhāvattā tassa patikāraṃ nāma kātuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0402t:421_1: Pañcame aruiti purāṇaṃ duṭṭhavaṇaṃ vuccati. Ka-
tika-s0402t:421_2: kāro padasandhikaroti arukūpamaṃ cittaṃ etassāti arukūpamacitto appamattakassapi dukkhassa asahanato.
tika-s0402t:421_11: Duṭṭhārukoti maṃsalohitānaṃ duṭṭhabhāvena pakatibhāvaṃ jahitvā ṭhito duṭṭhavaṇo.
tika-s0402t:422_2: Uddhumātassa viyāti kodhena uddhaṃ uddhaṃ dhumātakassa viya kodhūpāyāsassa avissajjanato.
tika-s0402t:422_4: Ettha ca kiñcāpi heṭṭhimamaggavajjhāpi kilesā tehi anuppattidhammataṃ āpāditattā samucchinnā,
tika-s0402t:422_5: tathāpi tasmiṃ santāne aggamaggassa anuppannattā tattha appahīnāpi kilesā atthevāti katvā tesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ vijjūpamatā vuttā,
tika-s0402t:422_6: na tehi maggehi pahīnānaṃ kilesānaṃ atthibhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:425_2: Allīyitabboti chāyāya viya vinā bhāvanāya nillīyitabbo.
tika-s0402t:425_5: Upasaṅkamituṃ vaṭṭatīti “etassa sīlena abhivuddhi bhavissatī”ti upakāratthaṃ upasevanādi vaṭṭati.
tika-s0402t:426_1: kiṃ etenā”ti paṭikkhepābhāvato piyasīlattā na paṭihaññissati.
tika-s0402t:426_2: Phāsu bhavissatīti dvīsu hi sīlavantesu ekena sīlassa vaṇṇe kathite itaro anumodati.
tika-s0402t:426_3: Tena tesaṃ kathā phāsu ceva hoti pavattinī ca.
tika-s0402t:426_4: Ekasmiṃ pana dussīle sati dussīlassa sīlakathā dukkathā,
tika-s0402t:426_9: Sīlakathāya vuttamatthaṃ samādhipaññākathāsupi atidisati “samādhipaññākathāsupi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-s0402t:426_10: Dve hi samādhilābhino samādhikathaṃ sappaññā ca paññākathaṃ kathentā rattiṃ vā divasaṃ vā atikkamantampi na jānanti.
tika-s0402t:427_0: Tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmīti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ anuggahetabbe paññāya sodhetabbe vaḍḍhetabbe ca adhikasīlaṃ
tika-s0402t:427_2: Tañca anuggaṇhanaṃ sīlassa asappāyānupakāradhamme vajjetvā tappaṭipakkhasevanena hotīti āha “sīlassa asappāye”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:427_6: Anuggaṇhāti nāmāti abhinnaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ katvā anuggaṇhāti nāma.
