tika-s0402t:427_9: Seṭṭhaṃ puggalanti sīlādiguṇehi seṭṭhaṃ uttaritaraṃ uttamaṃ puggalaṃ.
tika-s0402t:430_2: saddāpekkhāya “na”nti sāmiatthe upayogavacananti āha “assā”ti “taṃ kho pana bhavanta”ntiādīsu viya.
tika-s0402t:430_4: Gūthakūpo viya dussīlyanti etena dussīlassa gūthasadisattameva dasseti.
tika-s0402t:433_2: Yathā hi gūthaṃ nāma mahājanassa aniṭṭhaṃ hoti,
tika-s0402t:433_3: evameva imassa puggalassa vacanaṃ devamanussānaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:433_6: Yathā hi phullāni vassikāni vā adhimuttikāni vā mahājanassa iṭṭhāni kantāni honti,
tika-s0402t:433_7: evameva imassa puggalassa vacanaṃ devamanussānaṃ iṭṭhaṃ hoti kantaṃ.
tika-s0402t:433_12: Yathā hi catumadhuraṃ nāma madhuraṃ paṇītaṃ,
tika-s0402t:433_13: evameva imassa puggalassa vacanaṃ devamanussānaṃ madhuraṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:433_14: Madhurakathanti kaṇṇasukhatāya pemanīyatāya ca saddato atthato ca madhurasabhāvakathaṃ.
tika-s0402t:434_1: sīlānametaṃ adhivacana”nti sutte āgatattā vuttaṃ “ettha vuttasīlaṃ viyā”ti.
tika-s0402t:437_1: Navame andhotiādīsu pāḷipadesu paṭhamo diṭṭhadhammikabhogasaṃharaṇapaññācakkhuno ca samparāyikatthasādhanapaññācakkhuno
tika-s0402t:438_2: Puññāni ca na karotīti samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikayācakānaṃ santappanavasena puññāni na karoti.
tika-s0402t:438_7: Na socatīti sokahetūnaṃ tattha abhāvato na socati.
tika-s0402t:441_7: Samādhi vātiādīsu lokuttaradhammā paramatthato sāsananti tadatthopādakasamādhi tassa ādīti vutto,
tika-s0402t:442_0: Sāsanassa pāripūrisuddhiyo nāma satthārā desitaniyāmeneva siddhā,
tika-s0402t:442_1: tā panettha kathentassa vasena gahetabbāti dassetuṃ “anūnaṃ katvā desentī”ti,
tika-s0402t:443_2: Ucchaṅgo viya ucchaṅgapañño puggalo daṭṭhabboti ucchaṅgasadisapaññatāya ucchaṅgapañño.
tika-s0402t:443_3: Evaṃ paññā viya puggalopi ucchaṅgo viya hoti,
tika-s0402t:444_0: Saṃvidahanapaññāyāti “evaṃ kate idaṃ nāma bhavissatī”ti evaṃ taṃtaṃatthakiccaṃ saṃvidhātuṃ samatthatāya vicāraṇapaññāya rahito.
tika-s0402t:449_6: Paṭijaggitā gopitāti yathākālaṃ tassa tassa dātabbassa dānena veyyāvaccassa ca karaṇena paṭijaggitā ceva uppannānatthappaharaṇena gopitā ca honti.
tika-s0402t:449_8: Brahmādibhāvasādhanatthanti tesaṃ guṇānaṃ atthitāya loke brahmā nāma vuccati,
tika-s0402t:449_11: te mātāpitūnaṃ puttakaṃ paṭilabhantīti dassanavasena nesaṃ brahmādibhāvasādhanatthaṃ “bahukārā”ti,
tika-s0402t:449_12: vatvā taṃ tesaṃ bahukārataṃ nānākārato dassetuṃ “āpādakā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:449_15: ācārasamācārānaṃ sikkhāpakā sakalassapi imassa lokassa dassetāro.
tika-s0402t:450_0: Avijahitā hontīti tāsaṃ bhāvanāya brahmānaṃ brahmaloke uppannattā avijahitā honti bhāvanā.
tika-s0402t:450_3: Iminā kāraṇenāti iminā yathāvuttena puttesu pavattitehi atikkamena mettādisamuppattisaṅkhātena kāraṇena.
tika-s0402t:451_3: Pacchācariyā nāma mātāpitūnaṃ santike uggahitagahaṭṭhavattasseva puggalassa yathāsakaṃ hatthācariyādīnaṃ
tika-s0402t:451_4: sippaggāhāpananti katvā sabbapaṭhamaṃ ācariyā nāmāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:452_0: Namo kareyyāti sāyaṃ pātaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā “idaṃ mayhaṃ uttamapuññakkhetta”nti namakkāraṃ kareyya.
tika-s0402t:452_1: Tāya naṃ pāricariyāyāti ettha nanti nipātamattaṃ,
tika-s0402t:453_2: ṭhānehi puttena puratthimā disā mātāpitaro paccupaṭṭhātabbā –
tika-s0402t:453_7: atha vā pana petānaṃ kālakatānaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ anuppadassāmī’ti.
tika-s0402t:453_10: pañcahi ṭhānehi puttena puratthimā disā mātāpitaro paccupaṭṭhitā pañcahi ṭhānehi puttaṃ anukampanti,
tika-s0402t:454_0: Apica yo mātāpitaro tīsu vatthūsu abhippasanne katvā sīlesu vā patiṭṭhāpetvā pabbajjāya vā niyojetvā upaṭṭhahati,
tika-s0402t:454_2: Sā panāyaṃ pāricariyā puttassa ubhayalokahitasukhāvahāti taṃ dassetuṃ “idheva naṃ pasaṃsanti,
tika-s0402t:454_4: Pasaṃsantīti “ayaṃ puggalo matteyyo petteyyo saggasaṃvattaniyaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūretī”ti idheva naṃ pasaṃsanti.
tika-s0402t:457_9: bhante”ti therena puṭṭho bhagavā “siyā”ti avoca lokuttarasamādhippaṭilābhaṃ sandhāya.
tika-s0402t:457_10: So hi nibbānaṃ santaṃ paṇītanti ca passati.
tika-s0402t:458_0: Nibbānaṃ santanti samāpattiṃ appetvāti nibbānaṃ santanti ābhujitvā phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā.
tika-s0402t:458_2: Aṭṭhavidheti “santaṃ paṇītaṃ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbāna”nti
tika-s0402t:458_7: bhikkhuno evaṃ hotī”ti āgate imasmiṃ suttappadese ekopi ābhogasamannāhāro cepi sabbe aṭṭhapi ābhogasamannāhārā
tika-s0402t:459_1: Parāni ca oparāni ca cakkhādīni āyatanāni.
tika-s0402t:462_2: mayā saṃkhittena desitaṃ dhammaṃ tādisenapi na sukaraṃ viññātu”nti iminā adhippāyeneva vadanto therassa ñāṇaṃ sabbamatikkamaṃ.
tika-s0402t:462_3: Aññātāro ca dullabhāti hi iminā sāmaññavacanena sāriputtattherampi antogadhaṃ katvā dassento tenapi attano desanāya duppaṭividdhabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0402t:463_3: Pahānābhisamayoti ca dassanābhisamayoti ca pariññābhisamayo vutto.
tika-s0402t:463_4: Arahattamaggo hi pariññākiccasiddhiyā kiccavasena mānaṃ passati,
tika-s0402t:463_9: Diṭṭhavisena diṭṭhasattānaṃ jīvitaṃ viya ayamassa pahānābhisamayo.
tika-s0402t:463_11: Pahānābhisamaye hi gahite dassanābhisamayo gahitova hoti.
tika-s0402t:464_0: Antamakāsi dukkhassāti arahattamaggena mānassa pahīnattā ye ime “kāyabandhanassa anto jīrati,
tika-s0402t:464_3: jīvikāna”nti evaṃ vuttalāmakanto ca “sakkāyo eko anto”ti evaṃ vuttakoṭṭhāsanto ca “esevanto dukkhassa
tika-s0402t:464_4: sapaccayasaṅkhayā”ti evaṃ vuttakoṭṭhāsanto cāti cattāro antā,
tika-s0402t:464_5: tesu sabbasseva vaṭṭadukkhassa aduṃ catutthakoṭisaṅkhātaṃ antamakāsi,
tika-s0402t:465_0: Nanu ca “pahāna”nti imassa niddese nibbānaṃ āgataṃ?
tika-s0402t:465_2: tasmā niddesenāyaṃ vaṇṇanā virujjhatīti āha “niddese panā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:465_3: Tattha tāni padāni āgatānīti tasmiṃ niddese “pahānaṃ vūpasamaṃ paṭinissagga”ntiādīni padāni āgatāni.
tika-s0402t:466_0: Dhammatakkapurejavanti iminā tasmiṃ catutthajjhānavimokkhe ṭhatvā jhānaṅgāni vipassitvā adhigataṃ arahattavimokkhaṃ vadati.
tika-s0402t:466_1: Arahattavimokkhassa hi maggasampayuttasammāsaṅkappasaṅkhāto dhammatakko purejavo hoti.
tika-s0402t:469_3: Bhinnakālato paṭṭhāya hi bījaṃ bījakiccāya na upakappati.
tika-s0402t:469_7: Na vātena na ca ātapena hatānīti vātena ca ātapena ca na hatāni,
tika-s0402t:469_14: Sannicayabhāvena sukhaṃ sayitānīti cattāro māse koṭṭhapakkhittaniyāmeneva sukhasayitāni.
tika-s0402t:470_4: Aparapariyāyavedanīyanti diṭṭhadhammānantarabhavato aññasmiṃ attabhāvapariyāye attabhāvaparivatte veditabbaphalaṃ kammaṃ.
tika-s0402t:470_5: Paṭipakkhehi anabhibhūtatāya paccayavisesena paṭiladdhavisesatāya ca balavabhāvappattā tādisassa pubbābhisaṅkhārassa
tika-s0402t:470_6: vasena sātisayā hutvā pavattā paṭhamajavanacetanā tasmiṃyeva attabhāve phaladāyinī diṭṭhadhammavedanīyakammaṃ nāma.
tika-s0402t:470_7: Sā hi vuttākārena balavatī javanasantāne guṇavisesayuttesu upakārānupakāravasappavattiyā āsevanālābhena
tika-s0402t:470_8: appavipākatāya ca paṭhamajavanacetanā itaradvayaṃ viya pavattasantānuparamāpekkhaṃ okāsalābhāpekkhañca
tika-s0402t:470_9: kammaṃ na hotīti idheva pupphamattaṃ viya pavattivipākamattaṃ phalaṃ deti.
tika-s0402t:470_10: Tathā asakkontanti kammassa vipākadānaṃ nāma upadhippayogādipaccayantarasamavāyeneva hotīti tadabhāvato tasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ dātuṃ asakkontaṃ.
tika-s0402t:470_12: na tassa vipāko ahosi atthi bhavissati cāti evaṃ veditabbaṃ kammaṃ.
tika-s0402t:471_2: Sā hi sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā vuttanayena paṭiladdhavisesā purimajavanacetanāhi laddhāsevanā ca samānā anantarattabhāve
tika-s0402t:472_0: Sati saṃsārappavattiyāti iminā asati saṃsārappavattiyaṃ ahosikammapakkhe tiṭṭhati vipaccanokāsassa abhāvatoti dīpeti.
tika-s0402t:472_3: Kusalaṃ vā hi hotu akusalaṃ vā,
tika-s0402t:472_4: yaṃ garukaṃ mātughātādikammaṃ vā mahaggatakammaṃ vā,
tika-s0402t:472_7: Yaṃ bahulanti yaṃ bahulaṃ abhiṇhaso kataṃ samāsevitaṃ.
tika-s0402t:472_10: āsannakāle kate pana vattabbameva natthīti āha “yaṃ pana kusalākusalesu āsannamaraṇe”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:473_0: Tesaṃ abhāveti tesaṃ yaṃgarukādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ kammānaṃ abhāve.
tika-s0402t:473_1: Yattha katthaci vipākaṃ detīti paṭisandhijanakavasena vipākaṃ deti.
tika-s0402t:473_6: tasmiṃ asati “kaṭattā vā panā”ti vuttaṃ purimajātīsu katakammaṃ vipaccati.
tika-s0402t:473_10: Tato mahatova pubbakatādi appañca bahulānussaraṇena vippaṭisārādijananato,
tika-s0402t:473_11: paṭipakkhassa aparipuṇṇatāya āraddhavipākassa kammassa kammasesassa vā aparapariyāyavedanīyassa aparikkhīṇatāya
tika-s0402t:473_12: santatiyā pariṇāmavisesatoti tehi tehi kāraṇehi āyūhitaphalaṃ paṭhamaṃ vipaccati.
tika-s0402t:474_3: Kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati,
tika-s0402t:474_4: pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ,
tika-s0402t:474_5: pacchā vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ,
tika-s0402t:474_6: maraṇakāle vāssa hoti micchādiṭṭhi samattā samādinnā,
tika-s0402t:474_7: tena so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjatī”ti –
tika-s0402t:475_5: yadidaṃ tassa tassa kammassa tena tena kāraṇena pubbāparavipākatā samatthīyati.
tika-s0402t:476_1: Pavattiṃ na janetīti pavattivipākaṃ na janeti.
tika-s0402t:476_2: Paṭhamanaye janakakammassa paṭisandhivipākamattasseva vuttattā tassa pavattivipākadāyakattampi anujānanto “aparo nayo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:476_4: Sukhadukkhasantānassa nāmarūpappabandhassa vā cirataraṃ pavattihetubhūtaṃ upatthambhakaṃ.
tika-s0402t:476_7: Upapīḷakaṃ sukhadukkhappabandhe pavattamāne saṇikaṃ saṇikaṃ hāpeti.
tika-s0402t:477_0: Vātakāḷako mahallako core ghātetuṃ na sakkotīti so kira mahallakakāle ekappahārena sīsaṃ chindituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0402t:477_1: dve tayo vāre paharanto manusse kilameti,
tika-s0402t:477_3: Anulomikaṃ khantiṃ paṭilabhitvāti sotāpattimaggassa orato anulomikaṃ khantiṃ labhitvā.
tika-s0402t:477_4: Taruṇavacchāya gāviyā madditvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpitoti ekā kira yakkhinī dhenuvesena āgantvā ure paharitvā māresi,
tika-s0402t:478_1: Kammassa upacchindanaṃ nāma tassa vipākappaṭibāhanamevāti āha “tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā”ti.
tika-s0402t:478_2: Tañca attano vipākuppattiyā okāsakaraṇanti vuttaṃ “attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karotī”ti.
tika-s0402t:478_3: Vipaccanāya katokāsaṃ kammaṃ vipakkammeva nāma hotīti āha “evaṃ pana kammena kate okāse taṃ vipākaṃ uppannaṃ nāma vuccatī”ti.
tika-s0402t:478_6: Upaghātakaṃ pana dubbalakammaṃ upacchinditvā attano vipākaṃ uppādetīti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-s0402t:478_9: Upaghātakakammaṃ pana upaghātetvā attano vipākassa okāsakaraṇena vipaccane sati janakameva siyā.
tika-s0402t:478_11: na kammaṃ patīti vipākasseva upaghātakatā yuttā viya dissati,
tika-s0402t:479_1: yasmiṃ kamme kate paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca vipākakaṭattārūpānaṃ uppatti hoti,
tika-s0402t:479_3: Yasmiṃ pana kate aññena janitassa iṭṭhassa vā aniṭṭhassa vā phalassa vibādhakavicchedakapaccayānuppattiyā
tika-s0402t:479_6: Janakena nibbattitaṃ kusalaphalaṃ vā akusalaphalaṃ vā yena paccanīkabhūtena rogadhātuvisamatādinimittatāya vibādhayati,
tika-s0402t:479_8: Yena pana kammunā janakasāmatthiyavasena ciratarappabandhārahampi samānaṃ phalaṃ vicchedakapaccayuppattiyā upahaññati vicchijjati,
tika-s0402t:480_0: Tattha keci dutiyassa kusalabhāvaṃ itthattamāgatassa appābādhadīghāyukatāsaṃvattanavasena,
tika-s0402t:481_4: Balavakammena hi nibbattaṃ pavatte upapīḷakaṃ āgantvā atthato evaṃ vadati nāma ‘sacāhaṃ paṭhamataraṃ jāneyyaṃ,
tika-s0402t:481_8: ahaṃ upapīḷakakammaṃ nāma taṃ pīḷetvā nirojaṃ niyūsaṃ kasaṭaṃ karissāmī’ti.
tika-s0402t:482_0: “Tattha dārakassa mātukucchiyaṃ nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya mātu assādo vā sukhaṃ vā na hoti,
tika-s0402t:482_3: Dārakassa pana mātukucchimhi nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya gehe bhogā udakaṃ patvā loṇaṃ viya rājādīnaṃ vasena nassanti,
tika-s0402t:482_16: dārako parihāraṃ alabhanto pīḷito nirojo niyūso kasaṭo hoti.
tika-s0402t:483_0: “Dīghāyukakammena pana nibbattassa upacchedakakammaṃ āgantvā āyuṃ chindati.
tika-s0402t:483_1: Yathā hi puriso aṭṭhusabhagamanaṃ katvā saraṃ khipeyya,
tika-s0402t:483_2: tamañño dhanuto muttamattaṃ muggarena paharitvā tattheva pāteyya,
tika-s0402t:483_3: evaṃ dīghāyukakammena nibbattassa upacchedakakammaṃ āyuṃ chindati.
tika-s0402t:483_11: Appabhogakulādīsu nibbattassa bhogasampadādikaraṇena upatthambhakakammaṃ upatthambhakakammaṃ nāma.
tika-s0402t:484_0: “Parittakammenapi nibbattaṃ etaṃ pavatte pāṇātipātādiviratikammaṃ āgantvā atthato evaṃ vadati nāma ‘sacāhaṃ paṭhamataraṃ jāneyyaṃ,
tika-s0402t:484_4: ahaṃ upatthambhakakammaṃ nāma upatthambhaṃ te karissāmī’ti upatthambhaṃ karoti.
tika-s0402t:485_0: “Tattha dārakassa mātukucchiyaṃ nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya mātāpitūnaṃ sukhameva sātameva hoti.
tika-s0402t:485_4: Dārakassa pana mātukucchimhi nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya gehe bhogānaṃ pamāṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0402t:485_5: nidhikumbhiyo puratopi pacchatopi gehaṃ parivaṭṭamānā pavisanti.
tika-s0402t:485_11: tāvakālikaṃ vā dinnaṃ dhanaṃ acoditā sayameva āharitvā denti,
tika-s0402t:486_0: Ettha vibādhūpaghātā nāma kusalavipākamhi na yuttāti adhippāyena “dve akusalānevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:486_1: Devadattādīnaṃ pana nāgādīnaṃ ito anuppadinnayāpanakapetānañca narakādīsu akusalavipākūpatthambhanūpapīḷanūpaghātakāni
tika-s0402t:486_3: Evañca katvā yā bahūsu ānantariyesu katesu ekena gahitappaṭisandhikassa itaresaṃ tassa anubalappadāyitā vuttā,
tika-s0402t:487_0: Suttantapariyāyena ekādasa kammāni vibhajitvā idāni abhidhammapariyāpannaṃ dassento “atthekaccāni pāpakāni
tika-s0402t:487_2: Tattha gatisampattipaṭibāḷhānīti gatisampattiyā paṭibāhitāni nivāritāni paṭisedhitāni.
tika-s0402t:487_4: Tattha ca gatisampattīti sampannagati devaloko ca manussaloko ca.
tika-s0402t:488_1: Tattha aniṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanārahe kamme vijjamāneyevāti iminā aniṭṭhārammaṇānubhavananimmittakassa pāpakammassa sabbhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0402t:488_3: Ekaccassa hi aniṭṭhārammaṇānubhavananimittaṃ bahupāpakammaṃ vijjamānampi gativipattiyaṃ ṭhitasseva vipaccati.
tika-s0402t:488_4: Yadi pana so ekena kalyāṇakammena gatisampattiyaṃ devesu vā manussesu vā nibbatteyya,
tika-s0402t:488_6: ekantaṃ kusalassevāti taṃ kammaṃ gatisampattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati.
tika-s0402t:488_11: Lañjaṃ detīti evaṃ me bādhataṃ paresaṃ vase na hotīti deti.
tika-s0402t:489_0: Abhidhammanayena soḷasa kammāni vibhajitvā paṭisambhidāmaggapariyāyena dvādasa kammāni vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “aparānipī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:489_1: Tattha atītabhavesu katassa kammassa atītabhavesuyeva vipakkavipākaṃ gahetvā “ahosi kammaṃ ahosi kammavipāko”ti
tika-s0402t:489_5: Tattha paṭisandhiṃ janesīti iminā ca paṭisandhidāyakassa kammassa pavattivipākadāyitāpi vuttā hoti.
tika-s0402t:489_7: Tasseva atītassa kammassa diṭṭhadhammavedanīyassa upapajjavedanīyassa ca paccayavekallena atītabhavesuyeva avipakkavipākañca,
tika-s0402t:489_9: gahetvā “ahosi kammaṃ nāhosi kammavipāko”tipi vuttanti āha “yaṃ pana vipākavāraṃ na labhī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:490_0: Atītasseva kammassa avipakkavipākassa paccuppannabhave paccayasampattiyā vipaccamānaṃ vipākaṃ gahetvā
tika-s0402t:490_1: “ahosi kammaṃ atthi kammavipāko”ti vuttanti āha “yaṃ pana atīte āyūhita”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:490_2: Atītasseva kammassa atikkantavipākakālassa ca paccuppannabhave parinibbāyantassa ca avipaccamānavipākaṃ
tika-s0402t:490_3: gahetvā “ahosi kammaṃ natthi kammavipāko”ti vuttanti āha “aladdhavipākavāra”ntiādi.
tika-s0402t:490_4: Atītasseva kammassa vipākārahassa avipakkavipākassa anāgatabhave paccayasampattiyā vipaccitabbaṃ vipākaṃ
tika-s0402t:490_5: gahetvā “ahosi kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipāko”ti vuttanti dassento “yaṃ pana atīte āyūhita”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:490_6: Atītasseva kammassa atikkantavipākakālassa ca anāgatabhave parinibbāyitabbassa avipaccitabbavipākañca
tika-s0402t:490_7: gahetvā “ahosi kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipāko”ti vuttanti āha “yaṃ anāgate vipākavāraṃ na labhissatī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:490_8: Evaṃ tāva atītakammaṃ atītapaccuppannānāgatavipākāvipākavasena chadhā dassitaṃ.
tika-s0402t:491_0: Idāni paccuppannabhave katassa diṭṭhadhammavedanīyassa idheva vipaccamānaṃ vipākaṃ gahetvā “atthi kammaṃ
tika-s0402t:491_1: atthi kammavipāko”ti vuttanti dassento “yaṃ pana etarahi āyūhita”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:491_2: Yaṃ pana etarahi vipākavāraṃ na labhatītiādinā tasseva paccuppannassa kammassa paccayavekallena idha
tika-s0402t:491_3: avipaccamānañca diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyantassa idha avipaccamānañca vipākaṃ gahetvā “atthi kammaṃ
tika-s0402t:491_5: Paccuppannasseva kammassa upapajjavedanīyassa aparapariyāyavedanīyassa ca anāgatabhave vipaccitabbavipākaṃ
tika-s0402t:491_6: gahetvā “atthi kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipāko”ti vuttanti āha “yaṃ pana etarahi āyūhitaṃ anāgate vipākavāraṃ
tika-s0402t:491_8: Paccuppannasseva kammassa upapajjavedanīyassa paccayavekallena anāgatabhave avipaccitabbañca anāgatabhave
tika-s0402t:491_9: parinibbāyitabbassa aparapariyāyavedanīyassa avipaccitabbañca vipākaṃ gahetvā “atthi kammaṃ na bhavissati
tika-s0402t:491_10: kammavipāko”ti vuttanti āha “yaṃ pana vipākavāraṃ na labhissatī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:492_0: Evañca paccuppannakammaṃ paccuppannānāgatavipākāvipākavasena catudhā dassetvā idāni anāgatabhave katassa
tika-s0402t:492_1: kammassa anāgate vipaccitabbavipākaṃ gahetvā “bhavissati kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipāko”ti vuttanti dassento
tika-s0402t:492_3: Tasseva anāgatassa kammassa paccayavekallena avipaccitabbañca anāgatabhave parinibbāyitabbassa avipaccitabbañca
tika-s0402t:492_4: vipākaṃ gahetvā “bhavissati kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipāko”ti vuttanti āha “yaṃ pana vipākavāraṃ na
tika-s0402t:493_0: Idāni sabbesu yathāvuttappabhedesu kammesu yāni abhidhammanayena vibhattāni soḷasa kammāni,
tika-s0402t:493_1: yāni ca paṭisambhidāmaggapariyāyena vibhattāni dvādasa kammāni,
tika-s0402t:493_2: tāni sabbāni suttantikapariyāyena vibhattesu ekādasavidhesuyeva kammesu antogadhāni,
tika-s0402t:493_3: tāni ca diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaupapajjavedanīyaaparapariyāyavedanīyesu tīsuyeva antogadhānīti dassento “iti imāni cevā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:493_4: Tattha attano ṭhānā osakkitvāti attano yathāvuttadvādasasoḷasappabhedasaṅkhātaṭṭhānato parihāpetvā,
tika-s0402t:493_5: taṃ taṃ pabhedaṃ hitvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:493_6: Ekādasa kammāniyeva bhavantīti taṃsabhāvānaṃyeva kammānaṃ dvādasadhā soḷasadhā ca vibhajitvā vuttattā evamāha.
tika-s0402t:493_7: Yasmā ekādasadhā vuttakammāni diṭṭhadhammavedanīyāni vā siyuṃ upapajjavedanīyāni vā aparapariyāyavedanīyāni vā,
tika-s0402t:494_0: Tesaṃ saṅkamanaṃ natthīti tesaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādīnaṃ saṅkamanaṃ natthi,
tika-s0402t:494_6: majjhe pañca aparapariyāyavedanīyamevāti natthi tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṅgaho,
tika-s0402t:494_11: apare vā pariyāye”ti tayo vikappā dassitā.
tika-s0402t:494_13: Tattha “diṭṭhe vā dhamme”ti satthā na vadeyyāti asati niyāme na vadeyya.
tika-s0402t:495_0: Sukkapakkheti “alobho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāyā”tiādinā āgate kusalapakkhe.
tika-s0402t:495_2: Tālavatthu viya katanti yathā tāle chinne ṭhitaṭṭhāne kiñci na hoti,
tika-s0402t:495_3: evaṃ kamme pahīne kiñci na hotīti attho.
tika-s0402t:495_4: Tālavatthūti vā matthakacchinno tālo vutto pattaphalamakulasūciādīnaṃ abhāvato.
tika-s0402t:495_10: Appavattikatakālo viyāti bījānaṃ sabbaso appavattiyā katakālo viya.
tika-s0402t:496_1: Aññaṃ vatthu natthīti aññaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ natthi.
tika-s0402t:496_2: Sugatisaññitāpi heṭṭhimantena saṅkhāradukkhato anapagatattā duggatiyo evāti vuttaṃ “sabbā duggatiyo”ti,
tika-s0402t:499_5: Tattha bhagavato nisajjāya avicchinnāya evāti attho.
tika-s0402t:499_7: Hatthato hatthaṃ gatattāti āḷavakassa yakkhassa hatthato sammāsambuddhassa hatthaṃ,
tika-s0402t:500_2: Khurantarehi kaddamo uggantvā tiṭṭhatīti kaddamo khurantarehi uggantvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0402t:500_3: Catūhi disāhi vāyanto vāto verambhoti vuccati verambhavātasadisattā.
tika-s0402t:501_1: Khobhayamānāti kilesakhobhavasena khobhayamānā cittaṃ saṅkhobhaṃ karontā.
tika-s0402t:501_5: Bhavati hi taṃsadise tabbohāro yathā “sā eva tittirikā,
tika-s0402t:501_10: Icchitālābhena rajanīyesu vā niruddhesu vatthūsu domanassuppattiyā dosapariḷāhānaṃ sambhavo veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:502_2: Āsattiyo vuccanti taṇhāyo tattha tattha āsañjanaṭṭhena.
tika-s0402t:505_1: Chaṭṭhe devadūtānīti liṅgavipallāsaṃ katvā vuttanti āha “devadūtā”ti,
tika-s0402t:505_3: tasmā napuṃsakaliṅgavasena pāḷiyaṃ vuttassa pulliṅgavasena atthadassanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0402t:505_4: Devoti maccūti abhibhavanaṭṭhena sattānaṃ attano vase vattāpanato maccurājā “devo”ti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:505_8: “Tassa dūtā”ti vatvā idānissa dūte tesaṃ dūtabhāvañca vibhāvetuṃ “jiṇṇabyādhimatā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:505_9: Tena codanatthena devassa dūtā viyāti devadūtāti dasseti.
tika-s0402t:505_11: tuvaṃ tassa kese gahetvā mā vissajjehī”ti maccudevassa āṇākarā dūtā viyāti hi dūtāti vuccanti.
tika-s0402t:506_0: Idāni saddhātabbaṭṭhena devā viya dūtāti devadūtāti dassento “devā viya dūtā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:506_1: Tattha alaṅkatappaṭiyattāyāti idaṃ attano dibbānubhāvaṃ āvikatvā ṭhitāyāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:506_2: Devatāya byākaraṇasadisameva hoti na cirasseva jarābyādhimaraṇassa sambhavato.
tika-s0402t:506_4: Te hi carimabhave bodhisattānaṃ jiṇṇādibhedaṃ dassenti,
tika-s0402t:506_5: tasmā antimabhavikabodhisattānaṃ visuddhidevehi upaṭṭhāpitabhāvaṃ upādāya tadaññesampi tehi anupaṭṭhāpitānampi
tika-s0402t:506_8: Tatoyeva hi te visuddhidevānaṃ dūtā vuttā.
tika-s0402t:507_0: Kasmā āraddhanti kevalaṃ devadūte eva sarūpato adassetvāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0402t:507_1: Devānaṃ dūtānaṃ dassanūpāyattā tathā vuttanti dassento “devadūtā…pe…
tika-s0402t:508_0: Ekacce therāti andhakādike viññāṇavādino ca sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0402t:508_1: Nerayike niraye pālenti tato niggantuṃ appadānavasena rakkhantīti nirayapālā.
tika-s0402t:508_2: Atha vā nirayapālatāya nerayikānaṃ nirayadukkhena pariyonaddhāya alaṃ samatthāti nirayapālā.
tika-s0402t:508_4: Paṭisedhitamevāti “atthi nirayesu nirayapālā atthi ca kāraṇikā”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme paṭisedhitameva.
tika-s0402t:508_7: Sati hi kāraṇike kammakāraṇāya bhavitabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0402t:508_12: yadi tāva nerayikā nirayasaṃvattaniyena kammena nibbattā,
tika-s0402t:508_14: tathā sati aññesaṃ nerayikānaṃ ghātanāya asamatthā siyuṃ,
tika-s0402t:508_15: “ime nerayikā ime nirayapālā”ti vavatthānañca na siyā.
tika-s0402t:508_17: tehi samānarūpabalappamāṇehi itaresaṃ bhayasantāsā na siyuṃ.
tika-s0402t:508_21: Nirayūpapattisaṃvattaniyakammato hi aññeneva kammunā te nibbattanti rakkhasajātikattā.
tika-s0402t:511_4: ayomayāya pana ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya nirayabhūmiyā parikkamamānā kathaṃ dāhadukkhaṃ nānubhavantīti?
tika-s0402t:511_6: Yathā hi iddhimanto cetovasippattā mahāmoggallānādayo nerayike anukampantā iddhibalena nirayabhūmiṃ upagatā dāhadukkhena na bādhīyanti,
tika-s0402t:512_2: Tathārūpena hi kammunā te nibbattā yathā nirayadukkhena abādhitā eva hutvā nerayike ghātenti,
tika-s0402t:512_3: na cettakena bāhiravisayābhāvo yujjati iṭṭhāniṭṭhatāya paccekaṃ dvārapurisesupi vibhattasabhāvattā.
tika-s0402t:512_4: Tathā hi ekaccassa dvārassa purisassa ca iṭṭhaṃ ekaccassa aniṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0402t:512_5: ekaccassa ca aniṭṭhaṃ ekaccassa iṭṭhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:512_6: Evañca katvā yadeke vadanti “natthi kammavasena tejasā parūpatāpana”ntiādi,
tika-s0402t:512_8: Yaṃ pana vadanti “anerayikānaṃ tesaṃ kathaṃ tattha sambhavo”ti niraye nerayikānaṃ yātanāsabbhāvabhāvato.
tika-s0402t:512_9: Nerayikasattayātanāyoggañhi attabhāvaṃ nibbattentaṃ kammaṃ tādisanikanti vināmitaṃ nirayaṭṭhāne eva nibbatteti.
tika-s0402t:512_10: Te hi nerayikehi adhikatarabalārohapariṇāhā ativiya bhayānakadassanā kurūratarapayogā ca honti.
tika-s0402t:512_11: Eteneva tattha nerayikānaṃ vibādhakakākasunakhādīnampi nibbattiyā atthibhāvo saṃvaṇṇitoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:513_0: Kathamaññagatikehi aññagatikabādhananti ca na vattabbaṃ aññatthāpi tathā dassanato.
tika-s0402t:513_1: Yaṃ paneke vadanti “asattasabhāvā eva niraye nirayapālā niraye sunakhādayo cā”ti,
tika-s0402t:513_3: Na hi kāci atthi tādisī dhammappavatti,
tika-s0402t:513_5: sampatisattehi appayojitā ca atthakiccaṃ sādhentī diṭṭhapubbā.
tika-s0402t:513_6: Petānaṃ pānīyanivārakānaṃ daṇḍādihatthānañca purisānaṃ sabbhāve asattabhāve ca visesakāraṇaṃ natthīti tādisānaṃ sabbhāve kiṃ pāpakānaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:513_8: Tathā hi supine āhārūpabhogādinā na atthasiddhi,
tika-s0402t:513_10: Idhāpi kammavipākassa acinteyyabhāvatoti ce? Taṃ na,
tika-s0402t:513_13: vuttanayena pāḷito ca tesaṃ sattabhāvo eva siddho.
tika-s0402t:513_14: Sakkā hi vattuṃ sattasaṅkhātā nirayapālasaññitā dhammappavatti sābhisandhikaparūpaghāti atthakiccasabbhāvato ojāhārādi rakkhasasantati viya.
tika-s0402t:513_15: Abhisandhipubbakatā cettha na sakkā paṭikkhipituṃ tathā tathā abhisandhiyā ghātanato.
tika-s0402t:513_17: Ye pana vadanti “bhūtavisesā eva te vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivisesavanto bheravākārā narakapālāti samaññaṃ labhantī”ti,
tika-s0402t:513_18: tadasiddhaṃ ujukameva pāḷiyaṃ “atthi niraye nirayapālā”ti vādassa patiṭṭhāpitattā.
tika-s0402t:514_0: Apica yathā ariyavinaye narakapālānaṃ bhūtamattatā asiddhā,
tika-s0402t:514_1: tathā paññattimattavādinopi bhūtamattatā asiddhā sabbaso rūpadhammānaṃ atthibhāvasseva appaṭijānanato.
tika-s0402t:514_2: Na hi tassa bhūtāni nāma paramatthato santi.
tika-s0402t:514_6: Evaṃ attheva niraye nirayapālāti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:514_7: Sati ca nesaṃ sabbhāve asatipi bāhire visaye narake viya desādiniyamo hotīti vādo na sijjhati,
tika-s0402t:514_8: sati eva pana bāhire visaye desādiniyamoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:515_0: Devadūtasarāpanavasena satte yathūpacite puññakamme yameti niyametīti yamo.
tika-s0402t:515_4: Vemānikapetā hi kaṇhasukkavasena missakaṃ kammaṃ katvā vinipātikadevatā viya sukkena kammunā paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti.
tika-s0402t:515_9: tesaṃ maggādhigamato paṭṭhāya puññaphalameva uppajjatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:515_10: Apuññaphalaṃ pubbe viya kaṭukaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0402t:515_11: manussattabhāve ṭhitānaṃ viya mudukameva hotīti apare.
tika-s0402t:515_12: Dhammiko rājāti ettha tassa dhammikabhāvo dhammadevaputtassa viya uppattiniyato dhammatāvasena veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:516_2: attano pucchaṃ uddissa paṭivacanaṃ dāpento pucchati.
tika-s0402t:516_3: Parassa hi adhippāyaṃ ñātuṃ icchanto tadupagaṃ payogaṃ karonto pucchati nāma.
tika-s0402t:517_1: Ekacco daharakālato paṭṭhāya paṇḍurogādinā abhibhūtakāyatāya jiṇṇasadiso hoti,
tika-s0402t:517_2: ayaṃ na tathā jarāpattiyā jiṇṇoti dasseti.
tika-s0402t:517_3: Gopānasī viya vaṅkanti vaṅkagopānasī viya vaṅkaṃ.
tika-s0402t:517_4: Na hi vaṅkabhāvassa nidassanatthaṃ avaṅkagopānasī gayhati.
tika-s0402t:517_7: Daṇḍapaṭisaraṇanti ṭhānagamanesu daṇḍo paṭisaraṇaṃ etassāti daṇḍapaṭisaraṇaṃ tena vinā vattituṃ asamatthattā.
tika-s0402t:517_10: Sabbaso kimihataṃ viya mahākhallāṭaṃ sīsamassāti mahākhallāṭasīsaṃ.
tika-s0402t:517_14: Sabhāvo ca nāma tejodhātuyā uṇhatā viya na kadāci vigacchatīti āha “aparimutto jarāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:518_1: vācāya avadantopi atthāpattito evaṃ vadanto viya hoti viññūnanti attho.
tika-s0402t:518_8: Ettha ca na kho panāhantiādi jarāya devadūtabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:519_0: Dutiyaṃ devadūtanti etthāpi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:521_1: ko na labhatī”ti nirayupagasseva vasenāyaṃ vicāraṇāti “yena tāva bahu pāpaṃ kata”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:521_2: Bahu pāpaṃ katanti bahuso pāpaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0402t:521_5: Mahatthopi hi bahusaddo dissati “bahu vata kataṃ assā”tiādīsu,
tika-s0402t:521_7: So garukaṃ bahulaṃ vā pāpaṃ katvā ṭhito niraye nibbattatiyeva,
tika-s0402t:521_17: Attano dhammatāyāti parehi asāriyamānepi attano dhammatāya saranti.
tika-s0402t:521_18: Te hi pāpakammassa dubbalabhāvato katūpacitassa ca okāsārahakusalakammassa balavabhāvato attano dhammatāyapi saranti.
tika-s0402t:521_19: Sāriyamānāpīti “idaṃ nāma tayā kataṃ puññakamma”nti parehi sāriyamānāpi.
tika-s0402t:522_1: Rattapaṭenāti rattavaṇṇena paṭena pūjesi paṭākaṃ katvā.
tika-s0402t:522_3: Attanā pūjitapaṭaṃ anussarīti tadā paṭākāya vātappahārasadde nimittassa gahitattā “mayā tadā ākāsacetiye
tika-s0402t:523_3: Tīhipi na sarati balavato pāpakammena byāmohito.
tika-s0402t:523_4: Tuṇhī ahosīti “kammāraho aya”nti tattha paṭikāraṃ apassanto tuṇhī ahosi.
tika-s0402t:524_2: Yathā ratho sabbaso pajjalito hoti ayomayo,
tika-s0402t:524_3: evaṃ yugādayopissa pajjalitā sajotibhūtā eva hontīti āha “saddhiṃ…pe…
tika-s0402t:525_6: upādānanti āha “jātiyā ca maraṇassa cha kāraṇabhūte”ti.
tika-s0402t:525_9: Sakalavaṭṭadukkhaṃ atikkantāti carimacittanirodhena vaṭṭadukkhassa kilesānampi asambhavato sabbaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ atikkantā.
tika-s0402t:528_1: Sattame amā saha vattanti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kicceti amaccā, sahitā.
tika-s0402t:528_7: Aṭṭha vāreti ekasmiṃ aḍḍhamāse catukkhattuṃ tathā itarasminti evaṃ aṭṭha vāre.
tika-s0402t:528_10: Puññaṃ karontā hi sattā jāgaronti nāma kātabbakiccappasutattā,
tika-s0402t:528_12: Cātuddasiuposathassa anugamanaṃ viya pannarasiuposathassa paccuggamanaṃ na labbhati divasābhāvato.
tika-s0402t:529_1: Taṃ upanissāyāti tā tā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo upanissāya.
tika-s0402t:530_0: Niccaṃ nibaddhaṃ uposatho saṃvacchare saṃvacchare paṭi paṭi haritabbato pavattetabbato pāṭihāriyapakkho nāma.
tika-s0402t:531_4: Kāraṇena jānitvāti vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya cattāri ariyasaccāni jānitvā.
tika-s0402t:532_1: yadidaṃ sammadeva uposathānuṭṭhāna”nti evaṃ uposathakammassa guṇaṃ jānanto.
tika-s0402t:532_4: Sakkā pahitatto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā khīṇāsavasampattiṃ pāpuṇituṃ.
tika-s0402t:535_17: Pokkharaṇisaddo cettha tādise jalāsaye niruḷho daṭṭhabbo paṅkajādisaddā viya.
tika-s0402t:536_1: saddo ativiya saṇhe sukhume mahagghavatthe niruḷho,
tika-s0402t:536_6: “Itaresupi eseva nayo”ti vatvā tadeva nesaṃ arahataṃ dassetuṃ “tattha hemantiko”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:536_11: Yantaṃ parivattetvāti yathāpayojitaṃ yantaṃ pāsāṇāropanatthañceva puna tesaṃ vissajjanatthañca parivattetvā.
tika-s0402t:537_8: Gāvutassa catuttho bhāgo kosotipi vuccati dvisahassadaṇḍappamāṇaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:538_0: Sabbaṭṭhānānīti mahāpurisassa tāni tāni sabbāni vasanaṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0402t:538_2: Na uppilāvitabhāvatthanti uppilāvitabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ na kathesīti attho.
tika-s0402t:538_5: Attānaṃ atikkamitvāti attano jarāpattiṃ acintetvā aṭṭīyati.
tika-s0402t:538_6: Na panesa maggena pahīno tadā maggassa anadhigatattā.
tika-s0402t:539_1: Evaṃ jigucchāvihārenāti evaṃ sakalasseva vaṭṭadukkhassa jigucchanavihārena viharantassa.
tika-s0402t:539_3: Paraṃ ajigucchamānoti karuṇāyanena evaṃ paraṃ ajigucchanto.
tika-s0402t:539_5: Ussāho ahūti caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyameva catubbidhasammappadhānavīriyañca ahosi,
tika-s0402t:542_1: Dasame abhibhavitvā pavattanaṭṭhena adhipati yaṃ kiñci jeṭṭhakaṃ na kārakaṃ attānaṃ adhipatīti katvā attā eva adhipati,
tika-s0402t:542_5: So ca kho iddhividhādiguṇavisesayutto adhippeto adhipatibhāvassa adhippetattā.
tika-s0402t:542_9: Sampattibhavassa hetūti taṃtaṃsampattibhavassa tattha ca abhivuddhiyā hetu.
tika-s0402t:543_5: Nimmalaṃ katvāti rāgādimalānaṃ apanayanena malarahitaṃ katvā.
tika-s0402t:549_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame sammukho bhavati yena so sammukhībhāvo,
tika-s0402t:549_5: Dve dhammā sulabhā bāhirattā yathāsakaṃ paccayasamavāyena labbhanato.
tika-s0402t:552_2: cittassa malīnasabhāvāpādanato vigataṃ macchariyamalaṃ etthāti vigatamacchariyamalaṃ.
tika-s0402t:552_3: Gedhābhāvena koci kiñci dentopi tattha āsattiṃ na vissajjeti,
tika-s0402t:553_1: bhante”ti vatvā ayaṃ maṃ uccato vadatīti cinteyyāti puna “nātiuccā tumhe”ti āha,
tika-s0402t:553_5: Bhūmiyaṃ lekhaṃ likhanto acchīti paṭhamaṃ mañce nipajjitvā uṭṭhāya bhūmiyaṃ lekhaṃ likhanto acchi “akhīṇāsavoti maññanā hotū”ti.
tika-s0402t:553_6: Tathā hi rājā khīṇāsavassa nāma…pe… nivatti.
tika-s0402t:553_8: Silācetiyaṭṭhānanti thūpārāmassa ca mahācetiyassa ca antare silāya katacetiyaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:554_2: Dhammassavanantarāya bahūnaṃ saggamaggappaṭilābhantarāyo bhaveyyāti adhippāyena “dhammassavanantarāyaṃ na karissāmī”ti cintesi.
tika-s0402t:554_13: Dhammakathanadivase dhammakathikānaṃ akilamanatthaṃ saddhā upāsakā siniddhabhojanaṃ madhupānakañca denti
tika-s0402t:557_4: so evāti āha “tayo atthe tīṇi kāraṇānī”ti.
tika-s0402t:557_5: Dhammadesanā nāma ukkaṭṭhaniddesena catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ pakāsanāti āha “catusaccadhammaṃ pakāsetī”ti.
tika-s0402t:557_6: Aṭṭhakathaṃ ñāṇena paṭisaṃvedīti pāḷipadānaṃ atthaṃ vivaraṇañāṇena paṭi paṭi saṃvedanasīlo “ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho”ti.
tika-s0402t:557_8: Pāḷidhammaṃ paṭisaṃvedīti pāḷigatiṃ pāḷiṃ padavivaraṇaṃ paṭi paṭi saṃvedanasīlo.
tika-s0402t:560_1: Catutthe pavattinīti yāva adhippetatthanigamanā avicchedena pavattinī.
tika-s0402t:563_10: iminā damūpasamenā”ti āgatattā damoti vuttā khantipi.
tika-s0402t:563_11: Āḷavake āḷavakasutte “saccā damā cāgā”ti evaṃ vuttā paññāpi imasmiṃ sutte “damo”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-s0402t:563_12: Rakkhanaṃ gopanaṃ paṭijaggananti mātāpitūnaṃ manussāmanussakatūpaddavato rakkhanaṃ,
tika-s0402t:564_0: Idha imesaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ ṭhānānaṃ karaṇenāti imasmiṃ sutte āgatānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ṭhānānaṃ karaṇena nibbattanena. Etāni…pe…
tika-s0402t:564_1: kāraṇānīti mātupaṭṭhānaṃ pitupaṭṭhānanti etāni dve uttamapurisānaṃ kāraṇāni.
tika-s0402t:567_1: Chaṭṭhe lokiyalokuttaramissakanti ettha “manussā puññaṃ pasavantī”ti avisesena vuttattā bhāvanāmayassapi
tika-s0402t:570_1: Sattame samecca sambhūya paccayehi kataṃ saṅkhataṃ.
tika-s0402t:570_7: Sā panassa avatthā uppādāvatthāya bhinnāti katvā aññathattaṃ jarāti ca vuttā.
tika-s0402t:570_11: tasmā uppādāvatthāya bhinnā bhaṅgābhimukhāvatthā jarāti veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:570_14: Yathā hi tasseva dhammassa uppādāvatthāya bhinnā bhaṅgāvatthā icchitā,
tika-s0402t:570_19: Na hi uppajjamāno bhijjatīti sakkā viññātunti.
tika-s0402t:571_1: Yadi evaṃ maggaphaladhammā kathanti āha “maggaphalāni panā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:571_6: Yathā hi uppādasaṅkhātena vikārena uppādakkhaṇo paricchinno,
tika-s0402t:571_13: Paricchinnanti ettha uppādavayehi tāva saṅkhataṃ paricchinnaṃ hotu,
tika-s0402t:571_14: jarāya pana taṃ kathaṃ paricchinnanti vuccati?
tika-s0402t:571_17: Saṅkhataṃ dhammajātaṃ paricchinnaṃ tabbantaṃ dhammajātaṃ saṅkhatanti paññāyati evaṃ tesaṃ abhāvena nibbānametanti lakkhitabbato sañjānitabbato.
tika-s0402t:574_3: Yathā uppādādīnaṃ bhāvena saṅkhatadhammajātaṃ saṅkhatanti paññāyati,
tika-s0402t:574_4: evaṃ tesaṃ abhāvena nibbānaṃ asaṅkhatanti paññāyati.
tika-s0402t:577_6: Gāmaṃ gāmūpacārañca ṭhapetvā sabbaṃ araññanti āha “araññasminti agāmakaṭṭhāne”ti.
tika-s0402t:580_6: Tāsaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ adhivāsanāya pahātabbadukkhavedanānaṃ pajahanaṃ nāma khamanamevāti āha “khamanatthāyā”ti.
tika-s0402t:583_2: Balavacoroti ca mahāthāmatāya mahāparivāratāya mahācoriyakammasamatthatāya ca veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:583_4: Taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ pakkhipitvāti taṃ taṃ akaraṇameva kāraṇaṃ katvā tappaṭibaddhāya kathāya pakkhipitvā.
tika-s0402t:583_5: Atthaṃ kathayissantīti tassa tassa atthañca kathayissanti.
tika-s0402t:583_8: Antaṃ gahetvā ṭhitadiṭṭhiyāti tameva sassatādiantaṃ gahetvā avissajjetvā ṭhitadiṭṭhiyā.
tika-s0402t:590_8: Tatiyaṃ vayaṃ anuppattāti tato eva pacchimaṃ vayaṃ anuppattā.
tika-s0402t:590_9: Akatabhayaparittāṇāti ettha bhayaparittāṇanti duggatibhayato parittāyakaṃ puññaṃ,
tika-s0402t:590_14: kiṃ kena upanīyatīti āha “ayañhi jātiyā jaraṃ upanīyatī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:590_17: atha kho tato paraṃ jaraṃ pāpīyati,
tika-s0402t:594_0: 53. Dutiye bhajitabbaṭṭhena paresaṃ bhājitabbaṭṭhena bhājanaṃ, bhaṇḍakaṃ.
tika-s0402t:597_1: Tatiye yesaṃ rāgādīnaṃ appahānena purisassa attabyābādhādīnaṃ sambhavo,
tika-s0402t:597_2: pahānena asambhavoti evaṃ rāgādīnaṃ pahāyako ariyadhammo mahānubhāvatāya mahānisaṃsatāya ca sāmaṃ passitabboti sandiṭṭhiko.
tika-s0402t:597_3: Iminā nayena sesesu padesupi yathārahaṃ nīharitvā vattabbo.
tika-s0402t:600_1: Pañcame na kālantare pattabbanti yadā saccappaṭivedho,
tika-s0402t:600_2: tadā eva laddhabbattā na kālantare pattabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:603_5: Ekanteneva adhammoti ayonisomanasikārahetukattā anatthahetutāya ca niyameneva adhammo.
tika-s0402t:603_6: Na adhammarāgoti adhippetoti paraparikkhāresu rāgo viya na mahāsāvajjoti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:603_7: Tathā hi sakasakaparikkhāravisayo rāgo visamalobho viya na ekantato apāyuppattijanako.
tika-s0402t:603_9: Lobhassa samakālo nāma natthi kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ viya ayonisomanasikārasamuṭṭhānattā.
tika-s0402t:603_12: Tathā hi taṃsamuṭṭhāno payogo micchācāroti na vuccati.
tika-s0402t:604_5: Salākāmattameva sampajjatīti vaḍḍhitvā gabbhaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthaṃ sampajjati.
tika-s0402t:607_2: Dhammo nāma kathitakathā “atthaṃ dahati vidahatī”ti katvā.
tika-s0402t:607_3: Anudhammo nāma paṭikathanaṃ “taṃ anugato dhammo”ti katvā.
tika-s0402t:608_1: Panthe ṭhatvā paresaṃ sāpateyyaṃ chindanato panthadūhanacoro.
tika-s0402t:610_7: Khettavinicchayasavanenāti “imehi sīlādiguṇasampannā sadevake loke puññassa khettaṃ,
tika-s0402t:610_8: tadañño na khetta”nti evaṃ khettavinicchayasavanena rahitā.
tika-s0402t:613_2: Garahā muccissatīti mayi evaṃ kathente samaṇo gotamo kiñci kathessati,
tika-s0402t:613_3: evaṃ me vacanamattampi na laddhanti ayaṃ garahā muccissatīti.
tika-s0402t:614_3: “Dvīhipi pakkhehī”ti vatvā te pakkhe sarūpato dassento “mātito ca pitito cā”ti āha.
tika-s0402t:614_4: Tesaṃ pakkhānaṃ vasenassa sujātataṃ dassetuṃ “yassa mātā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:614_6: idha pana sā orasaputtavaseneva icchitāti dassetuṃ “saṃsuddhagahaṇiko”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:614_9: Yathābhuttassa āhārassa vipācanavasena gaṇhanato achaḍḍanato gahaṇī,
tika-s0402t:615_3: tasmā “yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā pitāmahadvandā”ti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:615_4: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana dvandaṃ aggahetvā “yuganti āyuppamāṇaṃ vuccatī”ti vuttaṃ. Yuga-
tika-s0402t:615_10: Jātivādenāti hetumhi karaṇavacananti dassetuṃ “kena kāraṇenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:615_12: pitāmahayugā”ti etena brāhmaṇassa yonidosābhāvo dassito saṃsuddhagahaṇikatākittanato.
tika-s0402t:615_14: Saṃsuddhajātikāpi hi sattā kiriyāparādhena khepaṃ pāpuṇanti.
tika-s0402t:615_16: Ayuttasaṃsaggañhi paṭicca sattā suddhajātikā kiriyāparādharahitāpi akkosaṃ labhanti.
tika-s0402t:616_3: Mante dhāretīti yathāadhīte mante asammuṭṭhe katvā hadaye ṭhapeti.
tika-s0402t:617_1: Sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānanti ettha vacanīyavācakabhāvena atthaṃ saddañca khaṇḍati bhindati vibhajja dassetīti nikhaṇḍu,
tika-s0402t:617_6: taṃ vā anavasesapariyādānato gamento pūretīti keṭubhaṃ.
tika-s0402t:617_9: Nidassanamattañcetaṃ anekesampi atthānaṃ ekasaddavacanīyatāvibhāvanavasenapi tassa ganthassa pavattattā.
tika-s0402t:617_10: Vacībhedādilakkhaṇā kiriyā kappīyati vikappīyati etenāti kiriyākappo,
tika-s0402t:617_14: Ṭhānakaraṇādivibhāgato nibbacanavibhāgato ca akkharā pabhedīyanti etehīti akkharappabhedā,
tika-s0402t:618_3: teyeva vā vede padaso kāyatīti padako.
tika-s0402t:618_6: Taṃ taṃ saddaṃ tadatthañca byākaroti byācikkhati etenāti byākaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:618_8: Āyatiṃ hitaṃ tena loko na yatati na īhatīti lokāyataṃ.
tika-s0402t:618_9: Tañhi ganthaṃ nissāya sattā puññakiriyāya cittampi na uppādenti.
tika-s0402t:619_0: Asīti mahāsāvakāti aññāsikoṇḍañño, vappo, bhaddiyo, mahānāmo, assaji, nāḷako, yaso, vimalo, subāhu, puṇṇaji,
tika-s0402t:619_13: kaṅkhārevato, ānando, nandako, bhagu, nandiyo, kimilo, bhaddiyo, rāhulo, sīvali, upāli, dabbo, upaseno,
tika-s0402t:619_23: raṭṭhapālo, vaṅgīso, sabhiyo, selo, upavāṇo, meghiyo, sāgato, nāgito,
tika-s0402t:619_30: tissametteyyo, puṇṇako, mettagu, dhotako, upasīvo, nando, hemako, todeyyo, kappo,
tika-s0402t:620_2: Tathā hi dve aggasāvakāpi mahāsāvakesu antogadhā.
tika-s0402t:620_3: Te hi sāvakapāramiñāṇassa matthakappattiyā sāvakesu aggadhammādhigamena aggaṭṭhāne ṭhitāpi abhinīhāramahantatāsāmaññena “mahāsāvakā”tipi vuccanti,
tika-s0402t:620_5: Tathā hi te padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle katapaṇidhānā,
tika-s0402t:620_6: tato eva sātisayaṃ abhiññāsamāpattīsu vasino pabhinnappaṭisambhidā ca.
tika-s0402t:620_7: Kāmaṃ sabbepi arahanto sīlavisuddhiādike sampādetvā catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittā satta bojjhaṅge
tika-s0402t:620_8: yathābhūtaṃ bhāvetvā maggappaṭipāṭiyā anavasesato kilese khepetvā aggaphale patiṭṭhahanti,
tika-s0402t:620_11: evaṃ abhinīhāramahantattapubbayogamahantattā hi sasantāne sātisayassa guṇavisesassa nipphāditattā sīlādīhi guṇehi mahantā sāvakāti mahāsāvakā.
tika-s0402t:620_12: Tesuyeva pana ye bodhipakkhiyadhammesu pāmokkhabhāvena dhurabhūtānaṃ sammādiṭṭhisaṅkappādīnaṃ sātisayaṃ
tika-s0402t:620_13: kiccānubhāvanipphattiyā kāraṇabhūtāya tajjābhinīhārābhinīhaṭāya sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ cirakālasambhāvitāya
tika-s0402t:620_14: sammāpaṭipattiyā yathākkamaṃ paññāya samādhismiñca ukkaṭṭhapāramippattiyā savisesaṃ sabbaguṇehi aggabhāve ṭhitā,
tika-s0402t:620_16: Itare aṭṭhasattati therā sāvakapāramiyā matthake sabbasāvakānaṃ aggabhāvena aṭṭhitattā “mahāsāvakā”icceva vuccanti.
tika-s0402t:620_17: Pakatisāvakā pana abhinīhāramahantattābhāvato pubbayogamahantattābhāvato ca “satthusāvakā”icceva vuccanti.
tika-s0402t:620_18: Te pana aggasāvakā viya mahāsāvakā viya ca na parimitā,
tika-s0402t:621_1: ādimajjhapariyosānesu katthaci aparikilamanto avitthāyanto te ganthe santāneti paṇetīti attho.
tika-s0402t:621_2: Dve paṭisedhā pakatiṃ gamentīti dassetuṃ “avayo na hotī”ti vatvā tattha avayaṃ dassetuṃ “avayo nāma…pe…
tika-s0402t:622_3: tathā idha avattukāmatāya bhayabheravasuttādīsu viya saṅkhepato ca vattukāmatāya “dvinnaṃ vijjāna”micceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:623_1: Moho paṭicchādakaṭṭhena tamoti vuccati tamo viyāti katvā.
tika-s0402t:623_6: Pasaṃsāvacananti tasseva atthassa thomanāvacanaṃ paṭipakkhavidhamanapavattivisesānaṃ bodhanato.
tika-s0402t:623_7: Yojanāti pasaṃsāvasena vuttapadānaṃ atthadassanavasena vuttapadassa ca yojanā.
tika-s0402t:623_8: Avijjā vihatāti etena vijjanaṭṭhena vijjāti ayampi attho dīpitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:623_9: Yasmā vijjā uppannāti etena vijjāpaṭipakkhā avijjā,
tika-s0402t:623_10: paṭipakkhatā cassā pahātabbabhāvena vijjāya ca pahāyakabhāvenāti dasseti.
tika-s0402t:623_15: evaṃ adhigatavijjassa tamo vihato viddhasto. Kasmā?
tika-s0402t:624_4: Sā “ṭhapetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ avasesarūpārūpajjhānānaṃ aññatarato vuṭṭhāyā”tiādinā anekadhā arūpamukhavasena
tika-s0402t:624_5: catudhātuvavatthāne vuttānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ dhātupariggahamukhānaṃ aññataramukhavasena ca anekadhāva visuddhimagge
tika-s0402t:624_7: Mahābodhisattānaṃ pana catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassamukhena pabhedagamanato nānānayaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇasannissayassa
tika-s0402t:624_8: ariyamaggañāṇassa adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ pubbabhāgañāṇagabbhaṃ gaṇhāpentaṃ paripākaṃ gacchantaṃ paramagambhīraṃ
tika-s0402t:624_11: Yassa ca pavattivibhāgena catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassappabhedassa pādakabhāvena samāpajjiyamānā catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā
tika-s0402t:624_13: svāyaṃ buddhānaṃ vipassanācāro paramatthamañjūsāyaṃ visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ dassito,
tika-s0402t:624_15: Idha pana sāvakānaṃ vipassanācāraṃ sandhāya “vipassanāpādaka”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:625_1: anavasesato pana tesaṃ khepanaṃ aggamaggañāṇenevāti āha “arahattamaggañāṇatthāyā”ti.
tika-s0402t:625_3: Āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇanti dassento “tatra cetaṃ ñāṇa”nti vatvā “khaye”ti ādhāre bhummaṃ,
tika-s0402t:625_8: Idaṃ dukkhanti dukkhassa ariyasaccassa tadā bhikkhunā paccakkhato gahitabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:625_10: Na ito bhiyyoti tassa anavasesato gahitabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:625_13: Asammohapaṭivedhoti ca yathā tasmiṃ ñāṇe pavatte pacchā dukkhasaccassa sarūpādiparicchede sammoho na hoti,
tika-s0402t:625_17: Yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvāti yaṃ nibbānaṃ maggassa ārammaṇapaccayaṭṭhena kāraṇabhūtaṃ āgamma.
tika-s0402t:625_18: Patvāti ca tadubhayavato puggalassa pavattiyāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:625_21: Te vā na pavattanti etthāti appavatti, nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:626_1: Yasmā āsavānaṃ dukkhasaccapariyāyo tappariyāpannattā sesasaccānañca taṃsamudayādipariyāyo atthi,
tika-s0402t:626_5: Tathā hi “kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccatī”tiādinā āsavavimuttisīseneva sabbakilesavimutti vuttā.
tika-s0402t:626_6: “Idaṃ dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādinā missakamaggo idha kathitoti “saha vipassanāya koṭippattaṃ maggaṃ kathesī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:626_8: Vimuccatīti iminā pahānābhisamayo vuttoti āha “iminā maggakkhaṇaṃ dassetī”ti.
tika-s0402t:626_10: Yaṃ jānanahetu kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccatīti yojanā.
tika-s0402t:626_12: Bhavāsavaggahaṇeneva ettha bhavarāgassa viya bhavadiṭṭhiyāpi samavarodhoti diṭṭhāsavassapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:627_5: Tattha na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇā maggabhāvanāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0402t:627_7: Na anāgatā assa jāti khīṇāti yojanā.
tika-s0402t:627_8: Na anāgatāti ca anāgatabhāvasāmaññaṃ gahetvā lesena codeti.
tika-s0402t:627_13: Ekacatupañcavokārabhavesūti bhavattayaggahaṇaṃ vuttanayena anavasesato jātiyā khīṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0402t:628_0: Brahmacariyavāso nāma idha maggabrahmacariyassa nibbattanamevāti āha “parivuttha”nti.
tika-s0402t:628_1: Sammādiṭṭhiyā catūsu saccesu pariññādikiccasādhanavasena pavattamānāya sammāsaṅkappādīnampi dukkhasacce pariññābhisamayānuguṇā pavatti,
tika-s0402t:628_2: itaresu ca saccesu nesaṃ pahānābhisamayādivasena pavatti pākaṭā eva.
tika-s0402t:629_3: Te pana pakārā ariyamaggabyāpārabhūtā pariññādayo idhādhippetāti āha “evaṃsoḷasavidhakiccabhāvāyā”ti.
tika-s0402t:629_4: Te hi maggaṃ paccavekkhato maggānubhāvena pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-s0402t:629_5: pariññādīsu ca pahānameva padhānaṃ tadatthattā itaresanti āha “kilesakkhayāya vā”ti.
tika-s0402t:629_10: Pariññātā tiṭṭhantīti etena tesaṃ appatiṭṭhataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0402t:630_9: Maccuṃ jahitvā ṭhitanti āyatiṃ punabbhavābhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:630_10: Kathaṃ punabbhavābhāvoti āha “sabbe pāpadhamme pajahitvā ṭhita”nti.
tika-s0402t:630_15: Iti ettakena ṭhānena sammāsambuddhassa vasena gāthānaṃ atthaṃ vatvā idāni sāvakassapi vasena atthaṃ yojetvā dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:630_17: yato sabbepi ariyasāvakā bhagavato orasaputtāti vuccantīti.
tika-s0402t:631_3: Ekattakāyaekattasaññibhāvasāmaññato vehapphalāpi ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti “cha kāmāvacare,
tika-s0402t:631_10: Kiccavosānenāti catūhi maggehi kattabbassa soḷasavidhassa kiccassa pariyosānena.
tika-s0402t:631_15: Attapaccakkhato ñatvāti iminā tesaṃ vijjānaṃ paṭiladdhabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0402t:634_1: Navame deyyadhammassetaṃ nāmanti yāgaṃ karontena dātabbadeyyadhammaṃ sandhāya vadati tadaññassa pāḷiyaṃ deyyadhammaggahaṇeneva gahitattā.
tika-s0402t:637_1: Dasame jiṇṇānaṃ hatthisālādīnaṃ paṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ puna pākatikakaraṇaṃ jiṇṇapaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:637_4: Sabbacatukkenātiādīsu sabbesu dvipadacatuppadādibhedesu pāṇesu ekekasmiṃ cattāro cattāro pāṇe vadhitvā yajitabbaṃ yaññaṃ sabbacatukkaṃ nāma.
tika-s0402t:637_6: Yassa vā tassa vāti nissakke sāmivacananti āha “yasmā vā tasmā vā”ti.
tika-s0402t:637_7: Evamassāyanti ettha assūti nipātamattanti āha “evaṃ santepi aya”nti.
tika-s0402t:638_3: Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena cettha arahattamaggasseva gahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:639_0: Appehi veyyāvaccakarādīhi attho etissāti appaṭṭhā ttha-
tika-s0402t:639_7: Etaṃ yeva kathāpessāmīti eteneva brāhmaṇena kathāpessāmi.
tika-s0402t:640_3: Tathā hi bhagavato ca sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhā titthiyā,
tika-s0402t:640_5: Te hi diṭṭhiharaṇavasena diṭṭhippakāsane asamatthabhāvena ca iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi haritā apanītā hontīti.
tika-s0402t:640_6: “Paṭī”ti vā ayaṃ saddo “pacchā”ti etassa atthaṃ bodheti “tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhasmiṃ,
tika-s0402t:640_8: tasmā samāhite citte vigatūpakkilese katakiccena pacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti paṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-s0402t:640_9: attano vā upakkilesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi haritesu pacchāharaṇaṃ paṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-s0402t:640_10: iddhiādesanānusāsaniyo ca vigatūpakkilesena katakiccena ca sattahitatthaṃ puna pavattetabbā,
tika-s0402t:640_11: haritesu ca attano upakkilesesu parasattānaṃ upakkilesaharaṇāni hontīti paṭihāriyāni bhavanti,
tika-s0402t:640_13: Paṭihāriye vā iddhiādesanānusāsanisamudāye bhavaṃ ekekaṃ pāṭihāriyanti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:640_14: Paṭihāriyaṃ vā catutthajjhānaṃ maggo ca paṭipakkhaharaṇato,
tika-s0402t:641_3: Evampi te manoti iminā ākārena tava mano pavattoti attho.
tika-s0402t:641_7: na pana yena so somanassito vā domanassito vā,
tika-s0402t:641_9: Somanassaggahaṇena cettha tadekaṭṭhā rāgādayo saddhādayo ca dassitā honti,
tika-s0402t:643_0: Na ariyānanti ariyānaṃ maggaphalacittaṃ na jānātīti attho.
tika-s0402t:643_1: Tañhi tena anadhigatattā cetopariyañāṇenapi na sakkā viññātuṃ,
tika-s0402t:643_3: Heṭṭhimo uparimassa cittaṃ na jānātītiādīnipi maggaphalacittameva sandhāya vuttānīti veditabbāni.
tika-s0402t:643_4: Sotāpannādayopi hi attanā adhigatameva maggaphalaṃ parehi uppāditaṃ sammā cetopariyañāṇena jānituṃ sakkonti,
tika-s0402t:643_6: Sabbepi ariyā attano phalaṃ samāpajjanti adhigatattāti dassento “etesu cā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:643_8: uparimāpi heṭṭhimaṃ phalaṃ samāpajjanti adhigatattā lokiyasamāpattiyo viyāti kassaci āsaṅkā siyā,
tika-s0402t:644_2: Na samāpajjatīti satipi adhigatatte na samāpajjati.
tika-s0402t:644_5: tesaṃ sakadāgāmiādīnaṃ heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā phalasamāpatti tesu tesuyeva heṭṭhimesu ariyapuggalesu pavattati,
tika-s0402t:644_7: Iminā heṭṭhimaṃ phalacittaṃ uparimassa na uppajjatīti dasseti.
tika-s0402t:644_10: Etena uparimo ariyo heṭṭhimaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati attanā adhigatattā yathā taṃ lokiyasamāpattinti evaṃ pavatto hetu byabhicāritoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:644_11: Na hi lokiyajjhānesu puggalantarabhāvūpagamanaṃ nāma atthi visesābhāvato,
tika-s0402t:644_12: idha pana asamugghāṭitakammakilesanirodhanena puthujjanehi viya sotāpannassa sotāpannādīhi sakadāgāmiādīnaṃ puggalantarabhāvūpagamanaṃ atthi.
tika-s0402t:644_13: Yato heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā phaladhammā uparūparimaggadhammehi nivattitā paṭipakkhehi viya abhibhūtā appavattidhammataṃyeva āpannā.
tika-s0402t:645_1: vipākappavatti ca aññāti anantaraphalattā ca lokuttarakusalānaṃ heṭṭhimato uparimo bhavantaragato viya hoti.
tika-s0402t:645_5: Tassa tassa vā ariyassa taṃ taṃ phalaṃ sadisanti katvā na uparimassa heṭṭhimaphalasamaṅgitāya lesopi sambhavati,
tika-s0402t:645_7: Heṭṭhimā ca sotāpannādayo uparimaṃ sakadāgāmiphalādiṃ na samāpajjanti anadhigatattā.
tika-s0402t:645_8: Na hi anadhigataṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjituṃ sakkā,
tika-s0402t:645_9: tasmā sabbepi ariyā attanoyeva phalaṃ samāpajjantīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:646_2: Evanti yathānusiṭṭhāya anusāsaniyā vidhivasena paṭisedhavasena ca pavattitākāraparāmasanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:646_3: Sā ca sammāvitakkā nāma micchāvitakkānañca pavattiākāradassanavasena pavattati.
tika-s0402t:646_4: Tattha ānisaṃsassa ādīnavassa ca vibhāvanatthaṃ aniccasaññameva,
tika-s0402t:646_8: Idhāpi evasaddaggahaṇassa attho payojanañca vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Idaṃ-
tika-s0402t:646_10: Pañcakāmaguṇarāganti nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ tadaññarāgassa dosādīnañca pahānassa icchitattā tappahānassa ca tadaññarāgādikhepassa upāyabhāvato.
tika-s0402t:647_0: Cintāmaṇikavijjāsarikkhakatanti iminā “cintāmaṇī”ti evaṃ laddhanāmā loke ekā vijjā atthi,
tika-s0402t:647_2: “Tassā kira vijjāya sādhako puggalo tādise desakāle mantaṃ parijappitvā yassa cittaṃ jānitukāmo,
tika-s0402t:647_3: tassa diṭṭhahatthādivisesasañjānanamukhena cittācāraṃ anuminanto kathetī”ti keci.
tika-s0402t:648_0: Idañca pana sabbanti “bhavaṃ gotamo anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhotī”tiādinayappavattaṃ sabbampi.
tika-s0402t:653_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame titthaṃ nāma dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo tabbinimuttassa kassaci diṭṭhivipphanditassa abhāvato.
tika-s0402t:653_2: Ettha hi sattā taranti uppilavanti ummujjanimujjaṃ karonti,
tika-s0402t:653_5: tattheva aparāparaṃ nimujjanummujjanavasena pilavanameva tesaṃ taraṇaṃ nāma.
tika-s0402t:653_8: yathāvuttaṃ vā diṭṭhigatasaṅkhātaṃ titthaṃ etesaṃ atthīti titthikā,
tika-s0402t:654_1: tassa tathā vuccatīti iminā puggalajjhāsayavasena tathā vuttanti dasseti. Puggala-
tika-s0402t:654_3: tasmā purisaggahaṇena tato visesanaṃ yathā “aṭṭha purisapuggalā”ti.
tika-s0402t:654_4: Paṭisaṃviditaṃ karotīti kevalaṃ jānanavasena viditaṃ karoti.
tika-s0402t:654_9: Kiriyavedananti “neva kusalākusalā na ca kammavipākā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ kiriyacittasahajaṃ vedanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:654_10: Na kevalañca te kammakiriyavedanā eva paṭikkhipanti,
tika-s0402t:654_11: atha kho sāsane loke ca pākaṭe vātābādhādiroge ca paṭikkhipanti evāti dassetuṃ “ye vā ime”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:654_14: Sannipātikāti pittādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi vikārānaṃ sannipātato jātā.
tika-s0402t:654_16: Visamaparihārajāti asappāyāhārayogapaṭisevanavasena kāyassa visamaṃ pariharaṇato jātā.
tika-s0402t:654_20: tappaccayā vā dukkhā vedanā ābādhanaṭṭhena ābādho,
tika-s0402t:654_28: Aṭṭhamaṃyeva kammavipākajaṃ ābādhaṃ sampaṭicchanti “sabbaṃ taṃ pubbekatahetū”ti vipallāsaggāhena.
tika-s0402t:654_29: “Pubbe”ti purātanasseva kammassa gahitattā upapajjavedanīyampi te paṭikkhipantīti vuttaṃ “dve paṭibāhitvā”ti.
tika-s0402t:655_3: Sabbe paṭibāhantīti sabbe roge paṭisedhenti sabbesampi tesaṃ ekena issareneva nimmitattā tabbhāvībhāvāsambhavato.
tika-s0402t:656_0: Mātikaṃ nikkhipitvāti tiṇṇampi vedānaṃ asārabhāvadassanatthaṃ uddesaṃ katvā.
tika-s0402t:656_4: Laddhito laddhiṃ saṅkamantīti mūlaladdhito aññaladdhiṃ upagacchanti paṭijānanti.
tika-s0402t:656_5: Pubbekatahetuyeva paṭisaṃvedetīti kammavedanampi vipākavedanaṃ katvā vadanti.
tika-s0402t:656_10: Tattha evanti yathā pubbekatahetu eva pāṇātipātino nāma honti,
tika-s0402t:656_12: evaṃ pāṇātipātā viramaṇampi pubbekatahetu evāti vicāriyamāno pubbekatavādo akiriyavādo eva sampajjati.
tika-s0402t:657_2: Paccattapurisakāroti tena tena purisena kattabbakiccaṃ na hoti pubbekatahetu eva sijjhanato.
tika-s0402t:657_3: Ubhayampi taṃ esa na labbhatīti kattabbakaraṇaṃ sucaritapūraṇaṃ,
tika-s0402t:657_4: akattabbaakaraṇaṃ duccaritaviratīti idaṃ ubhayampi esa na labhati.
tika-s0402t:657_5: Samaṇāpi hi pubbekatakāraṇāyeva hontīti pubbekatakāraṇāyeva samaṇāpi honti,
tika-s0402t:658_0: Yathā pubbekatavāde chandavāyāmānaṃ asambhavato paccattapurisakārānaṃ abhāvo,
tika-s0402t:658_1: evaṃ issaranimmānavādepi issareneva sabbassa nimmitabhāvānujānanatoti vuttaṃ “pubbekatavāde vuttanayeneva veditabbo”ti.
tika-s0402t:659_0: Imesantiādinā imesaṃ titthāyatanānaṃ tucchāsāratāya thusakoṭṭanena kuṇḍakamattassapi alābho viya paramatthalesassapi abhāvo,
tika-s0402t:659_1: tathā khajjopanakobhāsato tejaso phuliṅgamattassapi abhāvo viya andhaveṇikassapi maggassa appaṭilābho
tika-s0402t:659_2: viya saddamattaṃ nissāya micchābhāgena vipallatthatāya daddarajātake sasakasadisatā ca vibhāvitā hoti.
tika-s0402t:659_10: Appaṭikuṭṭho nāma appaṭisedhanaṃ vā siyā anakkosanaṃ vāti tadubhayaṃ dassento “appaṭibāhito anupakkuṭṭho”ti āha.
tika-s0402t:660_6: na icchāsabhāvā diṭṭhiādirahitehi vimuccamānaudumbarapupphādilokavohāravatthūni viya ca vācāvatthumattā,
tika-s0402t:660_12: Uppattiṭṭhānampi hi ākaro āyatananti vuccati yathā “kambojo assānaṃ āyatana”nti.
tika-s0402t:660_13: Manopavicārāti taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ upecca manaso vividhacaraṇākāro.
tika-s0402t:661_0: Patiṭṭhādhātūti sesabhūtattayassa ceva sabbūpādārūpānañca patiṭṭhāsabhāvā dhātu.
tika-s0402t:661_6: Rūpavivitto rūpapariyanto ākāsoti yesaṃ so paricchedo,
tika-s0402t:661_10: Saṅkhepato kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati kathetabbassa atthassa anavasesapariyādānābhāvato.
tika-s0402t:662_0: Anipphannāpi ākāsadhātu bhūtāni upādāya gahetabbatāmattena “upādārūpa”nteva vuccati.
tika-s0402t:662_2: Tena sahajātā vedanā vedanākkhandho samudāye pavattavohārassa avayavepi dissanato yathā “vatthekadese daḍḍhe vatthaṃ daḍḍha”nti.
tika-s0402t:662_3: “Phasso ca cetanā ca saṅkhārakkhandho”ti vuttaṃ mahābhūmakattā tesaṃ tappadhānattā ca saṅkhārakkhandhassa.
tika-s0402t:662_4: Arūpakkhandhā nāmaṃ ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namanato nāmādhīnaggahaṇato ca.
tika-s0402t:662_9: Anukkamena paṭipajjamānoti evaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiyaṃ ṭhito uparimena tissannaṃ visuddhīnaṃ sampādanavasena visuddhibhāvanaṃ ussukkāpento.
tika-s0402t:663_2: Ākiṇṇaṃ viya hutvā uppajjanti etthāti ākaro.
tika-s0402t:663_4: na tathā itaresanti katvā vuttaṃ “dve cakkhuviññāṇānī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:663_6: Dvattiṃsāya vipākaphassesu dvipañcaviññāṇasahagataphasse ṭhapetvā sesā dvāvīsati vipākaphassā veditabbā.
tika-s0402t:663_8: “Saṅkhepato tāvā”ti saṅkhepakathaṃ ārabhitvāpi vitthārakathāpettha vuttanayattā suviññeyyāvāti vuttaṃ “heṭṭhā…pe…
tika-s0402t:664_3: Sabhāvato saṅkappato ca somanassādiuppattihetukā somanassaṭṭhāniyāditāti āha “iṭṭhaṃ vā hotū”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:665_9: Tasmā panettha gabbhāvakkantivaseneva vaṭṭaṃ dassitanti āha “gabbhāvakkantivaṭṭasmiṃ hī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:665_12: Purimā dve yoniyo itarāhi oḷārikatāya paribyattatarāti vuttaṃ “gabbhāvakkanti…pe…
tika-s0402t:666_1: na tehi bhāgaso nipphādiyamānaṃ paccayavisesaṃ “kuto panetaṃ channaṃ dhātūna”nti avibhāgena vuttattā.
tika-s0402t:666_3: Na mātu na pitu tāsaṃ dhātūnaṃ imassa sattassa bāhirabhāvato.
tika-s0402t:666_4: Gabbhassāti ettha gabbhati attabhāvabhāvena vattatīti gabbho,
tika-s0402t:666_6: Tannissitattā pana sattasantāno gabbhoti vutto yathā mañcanissitā “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”ti.
tika-s0402t:666_7: Tannissayabhāvato mātukucchi gabbhoti vuccati “gabbhe vasati māṇavo”tiādīsu.
tika-s0402t:666_9: Yathā hi nivāsaṭṭhānatāya sattānaṃ ovarako “gabbho”ti vuccati,
tika-s0402t:666_10: evaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ sattānaṃ yāva abhijāti nivāsaṭṭhānatāya mātukucchi “gabbho”ti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:666_11: Idha pana paṭhamaṃ vuttaattheneva gabbhoti veditabbo.
tika-s0402t:667_0: Niratiatthena nirayo ca so yathāvuttena atthena gabbho cāti nirayagabbho.
tika-s0402t:667_3: devamanujādayo viya uddhaṃ dīghā ahutvā tiriyaṃ añcitā dīghāti tiracchānā.
tika-s0402t:667_4: Te eva khandhakoṭṭhāsabhāvena yoni ca so vuttanayena gabbho cāti tiracchānayonigabbho.
tika-s0402t:667_7: Manassa ussannatāya sūrabhāvādiguṇehi upacitamānasatāya ukkaṭṭhaguṇacittatāya manussā.
tika-s0402t:667_8: Dibbanti kāmaguṇādīhi kīḷanti laḷanti jotantīti devā.
tika-s0402t:667_12: Okkanti mātukucchiṃ okkamitvā viya uppatitvāti katvā.
tika-s0402t:668_0: Sannipāto nāma avekallajātihīnavekalleti dassetuṃ “idha mātāpitaro”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:668_6: Mātugāmassa hi yasmiṃ gabbhāsahasaññite okāse dārako nibbattati,
tika-s0402t:668_7: tattha mahatī lohitapīḷakā saṇṭhahitvā aggahitapubbā eva bhijjitvā paggharati,
tika-s0402t:668_8: vatthu suddhaṃ hoti paggharitalohitattā anāmayattā ca.
tika-s0402t:668_9: Visuddhe vatthumhi mātāpitūsu ekavāraṃ sannipatitesu yāva satta divasāni khettameva hoti.
tika-s0402t:668_10: Suddhaṃ vatthu nahānato parampi katipayāni divasāni gabbhasaṇṭhahanatāya khettameva hoti parittassa lohitalesassa vijjamānattā.
tika-s0402t:668_11: Tasmiṃ samaye hatthaggāhaveṇiggāhādinā aṅgaparāmasanenapi dārako nibbattatiyeva.
tika-s0402t:668_13: Tathā hi pārikāya nābhiparāmasanena sāmassa bodhisattassa,
tika-s0402t:668_15: Gandhanato uppannagatiyā nimittūpaṭṭhānena sūcanato dīpanato gandhoti laddhanāmena bhavagāmikammunā abbati pavattatīti gandhabbo,
tika-s0402t:668_17: Paccupaṭṭhito hotīti na mātāpitūnaṃ sannipātaṃ olokayamāno samīpe ṭhito paccupaṭṭhito nāma hoti,
tika-s0402t:668_18: kammayantayantito pana eko satto tasmiṃ okāse nibbattanako hotīti ayamettha adhippāyo.
tika-s0402t:668_19: Tadā hi tatrūpagasatto tatrūpapattiāvahantakammasaṅkhātena pellakayantena tathatthāya pellito upanīto viya hoti.
tika-s0402t:669_0: Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti ettha viññāṇassa paccayabhāvena gahitattā “tayo arūpino khandhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:669_1: Idha pana viññāṇaṃ paccayabhāvena aggahetvā gabbhokkantiyā eva paccayabhāvena gahitattā “viññāṇakkhandhampi pakkhipitvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:669_2: Idha pana manussagabbhassa okkantiyā adhippetattā “gabbhaseyyakānaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:670_1: Tasseva pabhāvikāti tasseva yathāvuttassa dukkhasaccassa uppādikā.
tika-s0402t:670_2: Dukkhanirodhoti ettha dukkhaggahaṇena taṇhāpi gahitāti āha “tesaṃ dvinnampi…pe…
tika-s0402t:670_4: Avisesena hi tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ idha dukkhanti adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0402t:670_5: Atha vā dukkhassa anuppattinirodho tabbhāvikāya taṇhāya anuppattinirodhena vinā na hotīti vuttaṃ “tesaṃ dvinnampi…pe…
tika-s0402t:671_0: “Tattha vuttanayeneva veditabba”nti vatvā ubhayattha pāḷiyā pavattiākārabhedaṃ dassetuṃ “ayaṃ pana viseso”ti āha.
tika-s0402t:671_4: Asesavirāganirodhāti ettha accantameva saṅkhāre virajjati etenāti virāgo, maggo,
tika-s0402t:671_5: tasmā virāgasaṅkhātena maggena asesanirodhā asesetvā nirodhā samucchindanāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t:672_5: Nibbānampi nirodhoti vuccati avijjādīnaṃ nirodhassa nimittabhāvato avijjādayo nirujjhanti etthāti nirodhoti katvā.
tika-s0402t:672_9: Sabhāvadhammānaṃ niggaho nāma yathāvuttadhammaparicchedato ūnādhikabhāvappakāsanena attasabhāvavibhāvaneneva hotīti āha “niggaṇhanto hī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:675_1: Dutiye parittātuṃ samatthabhāvenāti uppannabhayato rakkhituṃ samatthabhāvena.
tika-s0402t:675_2: Natthi ettha mātāputtaṃ aññamaññaṃ tāyituṃ samatthanti amātāputtāni,
tika-s0402t:675_11: Aṭaviggahaṇena aṭavivāsino vuttā “sabbo gāmo āgato”tiādīsu viyāti āha “aṭavīti cettha aṭavivāsino corā veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0402t:675_14: Ṭhānagamanādiiriyāpathacakkasamaṅgino iriyāpathacakkasamāruḷhā nāma hontīti āha “iriyāpathacakkampi vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-s0402t:676_0: Pariyāyantīti parito tena tena disābhāgena gacchanti.
tika-s0402t:676_2: Mātupemena gantuṃ avisahitvā attano santikaṃ āgacchantaṃ.
tika-s0402t:676_3: Attasinehassa balavabhāvato mātarampi anapekkhitvā “attānaṃyeva rakkhissāmī”ti gacchantaṃ.
tika-s0402t:676_4: Ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nilīnanti vuttanayeneva gantvā ekasmiṃ kheme padese nisinnaṃ.
tika-s0402t:676_5: Kulle vātiādīsu kūlaṃ paratīraṃ vahati pāpetīhi kullo,
tika-s0402t:677_0: Yathāvuttāni tīṇi bhayāni samātāputtikāniyeva assutavato puthujjanassa vasena amātāputtikāni dassitānīti
tika-s0402t:680_1: Tatiye evaṃnāmake janapadeti yattha nāmaggahaṇena kosalasaddassa ruḷhīsaddataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0402t:680_2: Tathā hi kosalā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā,
tika-s0402t:680_3: tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīsaddena “kosalā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:680_4: Akkharacintakā hi īdisesu ṭhānesu yutte viya saliṅgavacanāni (pāṇini 1.2.51) icchanti.
tika-s0402t:680_7: Tabbisesane pana janapadasadde jātisadde ekavacanameva yathā “kosalesu janapade”ti.
tika-s0402t:680_13: Taṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “cārikā ca nāmesā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:680_18: Bhagavā hi mahākassapattheraṃ paccuggacchanto muhuttena tigāvutamaggamagamāsi.
tika-s0402t:680_24: dhammasenāpatino saddhivihārikassa vanavāsissa tissasāmaṇerassa tigāvutādhikaṃ vīsayojanasataṃ agamāsi.
tika-s0402t:681_0: Upalabhiṃsūti ettha savanavasena upalabhiṃsūti imamatthaṃ dassento “sotadvāra…pe…
tika-s0402t:681_2: Sabbampi vākyaṃ avadhāraṇaphalattā antogadhāvadhāraṇanti āha “padapūraṇamatte vā nipāto”ti.
tika-s0402t:681_6: sadde gahite tena phullitamaṇḍitavibhūsitaṃ viya hontaṃ pūritaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0402t:681_7: tena ca purimapacchimapadāni saṃsiliṭṭhāni nāma honti,
tika-s0402t:682_1: Evañhi bāhirakavītarāgasekkhāsekkhapāpasamanato bhagavato pāpasamanaṃ visesitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:682_2: Tenassa yathābhūtaguṇādhigatametaṃ nāmaṃ yadidaṃ samaṇoti dīpeti.
tika-s0402t:682_3: Anekatthattā nipātānaṃ idha anussavattho adhippetoti āha “khalūti anussavatthe nipāto”ti.
tika-s0402t:682_5: Piyasamudāhārā hete “bho”ti vā “āvuso”ti vā “devānaṃ piyā”ti vā.
tika-s0402t:682_7: Gotamoti hi pavattamānaṃ vacanaṃ buddhiñca tāyati ekaṃsikavisayatāya rakkhatīti gottaṃ.
tika-s0402t:682_8: Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena vinā na vattati,
tika-s0402t:682_10: tasmā so gottasaṅkhāto attho tāni tāyati rakkhatīti vuccati.
tika-s0402t:682_12: Aññakulaparamparāsādhāraṇaṃ tassa kulassa ādipurisasamudāgataṃ taṃkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṃ sāmaññarūpanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:682_13: Ettha ca samaṇoti iminā parikkhakajanehi bhagavato bahumatabhāvo dassito samitapāpatākittanato.
tika-s0402t:682_14: Gotamoti iminā lokiyajanehi uccākulasambhūtatā dīpitā tena uditoditavipulakhattiyakulavibhāvanato.
tika-s0402t:682_15: Sabbakhattiyānañhi ādibhūtamahāsammatamahārājato paṭṭhāya asambhinnaṃ uḷāratamaṃ sakyarājakulaṃ.
tika-s0402t:683_0: Kenaci pārijuññenāti ñātipārijuññabhogapārijuññādinā kenacipi pārijuññena parihāniyā anabhibhūto anajjhotthaṭo.
tika-s0402t:683_1: Tathā hi tassa kulassa na kiñci pārijuññaṃ lokanāthassa abhijātiyaṃ,
tika-s0402t:683_3: Abhinikkhamane ca tatopi samiddhatamabhāvo loke pākaṭo paññātoti.
tika-s0402t:683_4: Sakyakulā pabbajitoti idaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavato saddhāpabbajitabhāvadīpanaṃ vuttaṃ mahantaṃ ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ
tika-s0402t:684_0: Itthambhūtākhyānattheti itthaṃ evaṃpakāro bhūto jātoti evaṃ kathanatthe.
tika-s0402t:684_3: tena yogato “taṃ kho pana bhavanta”nti idaṃ sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ.
tika-s0402t:684_4: Tenāha “tassa kho pana bhoto gotamassāti attho”ti.
tika-s0402t:684_9: sā eva saddanīyato saddoti āha “kittisaddoti kittiyevā”ti.
tika-s0402t:684_11: Sadevakaṃ lokaṃ ajjhottharitvā uggatoti anaññasādhāraṇe guṇe ārabbha pavattattā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ ajjhottharitvā abhibhavitvā uggato.
tika-s0402t:685_0: So bhagavāti yo so samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho
tika-s0402t:685_1: devānaṃ atidevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā lokanātho bhāgyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi sadevake loke
tika-s0402t:685_5: Tenāha āyasmā dhammasenāpati “bhagavāti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kata”ntiādi.
tika-s0402t:685_7: Yathā kammaṭṭhānikena “araha”ntiādīsu navasu ṭhānesu paccekaṃ iti-
tika-s0402t:685_9: evaṃ buddhaguṇasaṃkittanenapīti dassento “itipi arahaṃ itipi sammāsambuddho…pe…
tika-s0402t:685_11: “Itipetaṃ bhūtaṃ itipetaṃ taccha”ntiādīsu viya idha itisaddo āsannapaccakkhakaraṇattho, pi-
tika-s0402t:685_13: tena ca tesaṃ guṇānaṃ bahubhāvo dīpito,
tika-s0402t:685_14: tāni ca saṃkittentena viññunā cittassa sammukhībhūtāneva katvā saṃkittetabbānīti dassento “iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti āha.
tika-s0402t:687_0: Imaṃ lokanti nayidaṃ mahājanassa sammukhamattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0402t:687_1: atha kho anavasesaṃ pariyādāyāti dassetuṃ “sadevaka”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:687_5: Sadevakanti ca avayavena viggaho samudāyo samāsattho.
tika-s0402t:687_7: Tattha hi so jāto tannivāsī ca.
tika-s0402t:687_9: Paccatthikasamaṇabrāhmaṇaggahaṇanti nidassanamattametaṃ apaccatthikānaṃ samitabāhitapāpānañca samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇavacanena gahitattā.
tika-s0402t:687_10: Kāmaṃ “sadevaka”ntiādivisesanānaṃ vasena sattavisayo lokasaddoti viññāyati tulyayogavisayattā tesaṃ,
tika-s0402t:687_11: “salomako sapakkhako”tiādīsu pana atulyayogepi ayaṃ samāso labbhatīti byabhicāradassanato pajāgahaṇanti āha “pajāvacanena sattalokaggahaṇa”nti.
tika-s0402t:688_0: Arūpino sattā attano āneñjavihārena viharantā dibbantīti devāti imaṃ nibbacanaṃ labhantīti āha “sadevakaggahaṇena arūpāvacaraloko gahito”ti.
tika-s0402t:688_2: Samārakaggahaṇena chakāmāvacaradevaloko gahito tassa savisesaṃ mārassa vase vattanato.
tika-s0402t:688_5: Itarā pana catasso parisā samārakādiggahaṇena gahitā evāti.
tika-s0402t:688_9: Tena tenākārenāti sadevakattādinā tena tena pakārena.
tika-s0402t:689_1: abhijānitvāti ayamettha atthoti āha “abhiññāya adhikena ñāṇena ñatvā”ti.
tika-s0402t:689_3: Sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacāratāya hi sabbapaccakkhā buddhā bhagavanto.
tika-s0402t:690_1: Tena vimissāpi kadāci bhagavato dhammadesanā hotīti “hitvāpī”ti pi-
tika-s0402t:690_3: Bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento yasmiṃ khaṇe parisā sādhukāraṃ vā deti,
tika-s0402t:690_5: taṃ khaṇaṃ pubbabhāgena paricchinditvā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
tika-s0402t:690_6: yathāparicchedañca samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya dhammaṃ deseti.
tika-s0402t:690_7: Appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desentoti ugghaṭitaññussa vasena appaṃ vā,
tika-s0402t:690_8: vipañcitaññussa neyyassa vā vasena bahuṃ vā desento.
tika-s0402t:690_9: Dhammassa kalyāṇatā ca niyyānikatā ca sabbaso anavajjabhāvenevāti āha “anavajjameva katvā”ti.
tika-s0402t:691_0: Desakāyattena āṇādividhinā atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanāti sā pariyattidhammavasena veditabbāti āha “desanāya tāva cātuppadikagāthāyapī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:691_1: Nidānanigamānipi satthu desanāya anuvidhānato tadantogadhāni evāti āha “nidānaṃ ādi,
tika-s0402t:692_0: Sāsitabbapuggalagatena yathāparādhādisāsitabbabhāvena anusāsanaṃ tadaṅgavinayādivasena vinayanaṃ sāsananti
tika-s0402t:692_2: Kusalānanti anavajjadhammānaṃ sīlasamathavipassanānaṃ sīladiṭṭhīnañca ādibhāvo taṃmūlikattā uttarimanussadhammānaṃ.
tika-s0402t:692_3: Ariyamaggassa antadvayavigamena majjhimāpaṭipadābhāvo viya sammāpaṭipattiyā ārabbha nibbattīnaṃ vemajjhatāpi majjhabhāvoti vuttaṃ “atthi,
tika-s0402t:692_8: Idāni tesaṃ dvinnampi sāsanassa pariyosānataṃ āgamena dassetuṃ “tasmātiha tva”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:692_11: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe kathāvadhisaddappabandho gāthāvasena suttavasena ca vavatthito pariyattidhammo,
tika-s0402t:692_13: tassa pana attho visesato sīlādi evāti āha “bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento…pe…
tika-s0402t:692_15: Tattha sīlaṃ dassetvāti sīlaggahaṇena sasambhāraṃ sīlaṃ gahitaṃ,
tika-s0402t:692_16: tathā maggaggahaṇena sasambhāro maggoti tadubhayavasena anavasesato pariyattiatthaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0402t:692_18: Atthavasena hi idha desanāya ādikalyāṇādibhāvo adhippeto.
tika-s0402t:693_0: Na so sātthaṃ deseti niyyānatthavirahato tassā desanāya.
tika-s0402t:693_1: Ekabyañjanādiyuttā vāti sithilādibhedesu byañjanesu ekappakāreneva dvippakāreneva vā byañjanena yuttā damiḷabhāsā viya.
tika-s0402t:693_2: Vivaṭakaraṇatāya oṭṭhe aphusāpetvā uccāretabbato sabbaniroṭṭhabyañjanā vā kirātabhāsā viya.
tika-s0402t:693_3: Sabbasseva vissajjanīyayuttatāya sabbavissaṭṭhabyañjanā vā yavanabhāsā viya.
tika-s0402t:693_4: Sabbasseva sānusāratāya sabbaniggahitabyañjanā vā pārasikādimilakkhabhāsā viya.
tika-s0402t:693_5: Sabbāpesā byañjanekadesavaseneva pavattiyā aparipuṇṇabyañjanāti katvā “abyañjanā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0402t:694_0: Ṭhānakaraṇāni sithilāni katvā uccāretabbaṃ akkharaṃ pañcasu vaggesu paṭhamatatiyanti evamādi sithilaṃ.
tika-s0402t:694_1: Tāni asithilāni katvā uccāretabbaṃ akkharaṃ vaggesu dutiyacatutthanti evamādi dhanitaṃ.
tika-s0402t:694_10: Dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedoti evaṃ sithilādivasena byañjanabuddhiyā akkharuppādakacittassa dasappakārena pabhedo.
tika-s0402t:694_11: Sabbāni hi akkharāni cittasamuṭṭhānāni yathādhippetatthabyañjanato byañjanāni ca.
tika-s0402t:695_3: Bhagavā yamatthaṃ ñāpetuṃ ekagāthaṃ ekavākyampi deseti,
tika-s0402t:695_4: tamatthaṃ tāya desanāya parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanāya eva desetīti āha “paripuṇṇabyañjanameva katvā dhammaṃ desetī”ti.
tika-s0402t:695_8: Taṃ pana kiñci ūnaṃ vā adhikaṃ vā na hotīti “anūnādhikavacana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:695_19: Mettābhāvanāya muduhadayoti mettābhāvanāya karuṇāya vā muduhadayo.
tika-s0402t:695_20: Ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitenāti sakalasaṃkilesato vaṭṭadukkhato ca uddharaṇākārāvaṭṭhitena cittena,
tika-s0402t:695_22: Tasmāti yasmā sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ idha brahmacariyanti adhippetaṃ, tasmā.
tika-s0402t:695_23: Brahmacariyanti iminā samānādhikaraṇāni sabbapadāni yojetvā atthaṃ dassento “so dhammaṃ deseti…pe…
tika-s0402t:696_1: Bhaddakatā ca passantassa hitasukhāvahabhāvena veditabbāti āha “atthāvahaṃ sukhāvaha”nti.
tika-s0402t:696_6: tehi catuppamāṇikassa lokassa sabbathāpi accantappasādanīyo tesaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvattāti dassento “yathārūpo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:696_8: arahatanti iminā dhammappamāṇalūkhappamāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ bhagavato pasādāvahatā dassitā,
tika-s0402t:696_10: Dassanamattampi sādhu hotīti ettha kosiyavatthu kathetabbaṃ.
tika-s0402t:697_0: Anekatthattā nipātānaṃ yāvañcidanti nipātasamudāyo adhimattappamāṇaparicchedaṃ dīpetīti āha “adhimattappamāṇaparicchedavacanameta”nti.
tika-s0402t:697_2: Vippasannānīti ca pakatiākāraṃ atikkamitvā vippasannānīti attho.
tika-s0402t:697_3: Nanu ca cakkhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ manoviññeyyattā kathaṃ tena tesaṃ vippasannatā viññāyatīti āha “tassa hī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:697_6: Evampi manindriyena patiṭṭhitokāsassa adiṭṭhattā kathaṃ manindriyassa vippasannatā tena viññāyatīti āha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:697_8: Mane vippasanneyeva hoti pasannacittasamuṭṭhitarūpasampadāhi eva cakkhādīnaṃ patiṭṭhitokāsassa pasannatāsambhavato.
tika-s0402t:698_2: Iminā nekkhanti nekkhappamāṇajambonadasuvaṇṇena kataṃ akatabhaṇḍaṃ vuttanti dasseti.
tika-s0402t:698_3: Nekkhanti vā atirekapañcasuvaṇṇena katapilandhanaṃ katabhaṇḍaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:698_6: tasmā pañcavīsatidharaṇahiraññavicitaṃ ābharaṇaṃ idha nekkhanti adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0402t:698_9: Suvaṇṇākāre mahājambuphalarase vā pathaviyaṃ paviṭṭhe suvaṇṇaṅkurā uṭṭhahanti,
tika-s0402t:701_0: Laddhā ca na kappantīti sāmaññena paṭisiddhattā sabbathā na kappatīti kassaci āsaṅkā siyā,
tika-s0402t:701_3: Ettha ca “suddhakoseyyaṃ pana vaṭṭatī”ti vinaye vuttattā idhāpi ettakameva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:701_4: Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ sabbāneva gonakādīni ratanaparisibbitāni na vaṭṭantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:701_5: Tattha “ṭhapetvā tūlika”nti etena ratanasibbanarahitāpī tūlikā na vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
tika-s0402t:701_7: Ekena vidhānenāti yathāvuttameva vidhānaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0402t:701_8: Yadi evaṃ kasmā bhagavatā “laddhā ca na kappantī”ti sāmaññena paṭisedho katoti āha “akappiyaṃ pana upādāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:702_2: tasmā vāmūruṃ dakkhiṇūruñca samaṃ ṭhapetvā ubho pāde aññamaññasambandhe katvā nisajjā pallaṅkanti āha “samantato ūrubaddhāsana”nti.
tika-s0402t:702_4: Pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvāti ca yathā pallaṅkavasena nisajjā hoti,
tika-s0402t:702_5: evaṃ ubho pāde ābhuje samiñjite katvāti attho.
tika-s0402t:702_6: Taṃ pana ubhinnaṃ pādānaṃ tathā sambandhatākaraṇanti āha “bandhitvā”ti.
tika-s0402t:702_7: Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvā.
tika-s0402t:702_9: Athassa yā tesaṃ paṇamanapaccayā khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ,
tika-s0402t:702_15: Ujuṃ kāyaṃ ṭhapetvāti uparimaṃ kāyaṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā,
tika-s0402t:703_2: bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇato nivāretvā kammaṭṭhānaṃyeva purakkhatvāti attho.
tika-s0402t:703_3: Ettha yathā “vanantaññeva pavisāmī”tiādinā bhāvanānurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-s0402t:703_4: evaṃ “nisīdāmī”ti iminā alīnānuddhaccapakkhiyo santo iriyāpatho dassito,
tika-s0402t:703_7: Pariggahitaniyyānanti sabbathā gahitāsammosaṃ pariccattasammosaṃ satiṃ katvā,
tika-s0402t:704_0: Cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni dibbabhāvāvahattā dibbavihārā nāma hontīti tadāsannappavattacaṅkamopi tadupacārato
tika-s0402t:704_1: dibbo nāma hotīti āha “cattāri hi rūpajjhānānī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:704_2: Samāpajjitvā caṅkamantassāti idañca caṅkamantassa antarantarā samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya caṅkamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:704_3: Na hi samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā avuṭṭhitena sakkā caṅkamituṃ.
tika-s0402t:704_4: Samāpattito vuṭṭhāya caṅkamantassapi caṅkamoti idaṃ pana samāpattito vuṭṭhahitvā antarantarā samāpajjitvā caṅkamantassa vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:704_7: Mettājhānādayo hitūpasaṃhārādivasena pavattiyā brahmabhūtā seṭṭhabhūtā vihārāti brahmavihārā.
tika-s0402t:705_0: Paccavekkhaṇāya phalasamāpatti kathitā samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhitassa paccavekkhaṇāsambhavato.
tika-s0402t:705_1: Caṅkamādayoti phalasamāpattiṃ samāpannassapi samāpattito vuṭṭhitassapi caṅkamaṭṭhānanisajjādayo.
tika-s0402t:705_2: Ariyacaṅkamādayo honti na pana paccavekkhantassāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0402t:708_1: Catutthe gijjhā ettha santīti gijjhaṃ, kūṭaṃ.
tika-s0402t:708_8: atha kho sāsanapakkamananti dassento “imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā”tiādimāha,
tika-s0402t:708_13: Paccayā eva hi paṇītapaṇītā sundarasundarā abhisaṅkharitvā katā sakkārāti vuccanti.
tika-s0402t:708_15: parehi attano gāravakiriyā pupphādīhi vā pūjā.
tika-s0402t:709_0: Mahālābhasakkāro uppajjīti tadā kira bhagavato mahālābhasakkāro uppajji yathā taṃ cattāro asaṅkheyye pūritadānapāramisañcayassa.
tika-s0402t:709_1: Sabbadisāsu hi yamakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā mahogho viya sabbapāramiyo “ekasmiṃ attabhāve vipākaṃ dassāmā”ti
tika-s0402t:709_5: kahaṃ devadevo narāsabho purisasīho”ti bhagavantaṃ pariyesanti,
tika-s0402t:709_6: sakaṭasatehipi paccaye āharitvā okāsaṃ alabhamānā samantā gāvutappamāṇampi sakaṭadhurena sakaṭadhuraṃ
tika-s0402t:709_7: āhacca tiṭṭhanti ceva anubandhanti ca andhakavindabrāhmaṇo viya.
tika-s0402t:710_0: “Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti garukato mānito pūjito apacito lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṃ,
tika-s0402t:712_1: etarahi saṅgho vā gaṇo vā loke uppanno, nāhaṃ, cunda,
tika-s0402t:712_2: aññaṃ ekaṃ saṅghampi samanupassāmi evaṃlābhaggayasaggappattaṃ yatharivāyaṃ, cunda,
tika-s0402t:713_0: Svāyaṃ bhagavato ca saṅghassa ca uppanno lābhasakkāro ekato hutvā dvinnaṃ mahānadīnaṃ udakaṃ viya appameyyo ahosi,
tika-s0402t:713_1: bhagavato pana bhikkhusaṅghassa ca uppanno lābhasakkāro dhammassapi uppannoyeva.
tika-s0402t:713_2: Dhammadharānañhi kato sakkāro dhammassa kato nāma hoti.
tika-s0402t:714_2: Yassa hi cattāro paccaye sakkatvā suabhisaṅkhate paṇītapaṇīte upaneti,
tika-s0402t:714_4: Garukatoti garubhāvahetūnaṃ uttamaguṇānaṃ matthakappattiyā anaññasādhāraṇena garukārena sabbadevamanussehi pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garukato.
tika-s0402t:714_9: Pūjitoti mānanādipūjāya ceva catupaccayapūjāya ca pūjito.
tika-s0402t:714_17: vandantīti evaṃ so tehi apacito nāma hoti.
tika-s0402t:715_0: Avaṇṇaṃ pattharitvāti avaṇṇaṃ tattha tattha saṃkittanavasena pattharitvā.
tika-s0402t:715_2: Āvaṭṭeti purimākārato nivatteti attano vase vatteti etāyāti āvaṭṭanī, māyā,
tika-s0402t:715_5: Thaddhakāyena pharusavācāya tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ avaṇṇakathanaṃ anatthāvahattā visasiñcanasadisā hotīti āha “visaṃ siñcitvā”ti.
tika-s0402t:716_6: Yato yato garu dhuranti yasmiṃ yasmiṃ ṭhāne dhuraṃ garu bhārikaṃ hoti,
tika-s0402t:716_10: yasmiṃ ṭhāne udakacikkhallamahantatāya vā visamacchinnataṭabhāvena vā maggo gambhīro hotīti attho.
tika-s0402t:716_13: Yadā dhurañca garu hoti maggo ca gambhīro,
tika-s0402t:716_14: tadā aññe balibadde apanetvā kaṇhameva yuñjentīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0402t:716_15: Svāssu taṃ vahate dhuranti etthapi assūti nipātamattameva,
tika-s0402t:717_3: Kāḷakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āhāti kāḷako kira ekadivasaṃ cintesi “mayhaṃ mātā duggatā maṃ puttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā dukkhena poseti,
tika-s0402t:717_4: yaṃnūnāhaṃ bhatiṃ katvā imaṃ duggatabhāvato moceyya”nti.
tika-s0402t:717_5: So tato paṭṭhāya bhatiṃ upadhārento vicarati.
tika-s0402t:717_6: Atha tasmiṃ divase gāmagorūpehi saddhiṃ tattha samīpe carati.
tika-s0402t:717_8: so “atthi nu kho etesaṃ gunnaṃ antare sakaṭāni uttāretuṃ samattho usabhājānīyo”ti upadhārayamāno bodhisattaṃ
tika-s0402t:717_9: disvā “ayaṃ ājānīyo sakkhissati mayhaṃ sakaṭāni uttāretu”nti aññāsi.
tika-s0402t:717_12: gehameva agamāsīti tadā kira gāmadārakā “kiṃ nāmetaṃ kāḷakassa gale”ti tassa santikaṃ āgacchanti.
tika-s0402t:717_13: So te anubandhitvā dūratova palāpento mātu santikaṃ gato.
tika-s0402t:718_3: Paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti ettha tehi tehi saddhivihārikaantevāsikaupāsakaupāsikādisattehi ceva rūpārammaṇādisaṅkhārehi
tika-s0402t:718_4: ca paṭinivattetvā apasakkitvā nilīyanaṃ vivecanaṃ kāyacittehi tato vivittatāya paṭisallānaṃ kāyaviveko,
tika-s0402t:718_6: Yo tato duvidhavivekato vuṭṭhito bhavaṅgappattiyā sabrahmacārīhi samāgamena ca apeto.
tika-s0402t:718_8: Ayaṃ pana yasmā paṭisallānānaṃ uttamato phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāsi,
tika-s0402t:718_10: Kāyasakkhino bhavissāmāti nāmakāyena desanāsampaṭicchanavasena sakkhibhūtā bhavissāma.
tika-s0402t:718_11: Nanu ca “paññatte āsane nisīdī”ti idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0402t:718_13: te kasmā tassa āsanaṃ paññāpentīti āha “tathāgato hī”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:719_6: Tato eva bhikkhuādayopi sammukhā oloketuṃ asamatthatāya pattakkhandho,
tika-s0402t:719_11: na pana dassanaṃ tādisasseva dhammassa abhāvato.
tika-s0402t:719_12: Bhagavato eva vā “ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā”ti parassa vacanavasena dassitadhammesu.
tika-s0402t:719_16: Aññena vā aññanti pana paṭicchādanākāradassananti āha “aññena vā vacanenā”tiādi.
tika-s0402t:720_0: Tattha aññaṃ vacananti yaṃ samanuyuñjantena bhagavatā parassa dosavibhāvanaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0402t:720_6: kiṃ bhaṇathā”tiādivacanena aññaṃ āgantukakathaṃ āharanto “tvaṃ itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti puṭṭho
tika-s0402t:720_7: “pāṭaliputtaṃ gatomhī”ti vatvā puna “na tava pāṭaliputtagamanaṃ pucchāma,
tika-s0402t:720_8: āpattiṃ pucchāmā”ti vutte tato rājagahaṃ gatomhi.
tika-s0402t:720_11: “Tattha me sūkaramaṃsaṃ laddha”ntiādīni vadanto viya samanuyuñjakena vuttavacanato aññaṃ āgantukakathaṃ āharanto apanāmessati,
tika-s0402t:720_13: Appatītā honti tena atuṭṭhā asomanassikāti apaccayo,
tika-s0402t:721_0: Yassa kho pana te atthāya dhammo desitoti ettha dhamma-
tika-s0402t:721_1: saddena catusaccadhammo vuttoti āha “yassa maggassa vā phalassa vā atthāyā”ti.
tika-s0402t:721_5: Idāni “yassa kho pana te atthāya dhammo desito”ti ettha dhamma-
tika-s0402t:721_7: na pana catusaccadhammoti adhippāyena atthavikappaṃ dassento “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0402t:721_9: Takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyāti ettha sammāsaddo ubhayatthāpi yojetabbo “sammā takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyā”ti.
tika-s0402t:721_13: tassa niyyānaṃ atthato dhammasseva niyyānanti tappaṭikkhepena “so dhammo…pe…
tika-s0402t:722_0: Yadi tiracchānasīhassa nādo sabbatiracchānaekaccamanussāmanussanādato seṭṭhattā seṭṭhanādo,
tika-s0402t:722_1: kimaṅgaṃ pana tathāgatasīhassa nādoti āha “sīhanādanti seṭṭhanāda”nti.
